quote: “I love you as certain dark things are loved, secretly, between the shadow and the soul.”
author: Pablo Neruda,

quote: “It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.”
author: John Joseph Powell,

quote: “If I have learned anything in this long life of mine, it is this: in love we find out who we want to be; in war we find out who we are.”
author: Kristin Hannah,

quote: “I choose to love you in silence…
author: Rumi

quote: “your hand
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “Your memory feels like home to me.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “…the sad part is, that I will probably end up loving you without you for much longer than I loved you when I knew you.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “the saddest thing is to be
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “You fell in love with a storm. Did you really think you would get out unscathed?”
author: Nikita Gill

quote: “There is an ocean of silence between us… and I am drowning in it.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “My heart made it's choice, and it chose you.”
author: Colleen Hoover,

quote: “I wish I knew how to quit you.”
author: Annie Proulx,

quote: “I meant it when I said I didn’t believe in love at first sight. It takes time to really, truly fall for someone. Yet I believe in a moment. A moment when you glimpse the truth within someone, and they glimpse the truth within you. In that moment, you don’t belong to yourself any longer, not completely. Part of you belongs to him; part of him belongs to you. After that, you can’t take it back, no matter how much you want to, no matter how hard you try.”
author: Claudia Gray,

quote: “Have you ever been in love? Horrible, isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up. You build up all these defenses. You build up this whole armor, for years, so nothing can hurt you, then one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life… You give them a piece of you. They don't ask for it. They do something dumb one day like kiss you, or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own anymore. Love takes hostages. It gets inside you. It eats you out and leaves you crying in the darkness, so a simple phrase like "maybe we should just be friends" or "how very perceptive" turns into a glass splinter working its way into your heart. It hurts. Not just in the imagination. Not just in the mind. It's a soul-hurt, a body-hurt, a real gets-inside-you-and-rips-you-apart pain. Nothing should be able to do that. Especially not love. I hate love.”
author: Neil Gaiman,

quote: “You are damaged and broken and unhinged. But so are shooting stars and comets.”
author: Nikita Gill

quote: “Get up, Shahrzad al-Khayzuran. You kneel before no one. Least of all me.”
author: Renee Ahdieh,

quote: “That’s what it feels like when you touch me. Like millions of tiny universes being born and then dying in the space between your finger and my skin. Sometimes I forget.”
author: Iain Thomas,

quote: “a flower knows, when its butterfly will return,
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “I love my parents' murderer; I suppose I could love anyone.”
author: Holly Black,

quote: “i want to be
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “If you cannot hold me in your arms, then hold my memory in high regard.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “If you’re searching for a quote that puts your feelings into words – you won’t find it.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “When you experience loss, people say you’ll move through the 5 stages of grief….
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “I think perhaps I will always hold a candle for you – even until it burns my hand.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Nothing is more tragic than loving someone to the depths of your soul and knowing they cannot and will not ever love you back.”

quote: “To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.”
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “It’s painful, loving someone from afar.

quote: “I had someone once who made every day mean something.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.”
author: Nicole  Lyons

author: Christopher Poindexter

quote: “I miss that feeling of connection.

quote: “Tell me every terrible thing you ever did, and let me love you anyway.”
author: Sade Andria Zabala,

quote: “In this story
author: Arzum Uzun

quote: “For some people, “the point of no return” begins at the very moment their souls become aware of each others’ existence.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “He was both everything I could ever want…
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Though these words will never find you, I hope that you knew I was thinking of you today….. and that I was wishing you every happiness.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “I raised you so high that every other man on earth is now doomed to live in your shadow.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “The last time I felt alive – I was looking into your eyes.
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “It’s difficult for me to imagine the rest of my life without you. But I suppose I don’t have to imagine it... I just have to live it”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Who am I to deny gravity, Aurora? When you shine brighter than any constellation in the sky?”

quote: “I would court you, with all the grace and courtesy that you deserve,”
author: C.S. Pacat,

quote: “He touched my soul long before I knew what his hands felt like.”

quote: “I long for you; I who usually longs without longing, as though I am unconscious and absorbed in neutrality and apathy, really, utterly long for every bit of you.”
author: Franz Kafka,

quote: “I'm done. I don't need anything more out of life. I have you, and that's enough.”

quote: “Those freckles make you seem like a galaxy of stars, just waiting to be explored and loved.”

quote: “I didn’t love you to seek revenge.

quote: “Not words.

quote: “I had embraced you...
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “You're every street I've ever walked. You're the tree outside my window, you're a sparrow as he flies. You're the book that I am reading. You're every poem I've ever loved.”
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz,

quote: “Your smile and your laughter lit my whole world.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “تقولين لي أنك تخافين الحب
author: جبران خليل جبران,

quote: “...so i will greet you
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “The absence of a message sometimes is a presence of one.”
author: Hasse Jerner

quote: “Love is the most beautiful of dreams and the worst of nightmares.”
author: Aman Jassal,

quote: “how is it that
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “I think it's hard for you to fall in love because you like control, and you can't control what another person does or feels, so you keep all your cards.”
author: Tarryn Fisher,

quote: “She was knowingly punishing herself. That was the only reasonable explanation. There was no use in acting naive. What happened earlier in the day was proof that she was going to give in to his flirtation. It appeared she'd thrown caution to the wind and opened her arms to embrace everything that could go wrong in her life. What's one more problem to add to the pile?”
author: Emem Uko,

quote: “My love is meatloaf flavored. I just wish my meatloaf was also meatloaf flavored.”
author: Dora J. Arod,

quote: “I love you," he murmured into my hair. "You are my night and stars, the fate I would fix myself to in any life.”
author: Roshani Chokshi,

quote: “I am a wild woman.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “The truth is I do love you. Admitting that means opening myself up to all that pain when you leave. After you realize this wasn’t love, but gratitude.”
author: Kelly Moran,

quote: “I wanted a love thick with time, as inscrutable as if a lathe had carved it from night and as familiar as the marrow in my bones. I wanted the impossible, which made it that much easier to push out of my mind.”
author: Roshani Chokshi,

quote: “sometimes i don't know, which moment
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “You want to be free. You also want to be mine. You can't be both.”
author: Nenia Campbell,

quote: “Real love ought to be more like a tree and less like a flower. That's the kind of love my parents had. Not so consuming and more everlasting. And you see that tree over there? Now it's only showing green leaves, but during the spring it's covered in flowers. Because as reliable as trees are, they can also speak of beauty and passion.”
author: Mya Robarts,

quote: “funny how our hearts
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “When it comes
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “she was completely whole
author: Maquita Donyel Irvin,

quote: “It’s times like this…. when it’s over a year later and I’m still crying over you that I want to turn to you and say: See…. This is why I asked you never to kiss me.”

quote: “Like any / unloved thing, I don’t know if I’m real /
author: Natalie Wee,

quote: “And I fear that my place gets taken by some other one, very lucky and not too shy, who flirts with your eyes while I’m the one who’s crazy about them.”

quote: “i write
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “i'm glad to be alive
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “Farsi Couplet:
author: Amir Khusrau,

quote: “Like a child who saves their favourite food on the plate for last, I try to save all thoughts of you for the end of the day so I can dream with the taste of you on my tongue.”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “those broken girls have the deepest love.”
author: R.H. Sin

quote: “Speak to me: I will spend my lifetime trying to understand you.”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “The way our fingers intertwine feels so natural and right; as if our hands hold memories of meeting in a thousand other lifetimes.”
author: John Mark Green

quote: “Love doesn’t die with death. Love is like liquid; when it pours out, it seeps into others’ lives. Love changes form and shape. Love gets into everything. Death doesn’t conquer all; love does. Love wins every single time. Love wins by lasting through death. Love wins by loving more, loving again, loving without fear.”
author: Kate   O'Neill

quote: “I spend most nights at home falling in love with the idea of you.”
author: Michael Faudet

quote: “I always have many roads to travel, but I take the one which leads to you.”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “my love
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “Do not turn me
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “Icarus should have waited for nightfall,
author: Nina Mouawad,

quote: “It hurts to let go, to say goodbye for the final time and remain distant in your closure, it may even tear your heart out to the point of insanity; but somehow in it all you find the pieces of your worth and you start creating yourself again, and in that journey of transformation you find the essence of what truly matters, inner happiness. It's life, we all fall at some stage but it's up to you, to decide how long you want to stay there.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “He looked at me like I was the stars when all I’d ever felt like was the dark nothingness between them.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “There will be hatred. There will be war. The country will fight itself to pieces. It will starve its people, ravage its land, poison its breath. Shanghai will fall and break and cry. But alongside everything, there has to be love - eternal, undying, enduring. Burn through vengeance and terror and warfare. Burn through everything that fuels the human heart and Sears it red, burn through everything that covers the outside with hard muscle and tough sinew. Cut down deep and grab what beats beneath, and it is love that will survive after everything else has perished.”
author: Chloe Gong,

quote: “It was easy to be good and kind in times of plenty. The trying times were the moments that defined a man.
author: Renee Ahdieh,

quote: “I think of you only twice a day - when I am alone and when I am with someone else.”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “She was chaos and beauty intertwined. A tornado of roses from divine.”
author: Shakieb Orgunwall

quote: “I will look for you in every lifetime and love you there.”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “She will blaze through you like a gypsy wildfire. Igniting you soul and dancing in its flames. And when she is gone, the smell of her smoke will be the only thing left to soothe you.”
author: Nicole  Lyons

quote: “You think everyone you like is special, she said. I'm just a normal person. When you get to like someone, you make them feel like they're different from everyone else. You're doing it with Nick, you did it with me once.”
author: Sally Rooney,

quote: “When did you first fall in love?"
author: Saiber,

quote: “When the darkest part of you meets the darkest part of me, it creates light.”
author: Coco Mellors,

quote: “When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “I am looking for the one I can’t fool.”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “I enjoy the wild things,
author: Nikki rowe

quote: “You make me thank god for every mistake I ever made, Because each one led me down the path that brought me to you.”
author: Pablo Neruda,

quote: “With callused hands
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “I try to do something positive – I socialise more…
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “I can't explain why your name seems so familiar to me, or why it feels like I've heard your voice a thousand times before, but I can explain this ~ your the type of chaos Id bleed for.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “I hope that someday when I am gone, someone, somewhere, picks my soul up off of these pages and thinks, "I would have loved her.”
author: Nicole  Lyons

quote: “I will speak of love
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “I am not a day dreamer, I am a believer, that after every painful love I have gone through, it is just an experience to crack open the deepest parts of my core and allow to me to delve into a passion so rare, that I will find a love that was almost, never meant to be.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “Love me like Saturday night, like three glasses of champagne, like the room is spinning, like you're drunk on my love.”
author: C.J. Carlyon

quote: “I remembered you with my soul clenched”
author: Pablo Neruda,

quote: “If you don't love yourself, you won't be happy with yourself. If you can't love yourself, you can't love anyone else. You can't give the love you do not have. You can't make anyone love you without loving yourself first.”
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: “be the kiss in my hair
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “You can't buy the love you want, you can't sell your love. Love is given by those who deserves it.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “I love to walk. Walking is a spiritual journey and a reflection of living. Each of us must determine which path to take and how far to walk; we must find our own way, what is right for one may not be for another. There is no single right way to deal with late stage cancer, to live life or approach death, or to walk an old mission trail.”
author: Edie Littlefield Sundby,

quote: “For you
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “She's worth the pain of trying. Worth the risk of failing”
author: Sarah Hogle,

quote: “Even when it seems that there is no one else, always remember there's one person who never ceased to love you - yourself.”
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: “Dancing, at its best, is independence and intimacy in balance.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “If you can forget the person you love, you have not loved enough.”
author: Anmol Rawat,

quote: “He kisses--how do I explain it? Like someone in love. Like he has nothing to lose. Like someone who has just learned a foreign language and can use only the present tense and only the second person. Only now, only you.”
author: Andrew Sean Greer,

quote: “Sometimes the quietest love is the loudest.”
author: Liz Tomforde,

quote: “It wasn't exactly love at first sight, but it was deeper than that. A sense of belonging to a place I never knew I wanted but somehow always needed. It was a home that carried a heartbeat.”
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “the intensity
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “A girl who travels will need someone that questions her, not too little, and not too much. She’ll need someone to read her, but also really listen to her. Because she’ll want to do the same. She’ll want a person that shares an interest but at the same time stays genuine to who they are. Not drown in a puddle of narcissism. And not drown in a lake of fascination.”
author: lauren klarfeld

quote: “When we understand people;
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: “Even the smallest changes in our daily routine can create incredible ripple effects that expand our vision of what is possible.”
author: Charles F. Glassman,

quote: “There is nothing right or wrong in love. Where there is love, then there is nothing but only love.”
author: Sara Naveed,

quote: “All relationships have ups and downs. Romantic fantasy often nurtures the belief that difficulties and down times are an indication of a lack of love rather than part of the process. In actuality, true love thrives of the difficulties. The foundation of such love is the assumption that we want to grow and expand, to become more fully ourselves. There is no change that does not bring with it a feeling of challenge and loss. When we experience true love it may feel as though our lives are in danger; we may feel threatened.”
author: bell hooks,

quote: “When he looks at me, the way he looks at me... He does not know, what I lack... Or - how - I am incomplete. He sees me, for what I - am, as I am. He's happy - to see me. Every time. Every day.”
author: Guillermo del Toro,

quote: “Before I can become an expert on anything, I must first become an expert on me.”
author: Charles F. Glassman,

quote: “You're the one I like. Maybe love.”
author: Jenna Evans Welch,

quote: “Her hands crept around his neck, tangling in his hair to keep him closer, even though she knew that beautiful boys with expiration dates couldn't be held, only borrowed for a time.”
author: Martina Boone

quote: “Every night, I laid awake with your memories flooding through my eyes with the hope to be with you when sleep arrived.”
author: Anmol Rawat,

quote: “True love is built on free will and free choice, not control and manipulation.”
author: Ken Poirot

quote: “One does not seek love,' she told him, 'it should find you all on it's own”
author: Barbara Lieberman,

quote: “In love, treat your relationship as if you are growing the most beautiful flower. Keep watering it, tend to its roots, give it lots of sunlight, and always make sure the petals are full of color and are never curling. Once you neglect your plant, it will die, as will your relationship.”
author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “Home for me is not where I am. Home for me is a physical structure where the girl whom I love is sheltered and protected from the incoming storms of life. Home for me is not where I am safe, but where she is safe. Home for me is not where she exists, but where she lives. She is my home.”
author: Juansen Dizon,

quote: “If your absence doesn't bother them then your presence never mattered to them in the first place”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “I believe in Love, and I know love conquers all.”
author: Ahmad Ardalan,

quote: “Reveal to me everything you find ugly about yourself, so I can reveal to you everything I find beautiful about you.”
author: Juansen Dizon,

quote: “Though it’s reasons to burn may vary... you are always the fuel of my fire.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Sometimes what seems so right turns out wrong and what seems so wrong turns out right. What do I call this phenomenon? Life.”
author: Charles F. Glassman,

quote: “I know love is real because her love is visible.”
author: Delano Johnson poet

quote: “I ain't a lover, but I want to love all your crazy imperfections,
author: Hareem Ch,

quote: “I understand we all have our differences. But while learning about history I've read about white people coming together, Jews coming together, Spanish coming together, different cultures and religions understanding and coming together despite their differences. Slavery was never something that shocked me. What shocks me is how black people have not yet overcome the odds and we're such strong smart people. Why we can't just stand together?”
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: “He looks like a poem. One of those mournfully beautiful ones with short, unfamiliar words that sound ethereal when spoken and completely nonsensical when thought.”
author: Velvetoscar,

quote: “The way to my heart shattered when you left me, but I was glad because your memories were invulnerable, locked inside my heart.”
author: Anmol Rawat,

quote: “Love on its worst day conquers hate on its best day.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “Remember when we told each other no distractions?
author: Victoria Aveyard,

quote: “Don't waste time thinking about them. If they walked away from your love, they don't deserve your pain.”
author: C.L.  Brown

quote: “I tried to keep him at a safe distance where he could only see the decent parts of me and it made us both miserable. I inadvertently let him in to see the ugly parts but instead of running away like I’d counted on him to do, he wrapped his arms around all of that ugliness and didn’t let go.”
author: Sarah Hogle,

quote: “I would have followed you to hell and back... if only you'd lead me back.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Your hair is winter fire,
author: Stephen King,

quote: “You can run from the truth. You can run and hide from the truth.
author: Delano Johnson,

quote: “Some people come in your life and make you believe that your life is incomplete without them. Then they leave, creating a void in your heart that may fill back with time but will never be complete.”
author: Anmol Rawat,

quote: “Magic existed in his eyes, his energy as he lived his daily life. I could fall into his soul and lay my worries to rest, but if by chance this happened; it wouldn't last the test.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “I have a question for you. "If your shadow is the second most beautiful thing in the world, which is the first?".”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “You can only trust your emotions as you can lie to yourself with your brain but not your heart.”
author: Carl White

quote: “I think i should get love inked on my skin.
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: “Her love was like lavender,
author: Laura Chouette,

quote: “But some relationships aren't meant to last.
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: “I miss your voice because it is a symphony; your scent because it is a treasure; your smile because it is a jewel; your hug because it is a masterpiece; and your kiss because it is a miracle.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “I lay there in the bath not thinking, not doing anything. After a few seconds, I heard her open the front door, and then her voice saying: she's had a really rough day, so just be nice to her. And Nick said: I know, I will. I loved them both so much in this moment that I wanted to appear in front of them like a benevolent ghost and sprinkle blessings into their lives. Thank you, I wanted to say. Thank you both. You are my family now.”
author: Sally Rooney,

quote: “Forgiveness is a personal process that doesn’t depend on us having direct contact with the people who have hurt us.”
author: Sharon Salzberg,

quote: “When you fall in love with someone you treasure their quirks as much as anything else. Flaws become unique marks of character, things you'd miss if they weren't there.”
author: Tommy Cotton,

quote: “Before meeting you, I didn't know what it was like to feel lonely. I never even considered myself to be alone. That's because when you feel lonely, it means that there is someone for you to miss.”
author: Yuuki Obata

quote: “He looked up in despair at the starry sky, he struck his burning chest with his fist; he loved and he was not loved!”
author: Gaston Leroux,

quote: “I was well aware of her ghosts. I'd met them, once or twice, during her darkness nights. "I knew you were my one when you wouldn't run," she said. How could I? Of course I stayed, when her ghosts scared my own away. What others were too afraid to see, meant everything to me.”
author: J. Raymond

quote: “The key in letting go is practice. Each time we let go, we disentangle ourselves from our expectations and begin to experience things as they are.”
author: Sharon Salzberg,

quote: “To love is not to look at one another, it is to look, together, in the same direction.”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,

quote: “When two souls are one, they hear each other, even in silence.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “Every second i live in a hope to meet you one day.....
author: Shantanand Sharma

quote: “After 49 years of marriage, isn’t it amazing when you can look at your partner sound asleep next to you and still believe they have potential.”
author: Kaylin McFarren

quote: “Someday, I will be brave enough to say these things to you in person. For now, I remain in happy, quiet contemplation over you and can say tonight that I just might love you. Or could someday.”
author: Erin McCahan,

quote: “I learned that love can transcend race and time, and that it can be beautiful and perfect and worth fighting for but also fragile and heartbreaking, and sometimes sacrifice is necessary. That sometimes it’s you against the world, and there are no easy answers. That you have to know when to hold on…and when to let go.”
author: Julie Kagawa,

quote: “A proposito: vi amo.”
author: Christelle Dabos,

quote: “Love is worth everything. EVERYTHING”
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,

quote: “Può darsi che in futuro stando con me conoscerai dolori, guai, problemi ma, se vuoi, costruiamo insieme una vita complicata, ma più felice di qualsiasi vita solitaria”
author: Banana Yoshimoto

quote: “I put my fingers under Emily's chin, tilting her head up. "I love you."
author: Katie McGarry,

quote: “If You'r a Mechanical Engineer Don't Feel So Proud, Because You Can Repair Everything Except Your Own Heart"!!!”
author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quote: “Her collarbones like wings that spread from the base of her throat to the ends of her shoulders. A bird held down by skin.”
author: Arundhati Roy,

quote: “You said you didn’t care what I thought. Or what I did. Or if I died, if I’m not mistaken."
author: Sarah J. Maas,

quote: “Even before we met and long after we're both gone, my heart lives inside of yours. I'm forever and ever in love with you.”
author: Crystal Woods,

quote: “Because, wherever your heart is, that is where you´ll find your treasure”
author: Paulo Coelho,

quote: “You are that one breath. that puts all the remaining breaths. back into my body.”
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “We thought everything would be
author: Zaeema J. Hussain,

quote: “I seem to be torn between 'I wish we'd met earlier' and 'I wish we'd never met'.”
author: Ahmed Mostafa

quote: “I’m only going say this—love is a wild creature that cannot
author: Candace Knoebel,

quote: “ليس الحـب فقط هـو مايجعلنا سعداء , فالذكريات مع أحد الآصدقاء ترسم بسمه من نـوع خاص”
author: فارس أحمد طه,

quote: “I think it's important as a women to know who you are and what you deserve. We, ourselves set the boundaries of what we choose to accept.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: “I feel your words on my lips
author: Maquita Donyel Irvin

quote: “This is how it is in life and love. In life and love we are with people for a while, and then we join other people, people we have not met, and we walk with them, and we leave behind all the things we used to be. Sometimes we leave people behind too... This happens everyday. Everyday this happens and scarcely anybody cares.”
author: Daniel Handler,

quote: “A relationship that is truly genuine does not keep changing its colors. Real gold never rusts. If a relationship is really solid and golden, it will be unbreakable. Not even Time can destroy its shine.”
author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “I almost forget that she still hates me, despite how hard I’ve fallen for her.
author: Tahereh Mafi,

quote: “when the words not enough to describe how much you love....
author: Bob Marley,

quote: “It's loud inside my head, with those words I want to say to you.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “It’s beyond your consciousness that your soul lingers with the person you love and hence your mood will affect the one you love. This is the reason why you sometimes sense your mood changing mysteriously with no reason.”
author: Udai Yadla

quote: “love ridden
author: K. Y. Robinson,

quote: “Life is not a competition. No one has to lose for someone else to win. A true blessing blesses everyone.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “I have learned, that in this life, you must always be your own advocate. We yearn for someone to always be on our side, to always trust us, to always believe us and believe in us, regardless of the world and everything in it! But the reality of life proves that the majority of people are only capable of a shallow love. They will only advocate you as much as you advocate yourself. They are admirers who have fallen into adoration of your own publication of yourself and once that image begins to shake and quiver? Their "love" shakes and quivers, too. Very seldom will you find someone who will love the way that you tremble. And yet, this is the only type of love that is ever even true! If you are not loved for the way that you tremble and the way that you come unhinged, then you are not even loved at all.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “She waited for a man who would marvel her with his intellect, wit and physique, all at the same time. Someone who would beguile her, unnerve her, possess her, and claim her and then make her jealous with deceit and accusations. Someone who wouldn’t bore her after a few hours of company. Someone who wouldn’t be distracted by someone younger than her - even at that age, she had her insecurities........ She waited for a man who would be worth a chase and a challenge, who would beguile her and ravage her, and be true to her. She was no fool. She knew the limitations of affectation and ceremonial overtures between husband and wife. She knew the limits of compatibility, being put off by a few of her suitors instantly. She knew that love was not a guarantee to lifetime of happiness. She knew the importance of money and it’s effect on men. She knew the value of having the best in jewelry, clothes and company, for a person was judged accordingly, and if one wished to be a success, one had to look the part. And that required continuity of resources, not affection. But still she waited. She waited for a man who would surprise her beyond her expectations. She waited for a man who would be magical. She waited for a man who would never come.”
author: Noorilhuda,

quote: “I love when you do that,” he whispered.
author: Kandi Steiner,

quote: “I think true love transcends tiem. The thunderbolt does not. Not if it strkes men the way you described."
author: Mya Robarts

quote: “Suntem ceea ce iubim.”
author: Nichita Stănescu

quote: “love is infinite and will only remain in the end”
author: Mahiraj Jadeja,

quote: “He was changed, burned, branded, destroyed and rebuilt. And he loved it.”
author: Jess Michaels,

quote: “Often I lose myself in the constellation of my own ideas, forever searching for point of illumination. But no matter where I look, I find you, shinning and bright, offering me what ever it is I seek, you are my one single star. My sun, my moon, my guide and direction, I know as long as I have you, I'll never lose my way. Even if I can not touch you, I know I will see you, feel you, from anywhere. If I need you I know where to find you”
author: Vaddey Ratner,

quote: “Let yourself disappear in the darkness; if you are loved, people will come and find you with torches in their hands! Love is a great searcher; it always searches the loved one! To see who really love you, just disappear!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “Long after people forget what you said or did, they’ll remember how you made them feel.”
author: T. Rafael Cimino,

quote: “Obviously, the kind that belongs to him.”
author: 墨香铜臭, Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù,

quote: “I could make love with you until the moon decides to never glow again.”
author: Melody  Lee,

quote: “And if my heart was a canvas, every square inch of it would be painted over with you.”
author: Cassandra Clare,

quote: “love
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “Khusrau darya prem ka, ulti wa ki dhaar,
author: Amir Khusrau,

quote: “Everything started as nothing.”
author: Auliq Ice

quote: “I have always wanted to give you the world, so I started giving you pieces of the oceans that kept us apart.”
author: Karen Quan,

quote: “I do not write about love
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “That’s real love and real happiness. It’s when you go to sleep every night hoping that you are less happy than your lover; it’s hoping that you’ve given everything you could to them so that their day could be just a tiny bit better.”
author: Lexie Syrah,

quote: “My love,
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Far from a normal-functioning relationship, but normal has never been our thing.”
author: Anna Todd,

quote: “There is no cosmetic to gain a beauty like yours.”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Love is about the good moments, but it's about holding on to each other during the difficult ones, too. Coming out on the other side, weathered but still holding hands, isn't easy. It's the most difficult thing there can possibly be, but I know now it's the truest test of love there is.”
author: Aisha Saeed,

quote: “But that’s the thing about narcissists. They can try to fool you, with all their heart, but in the end, they’re just fooling themselves.”
author: Ellie Fox,

quote: “I'm in love with you. It doesn't matter what has happened in my life. I love you till my last breath and it's amazing that i see you everywhere.”
author: Indra Kumar Jangid,

quote: “Dear Fellow Human Being,
author: Jasz  Gill

quote: “Exposure to erotically inclined stimuli immediately activates parts of a male brain that are associated with sexual desire. Being attracted to other women, however, doesn’t mean men would betray the trust they are given and harm the partnership with the women they love.”
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “Science can’t explain why two specific people are magnetically drawn to each other instead of repelled. Only love can.”
author: Colleen Oakley,

quote: “Love is the opposite of fear and it lights the flames of a million hearts.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “You wanna love me for the rest of your life?”
author: whoknows,

quote: “Animals are a gift from above for they truly define the words unconditional love.”
author: Heather Wolf,

quote: “You look all frail and breakable, but you're really a violent little thing, aren't you?”
author: Rebecca Yarros,

quote: “Oh, darling, that’s what love is. It’s some power greater than you and me, that draws us to one special person.”
author: Jodi Picoult,

quote: “No. I don't want the love at first sight
author: Sowmya Thejomoorthy

quote: “I can't live without the sun shining down on my face, and I can't dream without the stars kissing me goodnight.”
author: S.L. Jennings,

quote: “I still have that feeling the first time we met every time I see you.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “Jealousy says, “Compete with each other.” Envy says, “Destroy each other.” Empathy says, “Help each other.” Love says, “Empower each other.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “You believe in love, just as a child believes in Santa Claus or a fairy tale.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “I know in that moment, even though it could not be more ridiculous, that if I die in there, I won't die without falling in love.”
author: Rachael Lippincott,

quote: “It is impossible to be hurt by someone you love contrary to popular belief. Only something or someone you fear can hurt you.”
author: Frederick Dodson,

quote: “Nobody will save yeu,
author: Sandesh Hukpachongbang

quote: “Romance for me is
author: Sandesh Hukpachongbang

quote: “You have no choice. You must leave your ego on the doorstep before you enter love.”
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Love is like dried flowers sometimes. Even though you watch the petals shrink and change colour, you cannot help treasuring them”
author: Munia Khan

quote: “You and I
author: Ayushee Ghoshal ,

quote: “Love starts as a feeling,
author: Justin Wetch,

quote: “your voice is a place i want to take shelter in, a place that makes me feel safe and soft.”
author: Zaeema J. Hussain,

quote: “Heaven is a place where all the dogs you've ever loved come to greet you.”
author: Oliver Gaspirtz,

quote: “If you do not love me I shall not be loved.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: “Do you love me enough that I am allowed to be damaged? Do you love me enough that I am allowed to be weak in some places?”
author: Khadija Rupa,

quote: “YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “I didn't want to be the woman who gave herself over willingly to the first man to notice her. I didn't want to be the stupid girl in every novel who loved without question and entered relationships that didn't make sense.”
author: Destinee Hardwick,

quote: “I’m wrapped in you.
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “I only wrote prose before I met you.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Love is not a forest fire that burns intensely,
author: J. Conrad Guest,

quote: “I am here, I will always be here. Watching you, loving you.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “I loved being near you. Even though I felt that bubble you had around you, even though I never quite knew what you were thinking, damn, did I love being near you. Somehow, I knew you would rip me apart and drown me. Somehow, I knew we wouldn’t last. It didn’t matter. You were my sun. I loved feeling you upon me, around me, between me. Even though you could only love me from a distance, I didn’t care. I never felt more warmth inside of me than when you were against me.”
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: “Gifts are temporary and often forgotten; love is forever and always remembered.”
author: Ken Poirot

quote: “Never fall in love with stargazers – always with accelerated affection. Their love disappears in the blink of an eye like a shooting star.”
author: RSCruz

quote: “There is nothing more graceful and powerful than the ability to respond to life (in all situations) with love and acceptance.”
author: debbie lynn - 360 degrees full circle

quote: “It's so loud inside my head, with those words I want to say to you.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “Nowhere is it written in stone that you must love in only one way, only one person, only one time. You haven't missed your shot at love, because love isn't just one thing.”
author: Rosiee Thor,

quote: “because love doesn't need to last forever in order to make a lasting impression.”
author: Heidi Priebe,

quote: “Even when we do our very best to treat those close to us with utmost respect and understanding, conflict happens. That’s life. That’s human nature.”
author: Sharon Salzberg,

quote: “Without love, things disperse around; love holds things tightly! It prevents them to move away and disappear on the horizons!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “If you spend time judging and criticizing people, you will not have time to heal from your pain or brokenness. You cannot love yourself when you judge or criticize others who are created in God's image and after His Likeness...in which you are also created. Love cannot operate from a space of pain. Love and hurt cannot reside in the same space.”
author: Kemi Sogunle,

quote: “Do not ask me
author: Sandesh Hukpachongbang

quote: “A hundred pages of me fighting the conformity of love for a boy I simply loved from the start. From the day I met his heart, to the day I had to let it go. I love you more than I planned, Harry.”
author: Happydays1d,

quote: “Love is so supremely important. As our great poet Auden said, 'Love each other or perish”
author: Mitch Albom,

quote: “Being present to yourself in love and with kindness is the ultimate gift.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “Faith is stronger than a stone. Joy is taller than a mountain. Love is wider than an ocean.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “I will love you tomorrow
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: “I have poured my heart out ….
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “The only place I ever felt at home was with you. There isn’t a place for me anywhere anymore… I’ve been evicted.”
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “I was so blessed.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: “Life is just a slide. Back and forth between loving and leaving, remembering and forgetting, holding on and letting go.”
author: Nicole  Lyons

quote: “Her laugh, her laugh was the sound that brought him out of the darkness and into the light. Her laugh dragged him, by his damn collar, through the bullshit clouding his mind and infecting his thoughts.”
author: Anna Todd,

quote: “Love' is the only weapon I have, I will defend with love, I will attack with love.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “For a dark street, sunshine is most welcome; for a wounded soul, love is most welcome!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “Relationships that are merely based on practicality or utility will ultimately make us feel lonely.”
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “Behind every 'I love you', there is an invisible 'until'.”
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “Love is a longing for becoming one with another human being that nobody of us can avoid.”
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “When it comes to love, Princess, rules blur, and traditions fade,”
author: Rose B. Mashal,

quote: “Epic love story has only love between two people but do not have 'they lived happily ever after”
author: Santosh Avvannavar,

quote: “The love we say we feel for another is, in most cases, just a selfish hunt for our own happiness.”
author: Tatjana Ostojic

quote: “I am sure that God has given all his time in making you, the remaining human race has been created in haste.”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “Why, Andrew, why would it irritate me? Do you think that being loved by you is something to be ashamed of? I don't.”
author: Andrew Ashling,

quote: “Many people who experienced love their whole lives, in childhood and all throughout, do not know the worth of being loved as adults. People fed love on silver spoons don't feel the weight of love anymore. They don't feel the value of it because they always had it anyway. They are insatiable, they don't trust it, they always ask you for more! Fucking shits! It's the people who had to pull love out of cracks in the wall and out of holes in trees, who know the value of love, who feel the weight of love, even the smallest ounce of it! Love people who weren't loved. They're worth their weight in gold.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Sometimes when you experience something wonderful, everything else loses its shine.”
author: M.E.  Vaughan,

quote: “If you love me help me to become more of who I am.”
author: Nancy Omar,

quote: “A circle's unity and never ending smoothness is how we can aim to feel inside. Smooth, gentle, accepted, no rough edges, only love for all parts of our selves.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “عشقه که آدما ابله میکنه یا فقط ادمای احمق عاشق میشن؟”
author: Orhan Pamuk,

quote: “Frozen in time, captured in memories, filled in passion, she melted in love before his eyes.”
author: Luffina Lourduraj

quote: “Soul mate romance dissolves the superficial and touches your deepest heart with the delightful power of love.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “All love is bittersweet. Love is inexplicable; it is part poetry and part masochism. Part of love is the loss of self-control because one must openly surrender their sense of an exclusive self to the manic powers of love. The personal act of surrender to a lover leaves one vulnerable to entanglement in a maze of emotions. When we fall in love, our lover’s happiness and well-being assumes the primary role in our mind, they become copilots of our souls. When we are in love for the first time, we feel what it means to become a complete person; we identify who we are by seeing our reflection in our lover’s eye; and we sense what we might become when infused with love. When our lover leaves us, we feel vexed and vacant because we recognize that they took up such a large part of what made us feel intoxicated with life. When our lover abandons us, we lose our sense of self; we temporarily cease to exist as a whole person, and we must reconstruct the shattered remnants of oneself in the wake of a love lost.”
author: Kilroy J. Oldster,

quote: “Love is my mother. Joy is my sister. Knowledge is brother. Wisdom is my soulmate.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “Lovers never hate, haters never love.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “Successful people do what they love, not what they are told to do.”
author: Gordana Biernat,

quote: “I've wondered. Of course I have. And I love Byatt more than anything, more than myself, more than the life I had before Raxter. But I know the warmth in my heart when I look at her. How it burns smooth and even, without a spark.”
author: Rory Power,

quote: “Oh, I hate him,' she said, and I noticed a flush of colour come into her cheeks and the manner in which the fingers of her left hand dug into her palm, as if she wanted something to take away the pain. 'I absolutely detest him. Afterwards, I didn't feel very much at all for a week or two. I suppose I was in shock. But then the fury rose and it hasn't subsided since. Sometimes I find it difficult to control. I think it was around the time that everyone stopped asking me whether I was all right, when lives went back to how they had been before. Had he been in Dublin I might well have gone over there, broken down his door and stabbed him as he slept. Fortunately for him, he was in Madagascar with his lepers.' (p. 268)”
author: John Boyne,

quote: “I Loved One, Not Many ; Many Loved It, Not One”
author: Syed Sharukh

quote: “There were things one could do, things so terrible, Val was certain they could make someone stop loving you. She was equally certain that she had done some of these things, and as desperate as she was to be proven otherwise, she was equally afraid that she was right. That she had become as awful as the rest of the world seemed to think she was. That she was unlovable.”
author: Nenia Campbell,

quote: “the one
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “and the afterglow...
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “She's magic, Cassandra. A single flower blooming in an endless desert.”
author: Anne Bishop,

quote: “When I look into your eyes I see everything I want in this world and that is never going to change.”
author: Stephen F. Campbell

quote: “I wonder if you know how special you are; I wonder if you know how precious you are; I wonder if you know how lucky I am to have you in my life; I love you so much.”
author: Hassan Ali

quote: “There is a part of us that knows the timing of any relationship. It knows things that we cannot work out. It knows when to say yes. It knows when to say no. It knows when to wait. It knows when something has finished. It knows when something has started. It knows when we have a responsibility to another person. It knows when the ties are untied. It will not betray us or another.”
author: Donna Goddard

quote: “I’m going to give you a handful of wildflowers
author: Carolyn Riker,

quote: “I may act like I don't care anymore, but if only you could see me inside, you'll know how much I wanted to be with you.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “I don't want perfect I want something real. Something that makes me feel.”
author: N.R.Hart

quote: “The only magic I ever really made was the love I had with you.”
author: Eden Butler,

quote: “It is strange to both fit in everywhere and belong nowhere, to never feel completely at home outside of your own skin”
author: Maquita Donyel Irvin,

quote: “It's a mistake to love you,
author: Robi Aulia Abdi

quote: “A child is a Soul, a Unit Consciousness materialized on Earth to learn, fulfill its purpose contributing within the Matrix of Gaia. Our parents fought for ‘Expression of Thoughts’, ‘Equality’, we now have a task to fight for the Supremacy of Love over Control within all Areas of Life.‘
author: Natasa Pantovic Nuit,

quote: “Love is the only brick that hits you on the head and gives you a smile instead of tears.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference… You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your concern, your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.”
author: Roy   Bennett

quote: “I see these lights, every time I look into your eyes. It crosses my heart, and make me feel in love.”
author: Jayson Engay

quote: “Sharing your kindness sparks understanding all around. Then like fireflies in the night, twinkling love surrounds you.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “When she remembered a summer it would be this one. When she remembered love it would be his.”
author: C.J. Carlyon,

quote: “Love is spiritual oxygen; without it, the soul dies.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “In a relationship, the word 'sorry' is worth more than gold. However, the more it's mentioned the lesser your love and affection becomes.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “It's so easy to love someone at their best; to be happy when everything is going right. The true test is loving them and understanding them at their worst; because that's when they need you most. If they can't love you through the bad times, they don't deserve you through the good ones.”
author: Carlos Wallace,

quote: “Love is like a butterfly, when it comes and sits on your palm, you can either care for it and let it fly if it wishes, or you can trap it and see it die.”
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: “You know the real meaning of celebrating a birthday if you remember the sacrifice of giving birth by your mother”
author: Elmitch Alarcio

quote: “Da je na svetu više ludaka poput nas, svet bi bio normalnije mesto.”
author: Tamara Kučan,

quote: “Love is the strongest angel. Hate is the ugliest demon.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “If I told you about a land of love,
author: Yunus Emre,

quote: “Mark says that when I am frustrated his I love you means it's okay for me to be frustrated - a reminder that my feelings are situational and temporary. "And because I love you even when you are annoyed and I want you to know," he adds.”
author: Mandy Len Catron,

quote: “Loving someone is like getting addicted to alcohol; you don’t start consuming it because you want to, but because you need to. Once you begin, it’s tough to stop, and by the time you stop, you aren’t the same as before.”
author: Misbah Khan,

quote: “I'm like a corpse stumbling and screaming through his precinct in the fear that I truly lost her.”
author: Happydays1d,

quote: “stronger than mountains.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “I breathe in...
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “Tell me..how do you stand there?
author: Sanober Khan,

quote: “In a word, it was impossible for me to separate her, in the past or in the present, from the innermost life of my life.”
author: Charles Dickens,

quote: “i immerse
author: Sanober Khan

quote: “Friendships - and indeed most relationships - are measured in the closeness of hearts,
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: “An angel for some,
author: Abhishek Kumar Singh

quote: “Then, by your definition... I'm in love with you.”
author: Angela N. Blount,

quote: “Love was indeed a big responsibility. One must use the word judiciously. One cannot love one day and take away love the next day. It is total caring.”
author: Anuradha Bhattacharyya,

quote: “She'll let you put her in her place. But she won't stand for anything worse than first.”
author: J. Raymond

quote: “Love is supposed to lift you up, not hold you down. It is supposed to push you forward, not hold you back.”
author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “...Kawan, seandainya kita bisa tahu kepada siapa kita akan berjumpa lalu jatuh cinta seperti tak ada lagi hari esok, maka beruk bisa melamar pekerjaan menjadi ajudan bupati.”
author: Andrea Hirata

quote: “The Earth must have done some noble work; that is why you were born here and not in the ocean among the fishes and not in the sky among the birds.”
author: Amit Kalantri,

quote: “You keep me here. You can't live in a world where you don't know where and what I am doing. We inside each others souls.”
author: Chimnese Davids,

quote: “Treat your relationship as if you are growing the most beautiful sacred flower. Keep watering it, tend to the roots, and always make sure the petals are full of color and are never curling. Once you neglect your plant, it will die, as will your relationship.”
author: Suzy Kassem,

quote: “Love drips like honey from the hive, constant, sweet, precious, into your heart each and every moment if you let it.”
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: “We love with all our heart but we also keep our heart light and pliable. It has space. It breathes. It waits on life to give instructions. It sings with sweetness when the winds are soft and warm. It stands with calm patience when the storm is brewing. It lets go when endings have left their irrefutable mark. It moves. It heals. It hopes.”
author: Donna Goddard

quote: “Love, deep and pure, it opens my heart. It feels like a magical force, one I’d fight to protect, one I’d die to keep.”
author: Sarah Noffke,

quote: “Life is energy and, as such, it belongs to all, reaches all, and blesses all.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “Never be afraid to love. Just be careful who you love.”
author: Carlos Wallace,

quote: “Making You Happy; Makes Me Happy.”
author: Dhiren Prajapati

quote: “Once in a while, right in the middle of an ordinary life love knocks our doors, enters our lives & changes it forever. You start believing in dreams, you start making wishes & you start to trust your heart even more! That love holds your hands & makes you feel you are safer than ever; that love makes you believe that nothing can go wrong now; and oh that warm hug, which makes you want to spend your entire life then & there!
author: Anamika Mishra,

quote: “1. Romantic: One who ruthlessly believes in love in its finest form and impresses those feelings onto his or her various relationships. May result in scaring off partners, falling for the wrong person, and desperately trying to turn life into a movie with glamorous Old Hollywood actors. May also result in some of the best, most inspiring, and deepest relationships around.”
author: Leah Konen,

quote: “Relationships are valuable no matter who they are between.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “The path is paved with consistent, conscious mental and spiritual alertness and the gradual growth of goodness in our heart and clarity in our mind. We are awake. If we keep trying to understand, we will understand. If we keep telling ourselves that we are loved by Life and if we keep looking for evidence of that love, we will find it.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “We need to maintain an awareness of our awareness, of what we are paying attention to, in order to discriminate between higher and lower forms of love.”
author: Paul O'Brien

quote: “Relationships are used by the darkness to keep people revolving around the ego’s demands. For a moment, people see the light of the divine in each other. They run to it and then quickly forget the light they once saw as their fears reclaim their consciousness. Thus begins the ongoing battle to protect one’s own ‘rights’, in case they be forgotten or betrayed. The tally of what is owed is counted, the guilt of perceived wrong doings is cast upon the other, one’s freedom must be paid as the price for ‘love’, and it is only in short periods of peace when all of this is forgotten. Those moments are the precious windows of the Soul.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “Dispensing with the frivolity, he kissed her meaningfully. When at last he pulled away, her troubled expression alarmed him. "What?"
author: Sandra Brown,

quote: “Pure Love is detached, self-assured, self-poised, non-possessive and non-aggressive in nature. Yet, it is tremendously powerful to move the whole universe.”
author: Banani Ray,

quote: “We love with all our heart, in every way that we can love but the heart is not burdened. We learn to keep it light and pliable. It has space. It breathes. It waits on Life to give instructions. It sings with sweetness when the winds are soft and warm. It stands with calm patience when the storm is brewing. It lets go when death and seeming endings have left their irrefutable mark. It moves. It heals. It hopes. It allows Life to be lived in the safe, fertile, and still inner space where it grows stronger and more compelling every day.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “But you have to have a working heart for it to break.”
author: Stephanie Garber,

quote: “Love is relentless, and so am I ;)”
author: Keisha Keenleyside

quote: “Such aching mystery hides,
author: John Mark Green,

quote: “I know surely you’re thinking of me, for
author: Zubair Ahsan,

quote: “When truth looks in the mirror, virtue looks out.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “Sometimes home is not a place, it is someone's heart.”
author: Nancy Omar

quote: “I wish to drown in my pain, alone, just like a moth dancing to its death in the flame!”
author: Nishta Kochar,

quote: “Be (with) someone that promotes a healthy state of being: mind, body, and soul.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “You can never tie a string to someone's heart to keep them from walking away; you can only love them in their freedom and hope that they choose to stay, hope that they love you back freely in the same way.”
author: Kirsten Robinson,

quote: “You are the best person in all my universes”
author: Ilsa Madden-Mills,

quote: “Learn as much as you can. Love as much as you should.”
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: “It is foolish to walk away when you have so much love in your heart.”
author: Nancy Omar

quote: “You don’t need to be a fortress to be strong. You don’t need to build walls to keep yourself safe. Open the windows and let the breeze breathe life into your bones. Go outside, touch the earth with your bare hands, and remind yourself how it feels to plant the seeds of love and watch them bloom into
author: Kirsten Robinson,

quote: “The Root
author: Christine Evangelou,

quote: “Maybe all great love stories earn themselves a thoughtless void at some point in time.”

quote: “Turn off the hate. Turn up the love.”

quote: “Shah Jahan built Taj Mahal because he was a king, I wrote a beautiful book for my wife, though I was never an Author…”

quote: “Too few see the beauty obvious to all who are near.”

quote: “Someone doesn’t always need a gun to kill you. Sometimes, their actions are enough. You don’t need an assassin to kill you. Sometimes, a lover is enough.”

quote: “There are two kinds of feeling—one from our body, another from our soul.
author: Silenus Poetry,

quote: “I couldn't make myself be cautious around her. A little voice in my head kept trying to tell me that every word she said could be disinformation and that she might be playing me for a fool. But I didn't believe it. I trusted her, even though I had every reason not to.”
author: Ernest Cline,

quote: “Da mogu, poklonio bih ti tebe. Zaslužuješ sebe. Ne kao kaznu. Kao nagradu.”
author: Tamara Kučan,

quote: “To excite my thoughts with your agony
author: Claudia Pavel,

quote: “I don't believe in love.
author: Nicola Yoon,

quote: “He was, simultaneously, the impassioned happy man lying at the feet of his beloved and also the morose clown standing in the background of the picture. Being in love pitched him, moment by moment, between waves of ecstasy and misery. Like every other person, he believed his predicament was unique.”
author: Hannah Mary Rothschild,

quote: “I am called, and I personify, the Improbability of Love. I was painted to celebrate the wild cascades of amour, the rollicking, bucking, breaking and transformative passion that inevitably gives way to miserable, constricting, overbearing disappointment. At first my master imbued every tiny brushstroke with unbound ardour, untrammelled desire and unquenchable lust. During the painting of the work he had to accept that his feelings were a mirage, a chimera in his mind. This is the great tragedy of love - even if you are lucky enough to stumble on it, it never lasts.”
author: Hannah Rothschild,

quote: “HE remembered looking "agape" in his encyclopedia volume after he read Dr. King's speech in the DEFENDER. The newspaper ran the address in full after the reverend's appearance at Cornell College. If Elwood had come across the word before, through all those years of skipping around the book, it hadn't stuck in his head. King described "agape" as a divine love operating in the heart of man. A selfless love, an incandescent love, the highest there is. He called upon his Negro audience to cultivate that pure love for their oppressors, that it might carry them to the other side of the struggle.
author: Colson Whitehead,

quote: “If ever you're possessed by love, be mindful that it's beyond your capacity and flourishes in your 'non-doing state', observe how it transforms you from within and remain a witness to it.
author: Sri Ramana Pemmaraju,

quote: “Protecting the heart is almost as painful as giving in to what it wants. I can’t do it anymore.”

quote: “I believe in love at first sight…
author: Ranata Suzuki

quote: “Sometimes it feels like even if
author: Justin Wetch,

quote: “Don't be a reflection of your depression, your dark, or your ugly. Reflect what you want. Your light, your beauty, & your strength. Aspire for greatness - reflect who you are; not which deficits you maintain. Showcase the hidden treasures.”

quote: “The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.”
author: Jay     Long

quote: “We have already said more goodbyes than are necessary. Those were goodbyes that brought about the end of partings. We taught each other that no parting is possible.”

quote: “When the sun and the moon will be identically seen together,
author: J. Sarraf

quote: “Cinta sejati adalah perbuatan. Dengan demikian,ingat baik baik, kau selalu bisa memberi tanpa sedikitpun rasa cinta. Tetapi kau tidak akan pernah bisa mencintai tanpa selalu memberi.”

quote: “People start to lie more once they start to care less.”

quote: “No matter what you think, no matter what you say, I will love you always.”

quote: “Wake up to realities! Real life is all about real things!”

quote: “When a woman wants your attention, she uses her smile. When she wants your wallet, she uses her charm. When she wants your heart, she uses her touch. When she wants your soul, she uses her kiss.”

quote: “Grief gives you a hundred reasons to cry; hope gives you a thousand reasons to smile, joy gives you a million reasons to laugh, and love gives you billion reasons to rejoice.”

quote: “If God were to make a million lovely flowers in your image and plant them in a garden with you among them, I would still know you by your scent and by the feel of your petals and by the crazy way you lean towards my light whenever I draw near.”

quote: “Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.”

quote: “I really liked him and when you really like someone, not everything is simple to understand.”

quote: “It is not possible to be seduced by the lure of ego-gratification or intimidated by the tyranny of imposters when we know that we are as the angels. We are loved beyond comprehension. So, we must claim our rightful inheritance and live with the confidence of protection.”

quote: “Love doesn't die alone - we kill it.”

quote: “We draw into our life those who will help us to grow. Naturally, we tend to have mixed feelings about those very people but they are marked for us. We have forgotten that we wrote them an invitation some time ago. We look at them as if they are intruders when all along they are our guests.”

quote: “Moments caught in time. Simple memories spread out before me. Timeless reminders of how life goes on, even when it feels as if you cannot.”

quote: “What's your source of inner peace? asked the Imam today at the Friday Prayer. I smiled wide instantly and whispered, 'Knowing that she is mine'.”

quote: “The world may be against us, but this love we have is enough to put this world beneath us.”

quote: “I love you in my bed at night, and when I wake up, and I love hearing you sing, and I love telling you to stop bothering me, and I love walking to Van’s noodle house with you, and I love you – I love you, so promise you’ll be like the ocean and come back to me, even when they pull you away. Always come back to me.”

quote: “Life is not a competition. No one has to lose for someone else to win. A true blessing blesses everyone. A fragmented love which makes others lose will eventually turn upon itself and destroy the very thing which was being so carefully guarded. An open-hearted love will follow a course which can only lead somewhere good.”

quote: “Until you experience real loneliness, you shall never know what real loneliness is. So many people feel miserable and lonely just because they ignore their inner man, create a gap between themselves and their inner man, and neglect their true self!”

quote: “Joy is God's smile; love is God's laughter.”

quote: “It was her laughter that made me love her. Her shy inappropriate madness is what made her beautiful.”

quote: “We have conversations with each other most nights - Sylvia Plath and me!”

quote: “EFFERVESCE AND OBSESSION

quote: “Love in the rain is better than hate in the sunshine.”

quote: “It takes a moment to love and be loved. Hours spent judging are a waste.”

quote: “As she looks through the window;

quote: “And so, in silence, we walked the surface of a dying world, but in the breast of one of us at least had been born that which is ever oldest, yet ever new.

And nobody knows better than I that I couldn’t have felt anything, because Tamsin was a ghost—but nobody but me knows what I felt. And I’ll always know.”

quote: “If love isn't there, nothing will grow. If it is, there is always hope and it will win in the end. Love is vital and sacrosanct.”

And worse of all, at the heart of that white hot core of anger, was another emotion so bound up with my attacker's fury that it was functionally indistinguishable from his ire:
author: Riley Rookhouse,

quote: “Love that gives birth to poetry is
author: Rathnakumar Raghunath,

quote: “Somebody should tell you that you're beautiful every time the sun comes up. Someone should tell you you're beautiful on Wednesdays. And at tea time. Someone should tell you you're beautiful on Christmas Day and Christmas Eve and the evening before Christmas Eve, and on Easter. He should tell you on Guy Fawkes Night and on New Year's, and on the eight of August, just because.”

quote: “Hükümdarlar düştü babalardan payımıza. Şanssızız cici prenses. Onlar bize gelene kadar çok başka kişilere önem verir. Ülkeleri, vezirleri, başka kralların oğulları, bir kaşının yayı güzel diye soysuz cariyeleri... hepsini çocuklarından daha çok severler. Biz babalarımız ne derse yaparız. Savaşırız, ölürüz, satılırız ve bür gün tahta geçmek için kardeşlerimizi keseriz. Mesele biz değiliz. Mesele hiçbir zaman biz olmadık.”

quote: “THERE IS NO LOVE, AFTER MY LOVE. The two meanings of this inscription are: He will never love anybody else, and secondly, I will never forget his love for me.”

quote: “You cannot deny your fate, but being in the power of love, you can save your life. Faith and love alone can bring you out of the darkness. Also, you have nothing in this galaxy but your life and your love for someone. This power is strengthening you to continue the lost path.”

quote: “Loving someone unconditionally is saying I have no idea what’s going to happen. I have no idea where this life is going to take us. You’ll change in certain ways because change is inevitable. You won’t always be the person you were the day I met you. You’re going to make mistakes and so am I. It’s a promise that no matter what happens, no matter how many times the world gets in the way, I will choose you.”

quote: “Loves seeds unseen a floating world... that fadeth not away

quote: “Book after book, you made love your protagonist, your antagonist. Because what else is worth bleeding on the page for? What else is worth breathing for, dying for, or even justifying the occasional pyromania for? Love. That's the only string that weaves your world into coherence.”

quote: “He was beautiful. No, handsome. Crylonian people call men handsome and not beautiful, she corrected herself. The word was harsh - it felt like she should grab pieces that could contain him. She always disagreed. Beautiful was more ethereal. It reminded her of light and sun, something you couldn’t quite grasp or hold on to, nothing you could explain but just feel. He was like that. Beautiful.”

quote: “Sometimes science isn't enough. Sometimes you need the poets," he says, and it's in this moment, this exact moment, that I fall in love with him again.”

quote: “Someone is standing next to him, and as I near them and focus on the man, I’m left speechless. It's like he stepped off the pages of a men's fitness magazine, with muscle in places I didn't think muscle existed. His muscles have muscles. He's not terribly tall, but that's okay. Neither am I. But he's fit and tan and rippled gorgeousness. He stands out in this place that’s usually filled with space nerds or kids on field trips. I am immediately curious why he's here and why Richard is smiling awkwardly.”

Even unknowingly, we diminish ourselves little by little to feel more loved. As girls, we don’t need to diminish ourselves when we’re together, we fit in every sense of the word. It doesn’t matter if we’re bruised, bloody, or empty, we become these things together—we fit.”

Con suerte recobraré el sentido cuando sus labios se separen de los míos, pienso.”

Tell me what scares you and what your deepest desires are. I want it all, all of your mind and all of your thoughts, give it all to me and only me…because I don't think I can breathe without it anymore.”

Everything is on this track, and everything being/consciousness/bliss, whether it "knows" itself as such or not. But the soul which awakens and finds itself in the dance: that soul has won the bet.”

quote: “I was good at expressing my ambitions and my desires, my anger, and my joy, but despite that, I failed at expressing my loneliness. I always stood up for what I believed in. But I also wanted to be loved, and the sad truth is that, sometimes, if you are too independent, people believe you don’t need love. You have to pay the price for your independence. You can be right, but being right when you have no one on your side isn’t actually a win.”

Nature accepts and loves us, just as we are, in each passing moment of this breath. Open your heart, fall into her loving embrace. Walk through the passageway of your increasingly expansive heart.”

quote: “You know the sensation you get when you like someone? A simple smile will turn your legs into jelly, a touch will send butterflies fluttering around in your stomach, and your heart begins to race. Your words also become a jumbled mess around them.”

quote: “It was a casual, domestic scene. Nothing extraordinary. Yet it triggered a longing so fierce and unexpected I had to turn away. I firmly believed people didn't need a significant other to be happy. If someone wanted to be in a relationship, great. If they didn't, also great. The same went for children, marriage, etc. There were no universal barometers for happiness. A person's life could be just as fulfilling without a romantic partner as it was with one. But there were times, like now, when I yearned to experience that kind of unconditional love. To have someone care for me through the good, the bad, and the inevitable mistakes I made. What would it be like to be loved so deeply by someone that I wouldn't have to worry about every little move possibly driving them away?”
author: Ana Huang,

quote: “Ik hou van hem. Ik hou nog steeds van hem, en ik zal dat altijd blijven doen. Hij was een grote golf die een heleboel afdrukken op mijn leven heeft nagelaten, en tot mijn dood zal ik het gewicht van die liefde voelen. Dat heb ik aanvaard”

quote: “Kindness is the thing I ask now

quote: “Honey, a life without love isn’t a life worth living. Besides, you don’t get to choose whether or not you love someone. If only. How much easier would life be if we could just make that choice? Love… it doesn’t listen to reason.”
