author: Meghan Quinn,

quote: “No one, single individual should ever be responsible for someone else’s happiness. Your happiness is all dependent on you, no one else. Being with someone is not going to bring me happiness. Even if it’s the right person.”
author: Meghan Quinn,

quote: “there are only a few people in this lifetime that you can have a special connection with—don’t waste it because you’re nervous about what your friend might think. See where it goes, then broach the subject later with her if . . . let’s say this connection goes any further than tonight.”
author: Meghan Quinn,

quote: “Todo pensamiento racional desaparece cuando noto que un escalofrío me recorre la espina dorsal. Y solo siento eso cuando sé que cierta persona me está mirando fijamente.”
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “Because he won’t have to try to not sleep with anyone else . . . he will love me so much that the thought of sleeping with another would turn his stomach. Because that’s what love is. Putting another person above all else. Giving yourself over”
author: T.L. Swan,

quote: “Because he won’t have to try to not sleep with anyone else . . . he will love me so much that the thought of sleeping with another would turn his stomach. Because that’s what love is. Putting another person above all else. Giving yourself over to them completely. Trusting your heart with the woman you love.”
author: T.L. Swan,

quote: “But one day, you will have to give control over to someone. The only decision you have to make now is . . . Is this particular girl going to be the one you trust with your heart, or is she going to be the one who got away?”
author: T.L. Swan,

quote: “—¡¿No has visto El rey león?! (…) ¿lo ves? Eres un poco rarita.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Buenas noches, Ross —le dije yendo a la puerta.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Si lo es. Yo te veo... simpático.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Mushu —reflexionó en voz alta —La gente de tu clase no era muy original.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Todos cometemos errores, Brooke. Forma parte de nuestra naturaleza.”
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—No me extraña que te cueste tanto confiar en la gente. Si tu primer amor te trató así.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “I could see the pride in his eyes, directed solely at me, and for some reason it felt like I'd been waiting to see that look for my entire life”
author: Lily Mayne,

quote: “—Ginger, dime dónde estamos justo ahora.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “—Cuando me tomo eso después de un episodio, no recuerdo casi nada de lo que ha pasado.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Jared, cariño, eres un maldito acertijo digno de Indiana Jones y Lara Croft unidos.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Pensé que querrías irte con tu familia.
author: Joana Marcús

quote: “Durante lo que parece una eternidad, ninguno de los dos mueve un músculo. De hecho, lo único que puedo sentir es que se me llenan los ojos de lágrimas. El entreabre los labios y me repasa con la mirada, casi como si no pudiera creerse que esté aquí.”
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—¿Tienes auriculares?
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “Because of you is the best reason I know.”
author: Serena Bell,

quote: “You are my greatest weakness—not my true name, or my compulsion I can be put under. But you are the one I gladly carry”
author: Lily Mayne

quote: “Love...was pain and grief sought, accepted, endured.”
author: Robert Galbraith,

quote: “El problema era que no podía dejar de mirarla (...) lo efímero de aquel momento. Ginger y yo bajo la luna que se reflejaba en el agua brillante y en el destello de las luces de la ciudad. Sencillamente, hablando. Conociéndonos. Observándonos. Tocándonos sin hacerlo”
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “Alargué mi mano hacia ella.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “↑ top
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “De: Rhys Baker.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “—Vale. No te haré esperar más. (...) Es una canción.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “—Hay muchos tipos de vértigo.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “Mientras la besaba, olvidé que estaba a más de cien metros del suelo, olvidé que me daban miedo las alturas y olvidé que se suponía que aquello no tenía que pasar.”
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “No solo somos lo que hacemos, sino también lo que no hacemos. Somos lo que decimos, casi tanto como lo que callamos. Somos las preguntas que no nos atrevemos a pronunciar, en la misma medida que esas respuestas que nunca llegarán y permanecerán eternamente flotando entre remolinos de miedo e incertidumbre. Somos la sutilidad de una mirada, la intimidad de una caricia suave, la curva de una sonrisa sincera. Somos momentos bonitos, instantes agridulces, noches tristes. Somos detalles. Somos reales.
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “—Creo que sí hay diferencias entre Aegan y yo, al menos una —comentó en cuanto se detuvo en algún punto de la sala no tan cercano a mí.
author: Alex Mírez,

quote: “—Entonces no te sorprendas si de repente a mí se me antoja besarte, ya sabes, sin una razón.”
author: Alex Mírez,

quote: “—¿Nunca has besado a nadie? (…)
author: Violeta Boyd,

quote: “—Aaron (…) Es tarde, y no tienes que hacer esto. Ya me has indicado la dirección correcta. Ahora, puedes irte. —Señalé la puerta—. Gracias.
author: Elena  Armas,

quote: “—Nunca has necesitado a nadie para librar tus batallas, Catalina. Esa es una de las cosas que más respeto de ti.”
author: Elena  Armas,

quote: “—Siempre encuentras la manera de atraparme completamente desprevenido. Y eso no es algo que mucha gente pueda hacer.”
author: Elena  Armas,

quote: “—¿No deberías ir con los demás? —le pregunto en voz baja.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Cuando hablas de lo que te gusta, se te iluminan los ojos —dice, sonriendo de lado.
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—iNo...! —noto que se me encienden las mejillas—. ¿Por qué tienes que ser tan directo siempre?
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “—Gracias por venir —murmuro—. Sé que tenías ensayo y...
author: Joana Marcús,

quote: “As leaders, sometimes we have to be willing to be temporarily disliked in order to be permanently loved.”
author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith  Jr

quote: “That feeling just before my eyes feast on yours”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “We die by loving something that the world created.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Defective souls have an uncanny way of finding each other. They have built-in homing beacons that light up whenever they come close to another soul whose wavelength closely matches their own. The act of coming too close will inadvertently sear them together.”
author: Elice Nange,

quote: “Lovers make their own moral universe”
author: Woody Allen

quote: “But that's how it always is, isn't it? Someone becoming important doesn't happen all at once. They seep in. It's nature. It always takes a small seed to grow something profound.”
author: Jeanine Bennedict,

quote: “A fantasy so fragile that all I taste is air when we kiss.”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “I wanted her to keep me forever.”
author: Ella Maise,

quote: “Force Field. The place where you are safe. You are loved. You are free!”
author: K. U. Grudowski,

quote: “If Death were to decide it wanted to take my immortal life right now, I would sell my soul for one more minute of this. I'd go to hell for just a few more seconds of heaven”
author: Rylee Hale,

quote: “Change is beautiful inside a kind of world made out of constant”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “My head was a stage wrapped in a curtain of black velvet, and on the stage stood a single actress, named Naomi.”
author: Jun'ichirō Tanizaki,

quote: “She was everything I had ever wanted to be and so much more. What with her sparkly eyes and animated, gesticulated hands, her beautiful blonde hair cascading down gracefully like silk and her eyes so electric and cheeks the colour of rose. Vivacious and vibrant though she was in her innate talent at being able to hold a conversation with anyone, she loved and prized being alone paramount to being besieged.”
author: Aliza S.,

quote: “The gravitational pull of love has a sense of urgency that cannot be rebuffed.”
author: Rita A. Gordon,

quote: “I have to believe he'll keep making it better, and that, even if he stopped, I'd still be okay.”
author: Ellie K. Wilde,

quote: “Who’s gonna put that smile on your face when you’re not with me anymore?”
author: Santino Hassell,

quote: “Want To Do Yourself A Favor?
author: Frank D. Prestia

quote: “People want to love. It's more important to them than being loved.”
author: Lena Andersson,

quote: “Love is in the action. Not the words, not the promises; love is in the action.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “A father's greatest gift to his children is choosing to love their mother during the worst of times, not just the best.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “I have fallen so hard and so completely, and I promise with every ounce of strength in this body that I’ll never—never let you go." - Hamilton H. Hamilton”
author: Asiah Bosier,

quote: “You truly are the sun — And I'll never look away from the emittance of your brilliant rays." - Demiesius Titus”
author: Asiah Bosier,

quote: “It survives if true to itself. It lingers if real. It hopes if there is no hope. It lives beyond death.”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “What is your heart's combination?”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “When I see you, I'll know.”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “I will not settle for a diluted version of love.”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “When you say my name I hear what love is supposed to sound like.”
author: Hadinet Tekie

quote: “I Am Not Addicted To Love, However Love Is Addicted To Me, Sex.”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “We die daily by trying to love something that the world created.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “I hate that phrase, perfect for each other, People aren't perfect for each other. They're messy and rough-edged, they make things more complicated for each other. Hanna and I are..." I take a deep breath. "We're best friends. Or we were. I thought maybe we were soul mates. And then when it turned out that we... We weren't perfect for each other, but we were definitely good for each other.”
author: Serena Bell,

quote: “Some people were only meant to be a part of one aspect of your journey. If you can't take them with you into the next phase of your life, then it's ok. They have served their purpose.”
author: Keisha Blair,

quote: “Like, while I was with them, I was so sure it was love. But my pawpaw used to say that it's not love if it doesn't hurt when it ends”
author: Jeanine Bennedict,

quote: “Something magical happens when two soulful people meet.”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “You are not alone. God is preparing a kheer pudding kind of a relationship, you will look at your future boy friend's eyes and he knows what you need with out saying a word.”
author: Naga Uma Veguru

quote: “Never let your imperfections define you, for you are perfectly loved by God.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “Every season
author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quote: “Why does this word come on your tongue? without thinking about it. If you are calling your partner "babe," then you are treating your relationship by following social trends, not your heart.”
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “There is a huge difference between BEAUTIFUL HUMAN & DECORATIVE PIECE
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “Wear love and you will shine”
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “The first thing I need in the morning it's you, because as I wake up I need to feed my hungry soul”
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “silence kills more relations than fight”
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “AN INCOMPLETE PORTRAIT OF OUR LOVE
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “In this world of hatred, God is love.”
author: Chris Chacko

quote: “You are a delight in the throes of passion, did you know that? I could watch you all day.”
author: Sarah Honey,

quote: “Life without love is like a symphony without harmony, a canvas without color, a garden without fragrance.”
author: Yahia El Haroui

quote: “God's love isn't given to us to change him; it's given so that we can change through him.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “Though lovers be lost, love shall not”
author: Dylan Thomas,

quote: “We men are strange beasts. Love us and we run from you. Leave us, and you’re never far from our thoughts.”
author: Damyanti Biswas,

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “I was at an apsis, far from her. I didn’t even know she existed.
author: Udayakumar DS,

quote: “I'm always where love is.”
author: Robin S. Baker

quote: “Stay connected to all that nurtures your Soul, and release into the mystical stormy waters all that has served its place. We are here to be loved and absolutely nothing less. Go ahead and walk into the waters of your Soul knowing that the only certainty in life is in miracles. We are a miracle.”
author: Ulonda Faye,

quote: “Your sensuality is your husband... who is playing the part of the person you think and believe you are in love with.”
author: Lebo Grand

quote: “I’m not with me tonight.
author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quote: “I used to think I couldn't go a day without your smile. Without telling you things and hearing your voice back.
author: Ealroy john vj

quote: “i looked over at you, wondering how i could begin to describe you. but my smile was so consuming that all i could see were the tops of my cheeks. and the fact that you could literally blind me with happiness was a perfect representation of the kind of effect you have on people.”
author: Ealroy john vj

quote: “forever
author: Ealroy john vj

quote: “Because in English we have a saying: home is where the heart is. YOu have my heart, Nico. You are my home. So, if the man I love is in Paris, then there's nowhere else I'd rather be”
author: Olivia Spring,

quote: “What attracted you to the other person in the past, how did that person treat you in the past, how compatible were you in the past? It's the same questions in the present, except that a physical longing for the other person is added. The desire to touch and hold and kiss. And if all of the answers make you feel like you never want to be with anyone else, then it's probably love”
author: Nicholas Sparks,

quote: “Que la vida se mide en besos: los que se quedan esperando y los que se dan y son eternos.”
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “I'm going to kill you," he gritted out, little more than a growl. "If you say another word about the woman I love, if you look at her, if you even think about her-I'm going to fucking kill you.”
author: Ali Hazelwood,

quote: “What else is loneliness but a lower smoking on a ledge near a bed that always smells of then?”
author: K. Eltinaé,

quote: “I asked the universe to teach me how to love and I was sent you.
author: Starr

quote: “Ah o amor... que nasce não sei onde, vem não sei como, e dói não sei porquê.”
author: Luís de Camões

quote: “To lovers out there ….
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “It was frightening. Frightening, how goof this felt. How easy it would be to never stop. To let time stretch and unbend, forget about everything else, and simply stay in this moment forever.”
author: Ali Hazelwood

quote: “We know how this ends for both of us, but I don't wanna look back on any moment thinking we straight wasted it.”
author: Adam Silvera,

quote: “She had to laugh then, and he laughed because she did.”
author: Sally Rooney,

quote: “Multiple times he has tried writing his thoughts about Marianne down on paper in an effort to make sense of them. He's moved by a desire to describe in words exactly how she looks and speaks. Her hair and clothing. The copy of Swann's Way she reads at lunchtime in the school cafeteria, with a dark French painting on the cover and a mint-colored spine. Her long fingers turning the pages.”
author: Sally Rooney,

quote: “If you think you are too far gone for God, then you don't understand how far His love goes.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “अगर मैंने तुम्हें मुआफ़ कर दिया, तो मैं तुम्हें भूल जाऊँगा।”
author: Tripurari Kumar Sharma,

quote: “I love you, man. I want you to know that. Straight up, no bullshit. I love you. I’m just fucking crazy in love with you. Smack dab, wham, bam, thank you ma’am, fucking so in love with you. You know that, right?”
author: Nick Wilgus,

quote: “All I know is that my life started to make sense when I met you.”
author: Miranda Bueno,

quote: “When you are in pain and don’t know what to do - I highly recommend having some pancakes”
author: Guru Z.S. Gill

quote: “Your proof of love is measured by your tireless contribution to the priorities of the one you claim you love.”
author: Gabriel Ladokun

quote: “¿De dónde vienen los celos, sino de la inseguridad de pensar que te perderé por su culpa? Pero las cosas no funcionan así , y tanto de la cantidad de gente que lo crea. Tú no eres un objeto que ha de ser conquistado y conservado, y el amor no es un recurso escaso por el que haya que pelearse. El amor puede ser infinito, tanto como sea capaz de abrirse tu corazón.”
author: Xiran Jay Zhao,

quote: “Kindness can save.
author: Gillian Duce,

quote: “The world says you will never be enough, but God calls you by your name. ”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “When someone has gifted you with one act of love
author: Mya Robarts,

quote: “When someone has gifted you with one act of love after another, it’s only fair to ignore their bad moods and concentrate
author: Mya Robarts,

quote: “Love is a wild, complex feeling that can’t be tamed using the whip of what is right and what is not.”
author: Mya Robarts,

quote: “I know. They never let you be famous and happy" He lifted an eyebrow. "I'll tell you a secret."
author: Madeline Miller,

quote: “Although she didn't know it at the time, she was already so deeply in love, there was no way out again”
author: Alex Michaelides,

quote: “I spent a lot of time in the past year trying to work out the trick of writing a true story about love.
author: Jeanette LeBlanc

quote: “Lovers are the best and worst kind of thieves, you know.
author: Jeanette LeBlanc

quote: “Too much love for someone gives you too much pain too.”
author: Garima Soni - words world

quote: “It is said that there are only three things you need to be truly happy in this world: the people you love, the things you do, and the things you hope for. What if that something you do is to hope for the happiness of the person you love?”
author: Rifa Coolheart

quote: “Tell you what? Never love someone expecting them to return your love. That doesn't happen in reality. Love is innocent and pristine; it just happens; you cannot choose whom to love. It doesn't matter if they don't love you; nonetheless, you must at least express your feelings to them in order for both of you to be happy.”
author: Rifa Coolheart

quote: “The man of your dreams is not somebody who is handsome, talkative, attractive in words, free spirited. He is somebody who does not utter a word that he loves you. He loves you silently. He takes care of you, protects you, caresses you. He nurtures you. He treats you like a woman.”
author: Naga Uma Veguru

quote: “The truest form of beauty lies within us, emanating from the depths of our souls and shining through our eyes. It is not something that can be purchased or attained through physical means, but rather it is a reflection of how we feel on the inside. When we are happy, content, and at peace with ourselves, that inner beauty radiates outwards, illuminating our entire being. It is a beacon of light, drawing others in and making them feel the same sense of warmth and joy. It is in these moments that we truly radiate beauty, and we become a shining example for others to follow.”
author: Yahia El Haroui

quote: “I'm in love with her determination and her commitment, her soft side, the way she manages to tell me exactly how she's feeling and why, no matter how uncomfortable it might make her at first.
author: Hannah  Grace,

quote: “Some people are ridiculous, especially when it comes to love.”
author: Holly Black,

quote: “My only mistake
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “There’s a beauty to falling. A jump. A rush. A breeze. You could be falling to your death if the ground below comes too quickly. But it’s exhilarating—the fall. So we chase it.
author: Sarah Darlington,

quote: “My end is a curve of infinite love - a way of suffering while feeling deeply loved.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “The entire world is breakable, you only feel that once you fall in love with something in it.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “He loves me , he loves me not , we are taught to say , as we tear the flower away from its flowerness. To arrive at love , then, is to arrive through obliteration. Eviscerate me , we mean to say , and ill tell you the truth.”
author: Ocean Vuong,

quote: “Your soulmate never makes you chase them; they might challenge your idleness and lack of initiative, but they never play games with you. You never really count who contributes more in a soulmate relationship. The giving process happens naturally and intuitively, balanced on both sides.This creates abundance and there is never any scarcity in the relationship.
author: R.P. Heaven,

quote: “I'm like a butterfly that you held on to too tight
author: Sharnice Miles,

quote: “I'm like a butterfly that you held on to too tight
author: Sharnice Miles,

quote: “You are the one who does the denying, love. Not me. There is nothing I would deny you. Nothing I wouldn't give you.”
author: Ellie Owen,

quote: “To spend a day inside her mind and roam throughout the fields, practice rooms, and ball pits of her imagination would be one of my exclusive Genie wishes.”
author: B.A. McRae,

quote: “I spun in circles, jumped on furniture, and tried not to raise my voice too much but added a lot of silly voices and emphasis. All for the woman I love, to see that glistening smile, those darling dimples that best me every time.”
author: B.A. McRae,

quote: “Cinta tidak boleh berhenti pada satu orang.”
author: Eki Saputra,

quote: “Look up to the sky my love ,
author: Ofer Cohen

quote: “With ego and supremacy, we are nothing. With love and forgiveness, we are the entire universe.”
author: Hiral Nagda

quote: “In Love, I Don't Prefer Affairs And In Hate, I Don't Prefer Relationships.”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Love doesn't sit in a bank account; relationships are life's true wealth.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “Be thankful for the little things that bring joy, hope and love.”
author: Surajit Roy

quote: “Love all, trust few, harm none. Live life to its fullest with kindness & respect.”
author: Surajit Roy,

quote: “Loving teaches us to appreciate, accept & show care. It's a powerful tool to learn & grow.”
author: Surajit Roy

quote: “Love is friendship that burns brightly with passion and devotion.”
author: Surajit Roy

quote: “This life is futile, what really counts is to love you show to others and the happiness you share together.”
author: Ojingiri Hannah

quote: “The love you show to others have a way of coming back to you.”
author: Ojingiri Hannah

quote: “Lot of people think that their partner change after sex or making love. But most of the time and the reality is .It is them who have changed first. After sex, they gain some type of entitlement. They develop You owe me attitude, or you need to love me more attitude. That attitude and behavior is the one that is pushing their partners away.  Not because they already got some from them. It is how they are talking, behaving, and treating their partner after lovemaking. Some are not that they have changed. It is just after sex you are monitoring them, and you start to see things that you didn’t notice before because you were not paying attention from the start. ”
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “I never want to be stationary again, I will never plant roots in a person, unless I can physically feel them breaking through the dirt and implanting deep within.
author: Starr

quote: “If I hadn't known you, I wouldn't have known love. The moment you touched my heart, it became a poet.
author: Zaixhah

quote: “Welcome to my heart where I notice your extended stay in my head… I believe you are here to build something in me for a better me.”
author: Jerm Davitos

quote: “Why do I need the other half of the heart to fulfill my heart when I can stand up for myself with the only half I have”
author: Pronlapin Tossawatvanit

quote: “New Year's resolutions will only truly fulfil us when we resolve to open our hearts anew to the presence of God's everlasting love.”
author: Allene vanOirschot,

quote: “Forgetting someone you once loved:
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “In diesem Moment verflogen die Rachegelüste aus meinen Gedanken und das Einzige, was zählte, war sie.”
author: Spencer Hill, Krieg zwischen den Welten - Das zweite Gesicht

quote: “Wieder einmal erkannte ich, dass ihr freundliches Äußeres, keineswegs bedeutete, dass sie schwach war. Im Gegenteil, man bekam es mit dem Fürchten zu tun, wenn ihre liebe Seite verschwand.”
author: Spencer Hill, Krieg zwischen den Welten - Das zweite Gesicht

quote: “Ich verfügte nicht über die Zeit, um uns beide in Sicherheit zu bringen und wenn ich also eine Entscheidung treffen musste, so entschied ich mich ohne Umschweife für ihn. In diesem Moment kämpfte ich nicht für die Freiheit, denn diese hatte ich bereits verloren. Ich kämpfte für die Liebe.”
author: Spencer Hill, Krieg zwischen den Welten - Das zweite Gesicht

quote: “Ich kannte diesen Mann gerade mal einen Wimpernschlag meines Lebens und doch war heute Abend sein Leben, das einzige, dem Bedeutung innewohnte.”
author: Spencer Hill, Krieg zwischen den Welten – Das zweite Gesicht

quote: “Vertrauen war ein schmaler Weg zwischen Enttäuschung und Verrat. Es war schwer, solch eine Verbindung einzugehen. Wenn doch, dauerte es Jahre. Doch mit ihm … mit ihm war es leicht.”
author: Spencer Hill, Krieg zwischen den Welten – Das zweite Gesicht

quote: “The word love is nothing unless we make it more thank just a word and to do that, we can’t have fear because when you are in love you will truly know it damn well.”
author: Rifa Coolheart

quote: “Being in love makes you crazy, It's not the feeling but the thoughts around it. How you behave, thinking of every single action more than one time, trying to find hidden meanings in random words or happenings. Being in love is undeniably linked to overthinking.”
author: Rifa Coolheart

quote: “If you have a true lover who treats you well from the bottom of his heart. Slogans like "I love you" are not necessary. What matters is how he cares for you during daily life.”
author: Rifa Coolheart

quote: “Love has neither aversion to pain nor attraction to bliss. Love is just fully itself in both.”
author: John de Ruiter

quote: “Love will thrive in any environment.”
author: John de Ruiter

quote: “It is tenderness that is the real you. All of the rest is just packaging.”
author: John de Ruiter

quote: “But I’ve looked devil in the eye and
author: Samiha Totanji

quote: “But I’ve looked devil in the eye and
author: Samiha Totanji

quote: “Forgetting someone you once loved:
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Love your neighbor as yourself not because you benefit from them but because you care enough for others as you care for yourself.”
author: Ojingiri Hannah

quote: “For each moment I am apart from you, I will feel your presence in my heart. Let me whisper you one more time, "I Love you". My love for you is timeless and infinite, a journey without end.”
author: Rolf van der Wind

quote: “Dear Daughter,
author: Gift Gugu Mona,

quote: “Life without 'f' becomes a lie. That 'f' is the feeling of love and being loved.”
author: ASFM Flayman

quote: “Political love;

Your friends will not cause they benefit you'll endup alone I mean they'll live you friend I tell you this cause I love you and cares about you as God does,how long you'll cry the same tears?”

quote: “Never stop being nice, never get tired of being a good person whose heart is good, big and warm. I personally know that it truly sucks being taken advantage of and feeling like it's better to be cold-hearted than warm-hearted sometimes. However, I would like to also remind you that people like you are the very reason why this world has hope, so always be as good as you are, and never as bad as they are. Remember that you are the better and bigger person, don't play in the devils arena as God isn't standing in his corner.”

quote: “We spring from one great tree of life so when our actions are rooted in peace and love, we all thrive. The moment that we begin to feel superior to another, our roots weaken and we start to lose our humanity. Let us not be afraid to face fear with love.

quote: “When he touched my hand for the ﬁrst time, it was like a piece of my heart went to him. And I'm afraid if we keep going, he’s going to collect all the pieces.”

quote: “That’s not baggage. It’s not acceptable to call your illnesses baggage.”

quote: “Apparently, it wasn't every day there was such a spectacle in the Louvre. Funny, I thought the Mona Lisa would have brought it out in them. It sure did in me.”

quote: “Usually there was a sense of warning like I needed to ﬂee, a primal part of me always subconsciously knowing I wasn’t safe, that I did indeed need to guard myself and my emotions. But here in his arms I felt like none of those demons could reach me, like I was ﬁnally able to indulge in the warm sun after an extensive stay in the dark, cold underground.”

quote: “He would have gladly given her anything she named, but he was completely certain all she wanted was him.”

quote: “He looked at her, witnessing all the disbelief written across her face. He loathed what was written there. Every unspoken word struck him with an ache.”
author: Brooke Gilbert,

quote: “Soulmates don’t come to us as we expect them to. They don’t come in the package we expect, they don’t come the way we expect, and they certainly don’t come when we expect.”

quote: “It was like I was sick with a new disorder and the diagnosis was Colin.”

quote: “He not only completed me, but he showed me how to complete myself.”

Fingers forever writing your name in ash, in sand, over and over in a love-patterned wasteland.”

quote: “Bagian terbaik dari jatuh cinta adalah perasaan itu sendiri. Kamu pernah merasakan rasa sukanya, sesuatu yang sulit dilukiskan kuas sang pelukis, sulit disulam menjadi puisi oleh pujangga, tidak bisa dijelaskan oleh mesin paling canggih sekalipun. Bagian terbaik dari jatuh cinta bukan tentang memiliki. Jadi, kenapa kamu sakit hati setelahnya? Kecewa? Marah? Benci? Cemburu? Jangan-jangan karena kamu tidak perna paham betapa indahnya jatuh cinta.”

quote: “I want to chase you, find you. I want to be eluded and teased and adored; I want to be defeated and victorious - I want you to cut me, sharpen me. I want to drink tea beside you in ten years or a thousand. Flowers grow far away on a planet they'll call Cephalus, and these flowers bloom once a century, when the living star and its black-hole binary enter conjunction. I want to fix you a bouquet of them, gathered across eight hundred thousand years, so you can draw our whole engagement in a single breath, all the ages we've shaped together.”
author: Amal El-Mohtar & Max Gladstone

quote: “In her anniversary card, Daisy wrote: If they say we don't exist, that they can't see us anywhere except rotten corners, in perverse bodies, how come I can see you and hold you and you're holy; how come I can love you and home you and you're there, in flesh, in my mind, in my blood; how come I keep waking up in this love and feel rested? What else to do now then, when a love like this finds you? What else but praise? What else but dance?”

quote: “He came back from France when Tom and Daisy were still on their wedding trip, and made a miserable but irresistible journey to Louisville on the last of his army pay. He stayed there a week, walking the streets where their footsteps had clicked together through the November night and revisiting the out-of-the-way places to which they had driven in her white car. Just as Daisy's house had always seemed to him more mysterious and gay than other houses so his idea of the city itself, even though she was gone from it, was pervaded with a melancholy beauty.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,

quote: “Diversity is the mix.

quote: “I didn't expect this day was like this. I should be there with u now but I can't n just d thing I can only do is praying god to keep u happy n healthy my love. Every year, I used to wish u a happy birthday at 12 am. But, I lost that chance today. Anyways I wish my sweet heart always be active like deer, lovable like dog, cute like our babies, clever like fox, daring like lion, pure like dove, handsome like harry potter, creative like dolphin, romantic like love birds, being with me like my heart. Ur gonna be such responsible n challenging husband in our life. I wish all the happiness, joy n love to u. We will travel with what we face struggles or sufferings whatever it may be, But only together I promise u. This promise is d the only one gift I can give u many more times throughout our life my dear platinum. Finally, my words are waiting to wish u a many more happy returns of the day”

quote: “Try to fix someone you love and you're likely to break them worse... fix yourself first.”
author: Marc Arginteanu

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Some people will only appreciate your love when you finally let go and don’t allow them to take your love for granted anymore!”
author: Lily Amis

quote: “She wasn't looking for a man that nobly beat his chest and proclaimed, "I would die for you!", in fact, she wasn't looking for anyone. She was content in waiting for a man that said, "l will live for you", then proved it. One is a once in a lifetime event. The other is a lifetime event”
author: Lee Goff,

quote: “A raindrop glistened
author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quote: “...Love is a verb—it's an action. Can you tell me what he did to show you he loved you? Anyone can say the words, but they need to prove it.”
author: Corinne Michaels,

quote: “Love.
author: Annie Chopra,

quote: “His affection, his words, his belief were just... too much. They were too everything.
author: Mariana Zapata,

quote: “You have made me whole and complete, fixed a brokenness I didn't think possible.”
author: Lynda Wolters,

quote: “Love follows you. It goes where you go. It doesn't know about social divides or distance or common sense. It doesn't even stop when the person you love dies. It does what it wants.”
author: Abby Jimenez,

quote: “Often, we fabricate the people we love to make loving them more palatable; the fictionalized version of them reduces the awareness of truth.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1989

quote: “And when I say I love you,
author: Belle Townsend,

quote: “ഞാൻ അവളെ വെയിൽ വെളിച്ചത്തിന്റെ ഉടുപുടവ അണിയിച്ചു. പൂക്കളുടെ സൗന്ദര്യവും സുഗന്ധവും കൊടുത്തു. ആകാശനീലിമയിലൂടെയും വനാന്തരംഗത്തിലെ ഹരിതദലമർമ്മരങ്ങളിലൂടെയും അവളുമായി സംവദിച്ചു. കിളികൾ
author: N. Mohanan,

quote: “Did you wake up and see someone you loved? Isn't that enough, to love and be loved?”
author: Annie Chopra,

quote: “Don't just surround yourself with love. Give love. Feel love. Spread love. Be love.”
author: Annie Chopra

quote: “Love is like a fart...If you have to force it … its probably shit...”
author: Bhushan Mahadani

quote: “When in love with someone, they must be your priority and paramount concern in life; and there should always be reciprocation; any other scenario creates a relationship molded with anxiety.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1980

quote: “With the ladder of intellect, one cannot reach the door of love.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin

quote: “And without realizing it, I have become what he needs, not what I need, and now I'm in love with him...[and] I'm not his beloved.”
author: Lynda Wolters,

quote: “Es gibt Menschen die in ihren Herzen so kalt sind, dass sie Dörfer niederbrennen nur wegen der Wärme.”
author: I Dont Remember

quote: “We didn’t know how to be horrible to each other. But looking back, not even knowing how to be horrible to each other—that unawareness—was the most horrible part.We had been politely covering each other’s eyes. In the end, I took my hand off his eyes first, and we split up cleanly. That farewell proved there was no love left between us because the last moment of lovers was never supposed to be so clean. We had simply moved from one dot to
author: Choi Eunyoung,

quote: “Fiery passion and intimacy are never sustained without deep love; the kind of love that makes your skin tingle when you smell her hair.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1983

quote: “I feel love, but I also feel our history, years and years of choosing him, the good, the bad, highs and lows. Choosing to love. Not despite the flaws. Because of them. Because the mistakes prove we were together long enough to make them.”
author: Caroline George,

quote: “Some will touch your heart; some will touch your soul. If you are ever fortunate enough to have someone that touches both, you would be a fool to let them go!”
author: Gautam Bharthry

quote: “Veracious love is not coming together of two souls, but it is one incomplete soul finding its other half to live a complete life.”
author: Gautam Bharthry

quote: “love is of the body; not the body but of the body. Ah! the misery that would be saved if we confessed that! Ah! for a little directness to liberate the soul!”
author: E M Forster,

quote: “love is of the body; not the body, but of the body. Ah! the misery that would be saved if we confessed that! Ah! for a little directness to liberate the soul!”
author: E M Forster,

quote: “Hearts are as fragile as glass. They break into a million pieces. If you are afraid of falling, then you shouldn’t sit too close to the edge because there could be someone waiting for you to fall into a trap!”
author: Gautam Bharthry

quote: “Singing those songs together with a car full of friends to humming the same ones alone in my car - I’ve seen the world turn around and I terribly miss those days.”
author: Kartikay Shastri

quote: “Remember when your heart is empty, don’t fill it with lies and deception.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1985

quote: “An empty heart eats lies.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1985

quote: “Loving yourself is one of the most essential things you can do in life since it has an impact on the things you attract into your life. Every decision you make will be influenced by that.”
author: Sarah Khalil A.A.,

quote: “And that was when he realised that Daphne had been right. His love hadn't been a thunderbolt from the sky. It had started with a smile, a word, a teasing glance. Every second he had spent in her presence it had grown, until he'd reached this moment, and he suddenly knew.”
author: julia quinn, romancing mr. bridgerton

quote: “One day a ship comes to your port. You do not ask why you came, where did you come from, how did you come, will you stay in the port because it is the ship you are waiting for, it is the ship that has come for you; it's like you've known the ship for years!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “It was never worth worrying about someone you didn’t love. And it wasn’t love if you didn’t worry.”
author: Gabrielle Zevin,

quote: “Beyond life, beyond death. My love for thee is eternal."
author: Kerri Maniscalco,

quote: “Love is the choice of creating sandcastles even if you knew it'll be washed away by the sea. It's the pursuit of building something so fragile because it makes you genuinely happy.”
author: Bella Coronel,

quote: “Because falling in love with a girl who feared nothing in this world had left her ready to love a boy whose heart had been broken before she ever touched him.”
author: Anna-Marie McLemore,

quote: “Maybe this is selfish, but I don’t want to love more than I am loved. And I don’t want to be with someone who loves something or someone more than me.”
author: Gabrielle Zevin,

quote: “Atleast once in a Lifetime, you realise LOVE is the most adorable thing❤”
author: Pramodha Elancheran

quote: “Everyone is hungry, hungry to be loved by others! And if you can manage to get rid of such weak psychology, you will see that you are a strong person, not a weak beggar of love!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “The price of a successful relationship is devotion. Devotion is, essentially, commitment to something we value. What are we devoted to? Surely not what another person wants. I think most people would agree that being devoted to that would be problematic even with the best of people. So, what exactly are we devoted to? We are devoted to the well-being of another person. And we are devoted to the well-being of the relationship. We honour the other person’s value and the relationship’s worth. ”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Why do some people come into our life just out of nowhere, though for a brief moment, they still manage to change our whole life? They force us to ponder and see life, the world from a different perspective. They force us to see the light and the goodness in midst of all the darkness. They put themselves so close to our soul that even when they leave they are not truly gone. What is love? Why do we love? What is friendship? Above all, what is family? What does it feel to have/ sustain a family? Why do some people have everything in the life they want and need to survive, all their desires while others barely have anything they want and need to survive? But why do the others still manage to survive in midst of all this darkness, cruelty, pain, and suffering? Why do darkness, pain, and suffering are their only true companion? Though they live in the dark, their soul can still see the light. Why do they still manage to have that hope and courage? Why don’t they give up on dreaming? Why do they still hope and dream? Based on what eternal infinite enchanted mystifying force they never cease to exist? --- Perhaps the sanctified love and faith. This journey carries all the answers. I hope this journey will change your life. I hope it will make you see things from a different perspective. I hope it will make you ponder. I know it will- I have hope. It can change your life. It can. You just have to have that faith. Just believe and keep believing. AS IT DID MINE.”
author: Sangramdeb Chakrabarti,

quote: “बहुत ख़ूबसूरत है
author: Vandana  Yadav,

quote: “तेज़ बहता दरिया है
author: Vandana  Yadav,

quote: “There is no one like you. I am so glad you exist.”
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “My darling, you are not weak for wearing your heart on your sleeve. In fact, there is nothing stronger than that. In a world full of people keeping themselves walled off so they may play it safe, play the field, play it cool. To love with the tenacious passion and fierce vulnerability of a lion is the brave thing to do. Let them hear you roar.”
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “Live large. Dare to take up space. Be relentless in the pursuit of what truly lights you up. Take risks and stay open. Love yourself enough to know when to walk away. Love yourself enough to believe with every fiber of your being that there is something better for you out there, that there is someone who will accept every part of you no matter how bad or good or ugly or beautiful. They will see your inherent value shining right out of you and they will treasure you, they will uplift you, they will protect you, they will love you well.
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “My love for you, is unconditional love, you are the love of my life".”
author: JAMES OMOGHOSA ABU

quote: “Acceptance and Self-love allow us to honour ourselves and embrace our story with forgiveness and compassion. Only then do we become free!”
author: Christina Foxwell

quote: “You are the bank,
author: Niloy Shouvic Roy

quote: “The world sang out all its songs to me. But yet I’m not satisfied. I want to hear more. I want to hear your song.”
author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quote: “One, who vacillates between you and another person, cannot make a decision; therefore, this places the decision-making process in your hands.”
author: . RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1980

quote: “Sungguh nyata; melewati satu detik ketika bersamamu seolah lebih dari seratus tahun bahagia di sisimu. Dan melewati satu detik ketika tanpamu, seolah lebih dari seratus tahun kehilanganmu. Nyatanya, semua lebih dari satu detik bersamamu dan tanpamu.”
author: JejakPotret Lys

quote: “i wish i had loved you less, so i can talk about it more”
author: Jane Austen

quote: “Moon
author: Sobhan Ganji,

quote: “To see love we gotta be love.”

quote: “She had become a seasoned purveyor of mythological stories and anecdotes, entwined to convince herself the fairytales were truth. And somehow sketched herself for others believe she was the victim.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1981

quote: “സ്നേഹത്തിൽ ഭയം പാടില്ല. സ്നേഹം ലഭിക്കുന്ന ഇടങ്ങളെ ഉപേക്ഷിക്കരുത്. എല്ലാ കാലവും അത് ലഭിച്ചെന്നുവരില്ല. ലഭിക്കുന്ന കാലത്തോളം ഇരു കൈയും നീട്ടി അതിനെ സ്വീകരിക്കുക.”
author: Bineesh Puthuppanam,

quote: “You deserve a love that sees you. Not someone who just looks at you—someone who really, honestly, sincerely sees who you are.
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “Jangan bertanya apa mau ku, cukup pahami bagaimana luka kaki ku. Jatuh berkali-kali namun tak pernah benar-benar patah,.”

quote: “καὶ ποθήω καὶ μάομαι”
author: Sappho,

quote: “ἦλθες, ἔγω δέ σ᾿ ἐμαιόμαν,
author: Sappho,

quote: “I don't care that you don't love me," he continued quietly. "I love you enough for the both of us.”
author: Sadie Bosque,

quote: “Even in its first faint traces, love could alter a landscape. It wrote unimagined stories and made the most beautiful, forbidding places.
author: Anna-Marie McLemore,

quote: “When I touch you softly and feel you react, I am pretty afraid to continue. We can create such perfect moments, and I am entirely yours. Perfection is rare in this fast food, work-a-day world, and I am afraid to lose something so beautiful and perfect. However, when you start kissing back, accepting, I know how God must have felt after he had created Eve for Adam. You are my life, my soul, and my Garden.”
author: Allison Church

quote: “Her Smile, An Art that my heart possessed in its deepest part.”
author: Chetan Mishra

quote: “The world is a cruel place, filled with terrors that would frighten a madman and cold to make frostbite seem inviting, but no matter the obstacle or terror that I face, I KNOW that YOU ARE THERE! And that simple fact makes it possible for me to battle monsters!”
author: Allison Church

quote: “You have so much love in your heart. Love yourself because you deserve the love that you give others.”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “There has never been a beginning or ending ever since our souls met.
author: Reena Doss

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous, that you realise just how much you love them!”
author: Agatha Christie,

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “The girl who was in love with you is gone. And the man she was in love with never existed.”
author: Sadie Bosque,

quote: “Love? Was that what it was? Willingly forgiving another? Accepting them as they were?
author: Fenna Edgewood,

quote: “Love attracts more love or only great things. Love tame hearts and transform them so that they become generous.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I've lost count of those Father's and Mother's Days. In short, you don't need a schedule to express your love to your parents. Love them while they're still alive.”

quote: “Nach unserer Wiedergeburt werde ich jede verdammte Welt nach dir absuchen.”

quote: “Leb das Leben, das du verdienst, Val. Lebe für uns beide. Lebe und schaue nie zurück.”
author: Bianca Mov

quote: “Sometimes your mind fits the person in your perspective, sometimes your heart takes a bit longer, but when both combine, your feelings for your partner are all over the place.”

quote: “Allow yourselves to gently fall apart. You've given your all. And now it's time to let it all go.”

quote: “A good definition of love," he said good-humoredly. "If we talk to each other we can find each other.”
author: Judith Michael,

quote: “An excellent wife is a crown of her husband.”
author: Henry Johnson Jr.

quote: “He had been left broken and wounded—and the wounds had never healed.
author: Fenna Edgewood,

quote: “People wish for love that doesn't exist.”
author: Jordan Hoechlin

quote: “I write the devil letters full of love. But I never get any response.”
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “Writing love letters to the devil.”
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “To love is much easier than to despair, even when all of your hope has been burned to ashes.”
author: Roxanne Veletzos,

quote: “Loving you was my choice
author: Shaheen  Kazi

quote: “Ο έρωτας σου πάει πολύ να ξέρεις…”
author: Serena Deena

quote: “You loved me for me, no matter who that was. You fought for me. You almost died for me. My heart was yours from the moment I met you. I gave it, freely, never expecting to receive yours in return. Now I ask you to be my husband, for I am desperate to be your beloved wife. With the two of us bound together as one, we will never lack for joy. We will take on any sorrow, any challenge, and face it together. I love you, Linden Chevalier. Have I said that already?”
author: Fenna Edgewood,

quote: “I knew I would remember him. I would feel his absence even after death, would ache for him to be near me in a way he could never be again.”
author: Shelby Mahurin,

quote: “Героят в Йордан мигом се обади. Той се спусна бързо и я улови в сигурните си обятия. От лекия трус косата ѝ се полюшна магически и Дан усети копринения ѝ допир и омаен аромат на жасмин:
author: Весела Алегрия,

quote: “Your decision to say goodbye will end our story.
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: “there's this peace that comes with knowing you have a person in the world who would do anything for you, that you would do anything for”
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid,

quote: “Physical attraction can only maintain a relationship for so long.” He scanned the clouds for thoughts, “But like how the moon and earth are in an eternal dance with each other, there must be another force holding them together, something not visible to our eyes. Likewise, two individuals must be mentally and emotionally attracted and in equal understanding of each other in order for their gravity to hold them together.
author: Zoiy Galloay

quote: “You cannot force love, to force love is to ruin it.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “LOVE IS ENDURING
author: Trisha North,

quote: “Oh, my. Oh, dear," he said. "Is this also love? This terrible pain?"
author: Jennifer Donnelly,

quote: “From my always to my forever, it’s only been you.”

quote: “LOVE IS THE ONLY BOND THAT CAN MAKE THE WHOLE WORLD A SINGLE NATION.”
author: Shakil Kamboh

quote: “LOVE frees and conquers all.”
author: Bea Pilotin,

quote: “L'amore è una pazzia temporanea, erutta come un vulcano e poi si placa. E quando accade, bisogna prendere una decisione. Devi capire se le vostre radici si sono intrecciate a tal punto da rendere inconcepibile una separazione. Perché questo è l'amore. Non è l'ardore, l'eccitazione, le imperiture promesse di eterna passione, il desiderio di accoppiarsi in ogni minuto del giorno. Non è restare sveglia la notte a immaginare che lui baci ogni angoletto del tuo corpo. Questo è semplicemente essere 'innamorati', una cosa che sa fare qualunque sciocco. L'amore è ciò che resta quando l'innamoramento si è bruciato; ed è sia un'arte, sia un caso fortunato." pag. 288”
author: Louis de Bernières,

quote: “I will write a dictionary of all the words I have used trying to describe the way it feels to have finally, finally found you.”
author: Clementine von Radics,

quote: “From the moment I looked at you, I knew you were meant for me.”
author: Jordan Hoechlin

quote: “A spiritual being loves because no other way than Love is known. It is not dependent on the presence of another. Nor is it halted by the actions of another. ”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “To lovers out there ….
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Illness is out of my dictionary when the soul yearns to do and achieve great things.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “It is your state of mind or your ability to think that will exalt or diminish you. The choice is placed in your hands.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I grieve to leave: I love this place-I love it,
author: Charlotte Brontë,

quote: “Never," said he, as he ground his teeth,
author: Charlotte Brontë,

author: Charlotte Brontë,

quote: “If you wish me to love you, could you but see how

author: Charlotte Brontë,

quote: “Sebuah ironi, tentang aku yang telanjur menaruh hati tetapi dia tidak pernah menyadari”
author: Fauzi Rahadian,

quote: “Love is not a sentiment, Love is sentience.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Love reassembles you.”
author: Nanette L. Avery

quote: “As the sands of time caress my tender flesh and the feathery wings of chance turn pale my once undying youth, I shall look upon thee and smile.”
author: Samer Ratib Zeidan

quote: “You are afraid to let anyone in,
author: Jenim Dibie,

quote: “Her smile is unforgettable, her eyes are like ocean and her voice is sweet like violin.”
author: Jordan Hoechlin

quote: “I still don't know if Darwin, with his theory of natural selection, would have made an excellent lawyer or judge in court.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Some people say we have to love God. For others, it seems that fear is the most beautiful. Sometimes fear and other times love, I mean they can't be mixed. I would rather love God than fear Him daily.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Living without you is like living in a cloudy winter. It's so gloomy, cold and bitter.”
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: “~Love is a powerful force. It cannot be bought. It cannot be taken or stolen. Although sometimes it must be fought for, it must be given freely.~”
author: J.M. Kearl,

quote: “People think that intimacy is about sex. But intimacy is about truth. When you realize you can tell someone your truth, when you can show yourself to them, when you stand in front of them bare and their response is "you're safe with me" - that's intimacy.”
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid,

quote: “When people talk about falling in love, often they’ll say things clicked into place. I didn’t have that. It was more like things relaxed. Everything I’d been holding onto was suddenly filled with air, and I didn’t feel quite as crowded as I had before. My thoughts get quieter when I’m in love, I guess.
author: Ava Bellows,

quote: “You were never born to hurt in love, suffer in love, or break in love. You were born to love, to be loved, and to make love”
author: Farah Ayaad

quote: “Sometimes we meet someone and feel like we have known them all our lives”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “I love you, I thought, rallying against the blackness. More than all the stars in the universe. In this life and ever after. I love you.”
author: Kerri Maniscalco,

quote: “I call on all major religions to return to their original state, seeking spiritual remedies, rather than getting involved in daily political discourse.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love appears in different faces but love has its real face. The nature of love is happiness and forgiveness.”
author: Zainurrahman,

quote: “The simplest definition of democracy is that you are a true humanist at heart. Which is contrary to exploitative ideologies.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “There was no more waiting. All the things she'd patiently been putting aside were right here, within her grasp”
author: Sophie Sullivan,

quote: “Your love is pure. Your love is healing.”
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “One word can be a light to a dark place.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Love is not blind, it is conscious of its own sacrifice in order for things to turn out well.”
author: Lil Destar

quote: “A love letter so sultry the words began to melt.”
author: Nanette L. Avery

quote: “To lovers out there ….
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Fortune without love is sheer curse.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Florì abbassò la testa sul petto. Anche per lei tutto finiva. Il sangue se ne andava, con don Cirino, con le immense distanze. Mai più alla vetrinetta sarebbe riapparso, mai più. Né in chiesa; né dentro i salotti di Piazza Mondragone; né in cielo tutte quelle lunghe, lunghe settimane. Mai più.
author: Anna Maria Ortese,

quote: “You let me go. Now, you stand there are watch me grow. I am a plant that needs sunlight, water, and love. It might take time to blossom but I am sure I will find someone who waters my soul. I hope you find your flower too and stop creating scars with thorns and give love a chance to grow.”
author: Shillpi S Banerrji

quote: “My heart is bleeding for you,

quote: “A realist is a man of action, because he does not dwell too much on reason when the results or the end will not satisfy the means. It is the reality that matters most.”

quote: “Mom, your love is a mystery:
author: Christen Kuikoua

quote: “« "You’ll see.”

quote: “Where there is love, there is lift - where there is lift, there is love.”

quote: “When I'm in love, I think of you.”

quote: “I have seen God’s Love.
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “One can love and hate in the same moment.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1988

quote: “He kissed her bottom lip, stroked it with his tongue. “You are so beautiful. When is the last time someone told you that?”
author: Fenna Edgewood,

quote: “Do you think I can stay to become nothing to you'
author: Charlotte Brontë,

quote: “I wish I could travel back in time, not to feel younger or change the course of history and bring us back together, but to re-live every precious moment we had, over and over.”

quote: “I want you to know that I know that and that I see you...I want to give you peace. I want to give you a home. With me.”

quote: “Everyone is a story written in Braille, love is the finger that dares to read it.”
author: Jenim Dibie,

quote: “Infinite beauty,
author: Laura Jaworski

quote: “I squeeze my eyes shut and try to drown out the smooth sound of his voice as it slides into my ears and makes its way through every nerve in my body, warming me in places this flimsy blanket failed to do all night.”
author: Colleen Hoover,

quote: “This won’t go anywhere,” I tell her. “This thing with us. It won’t end well.”
author: Colleen Hoover,

quote: “My first language is Silence.
author: Jenim Dibie,

quote: “India is going to face the biggest genital crisis, the only reason for which is not to have interracial marriages. At that time you will remember this sentence very much.”
author: Pradip Bendkule

quote: “If you know them better than they know themselves, then you deserve them.”
author: Pradip Bendkule

quote: “...And if I had no words,

quote: “The true test of love lies in its ability to endure the longing”

quote: “Sex is nature’s gift for both the sexes. If you mistake that you’ve more to give than receive in it, then the woman in you would lose as wife for you won’t be able to experience the joy of being a female. So don’t ever demean lovemaking as an instrument of sexual blackmail. It pays to know that sex is not about male satiation alone but it is as much a womanly fulfillment”

quote: “I thought, I will know him always, he will father my children, we will grow old side by side. We will make love ten thousand times and plant fifty gardens in the springtime, and when winter comes we will lie together and keep each other warm, until the sunshine returns.”

quote: “Pe urmă ne vedeam din ce în ce mai des.

quote: “I'm not sure how you gather such strength

quote: “I do not remember anything, I have no answer to your questions, if you have doubts on me, then this love cannot run on the basis of any doubt”

quote: “And I watch my words from a long way off.

quote: “Romance, always balanced so delicately between tragedy and comedy. You could never judge appropriately which you lived until the final pages. Even then, it depended where you chose to stop the story.”

quote: “While he stood rooted lost in her charms, sensing that she had stolen his heart, she bowed her head as though in guilt.”
author: B.S. Murthy,

quote: “It’s the character of man woman chemistry that feminine tendencies catalyze male proclivities. Carried away by the euphoria of her coquetry, man begins to woo woman with hope. With her vanity thus addressed by his advances, she turns flirtatious, furthering his passion for her possession. In the excitement of the moment, should he transgress the threshold of her sensitivity, fearing she had compromised her honor, she sinks in shame. Thereafter, she withdraws from him to brood over her infirmity, and in the end, as though to atone for her moment of weakness, she cold-shoulders him altogether, making him wonder what went wrong in the midst of his conquest.”
author: B.S. Murthy,

quote: “Would sex become any more pleasurable if penetrated with love? Why at all this doubt, as if love would take that any deeper into her. Hah, hah! But, it’s the lust that vests the thrusts with power and any woman would know that for sure.”
author: B.S. Murthy,

quote: “Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.”

quote: “I promise, you won’t find another person more sincere than me in this world,” Hua Cheng replied.”

quote: “Xie Lian had buried his face in his back, and also didn’t speak. Though nothing was said, it was enough.

quote: “Love without loyalty is the most meaningless gift that you could give to anyone.”

quote: “So, when we finally reach that final stretch, may the promises made on our ever-hopeful lips be kept, and the summers we wish for be granted to us.”

quote: “Love without loyalty is selfish.

quote: “I will forget you as soon as my head lays on someone else's arms. It's not a complicated science.”

quote: “I want to be seen for who I really am, and loved for it anyway." - CP Harris, Bad Wrong Things”

quote: “Por las estrellas que escuchan... y los sueños que se hacen realidad
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: “Do you know how careful my love will make me? See here, look at my hands. Say there’s a cobweb spun between them. It’s my ambition. And at its centre there’s a spider, a color of a jewel. The spider is you. This is how I shall bear you — so gently, so carefully and without jar, you shall not know you are being taken.”

quote: “I love it when he tells me that he likes the way I feel because it goes against everything I’ve heard my entire life and I wish I could put his words in my pocket just to touch them once in a while and remind myself that they exist.”

quote: “Love is a premature grave of restlessness.”

quote: “At a party, the guests drink more than the host. The same can be said on the plane, the passengers should have fun and not the pilot. In this case, the pilot is the shepherd of the sheep. The keeper of the flocks.”

quote: “All that you see, see in love,

quote: “You can exercise faith without love, you can have faith without even very much thought, but you can’t love without faith. Many failures of love come not from lack of emotion but lack of faith.”

quote: “Love isn't a proclamation but rather experience, experiencing beloved in everything you see, hear, & speak.”

quote: “We never really love a person until we see that person without the lens of need, want, and fulfillment. Love isn't the frame to lense love through it rather love is a reflection of the frame to see things as it is in totality and total acceptance.”

quote: “No one wants to learn from past history because we all want to leave our own history in the face of the world.”

quote: “It hurts me to hear, to see you got no faith in yourself

quote: “There can never be democracy and diplomacy without love”

quote: “God is love. Thus, I transformed my heart into the throne of God.”

quote: “Where there is life, there is love. For it is Love with her eternal kiss that makes a life worth living.”

quote: “Here at his elbow was really another world; and it was soft, warm, and breathing, a person, somebody you could talk and laugh and cry with, not so very different in most things, indeed strangely like you.”

quote: “Love is the most beautiful and fundamental thing that gives you the feeling of living a pleasant life.”

quote: “Our meditation should be on life and not on death. Let's keep our heads up high and move forward to success.”

quote: “Love is so strong that even demons don't hate their own kind.”

quote: “The real founder of Christianity was Paul and not Jesus. The Oscar should go to Paul and the Grammy award to Luke, for spreading Christianity to the Gentiles; which was forbidden by Jesus himself.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I have nothing to hate about religions. Because they are all built on the foundation of love, despite having different paths to reach that final destination.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love is the true foundation of mankind, it can force a romantic emperor to bow and kneel before a maid.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To lovers out there ….
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “I loved much to the point that I lost the true meaning of hate.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Fanatics are everywhere, in religion, sports and politics. The majority are ready and willing to die for their beliefs. Even in love there are martyrs.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We always hide something of ourselves whenever we create something.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Nu știam că dorul poate lua forme atât de tiranice.”
author: Maria Caranica,

quote: “de cine m-am îndrăgostit eu, de fapt? M-am îndrăgostit de ideea de a te avea și de imposibilitatea ei? Sau poate m-am îndrăgostit de inabordabilitatea ta, de faptul că atenția ta este scumpă, de faptul că ești selectiv cu persoanele din jurul tău, iar egoismul meu vrea să fie hrănit prin a fi selectată de cel mai selectiv om pe care îl cunosc? Să fiu eu cea care îi ia mințile celui mai rănit, inabordabil și imposibil de avut individ. Sau poate m-am îndrăgostit de faptul că mă faci să sufăr, că mă controlezi, iar inconștient poate asta caut. Sau poate că m-am îndrăgostit de tine. Pentru ceea ce ești tu. [...]
author: Maria Caranica,

quote: “Find the wild places of her heart,
author: Christy Ann Martine,

quote: “Relationships depends upon love and not love to relationships. This means that there is no guarantee of love in every relationship.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “You can not create something without love and expect it to be great.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “We always hide our souls whenever we create something that cherishes the heart.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “The arrival of New Year heralded a symphony of riveting colors awakening our inspiration, as the world is our canvas, our profound souls becomes inspired when the brushes of good deeds and triumph of our love make their way into the heart of beloved .”
author: Dr. Tony Beizaee

quote: “You can flex, or be Chris it’s your business
author: DON SANTO

quote: “You can dream of having a lot of money, while others are earning and making money every day.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “So what does that make you to me?” she asked. “Friends with benefits, boyfriend, partner?” “Yours,” he said, quietly. “It makes me yours.”
author: Shilpa Suraj,

quote: “And, for the first time I'd seen, he laughed. It wasn't one of those half laughs that he usually did; it was one of those laughs that I did. The full laugh. I loved it. I loved the way it sounded. I loved everything about it.”
author: Bin Userkaf,

quote: “In love, you won't always win but even in the loss. there's so much to gain.”
author: Beverly Sade,

quote: “Sometimes pain is our greatest teacher. It's through those experiences that we learn our most important lessons.”
author: Beverly Sade,

quote: “Time will not erode it nor will it halt its growth, for our love is everlasting and ever growing.”
author: Ivy Wynter

quote: “Love is support and unity combined. Love is associated with all that is good or beautiful.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Peace is only beautiful if you are on the winning side.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Luck only exists if you create it yourself. Create the opportunities.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “There is nothing to love in a poor man and nothing to hate in a rich man. Simply, because no one wants to become poor in life. We all seek a moderate lifestyle.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We claim to love the poor and yet no one wishes to become poor in life. Therefore, it is a false statement made by flatterers.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I wash the remnants of men I don't respect off my skin like the way I wash dishes.
author: Kelsey Milian Lopez,

quote: “If I’m worth anything in this world, it’s because of what you’ve given me”
author: Linnea March,

quote: “I was feeling low, i felt like i said too many 'I love you's and received less of what i gave. I craved love because i am a being of love. I remember my parents telling me that I have a heart of gold and everyone around me telling me that i deserved the best love. But, somehow, over the years, i gave too much and felt like everyone took my heart only to break it and walk away. I moved on, but sometimes i feel my heart is done with these games. I meet someone, and that heart fixes itself, but soon it all goes down, and i question myself; am i good enough or simply walking towards hell? I have tried to change my means and ways. I have deleted all sources and have been in the hermit mode, trying to knock some sense and tell myself it will all get better. But, this body, this mind, this soul is tired of the mess. I have understood everyone and given the space, but i just want someone to love me for once in my way. To just hold me and tell me things will be better again. To love me for who i am and grow with me always. I want a soul that connects with mine and a universe where my love story sees every sunrise and midnight.”
author: Shillpi S Banerrji

quote: “Permit yourself to bask in gratitude, explore with curiosity, and love with abandon.”
author: Gina Simmons Schneider,

quote: “Give me your attention, let me the voice in your mind. I don't just want your body; I need your soul to connect with mine. I don't need a glass of wine and music, i need you and nature to play a background score to a beautiful night. I need your smile to be mine, and i promise to love you till the end. Till then, hold my hand and dance under the moonlight. Let's make the stars jealous and the grass smile. Let's be in love and create a history of our time.”
author: Shillpi S Banerrji

quote: “I still prepare and create my luck, because I know that it only exists after creation.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I recommend the books only to ready minds. Those who have inquired about them or those who are on the right path. Seekers of wisdom.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To love is to be broken. That is the very definition of the word.”
author: Joanna Ruth Meyer,

quote: “The feeling of love comes exclusively from within us. By damning or judging and witholding your love from the world, you're only blocking yourself from letting love flow through you.
author: Benjamin Brown

quote: “The mystery of love is not found within the significant one, but in the memories you shared together.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We don’t choose people. Our hearts do. And they’re little saboteurs, always trying to get themselves broken.”
author: Caroline George,

quote: “I can not be a part of myself -
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “It is said it is useless to look for equality in a relationship. Whether you want it or not, one always leads, and the other follows. Maybe we should give matriarchy a chance. But the weight should always be towards one side. As long as we compete for equality, none of us will lead, and none of us will follow.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “Sometimes one false accusation is enough to ruin what you have in an instant; regardless of how long you have known each other or how much time you have spent together.”
author: Krizha Mae G. Abia

quote: “We want to coalesce as sexual beings. And as spiritual beings, we want to coalesce with this universe, even if we are unsure of this being a possibility. However, one wrong move and you are stuck with someone who doesn’t help you grow intellectually or spiritually.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “Without deception, sexual attraction isn’t possible. Men deceive women in many ways, and women deceive men on a whole different, god-like level. It’s not just makeup. It’s something far much greater. Many women try to play dumb, lest the man get scared of their intellectual abilities. Many women fake flexibility when it comes to opinions, as they know many men aren’t accepting of a highly opinionated woman. It’s a multitude of things with women. Whereas with men, things are quite simple. They just have to portray that they are the most sorted out guys, will be good providers, and know what they are doing in their lives. Putting it in a nutshell, both men and women deceive each other. But after a few months of marriage, the veil of deception is lifted. The woman who once seemed timid suddenly begins to voice her concerns. The woman who once seemed flexible suddenly begins to assert her unpopular opinions and impose her will. Men disappoint too. The woman realizes her guy isn’t as sorted out as he pretended to be. All in all, only when people start living together do they come to know of their partners for real. No wonder why so many love marriages end up in divorce within a year.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “Without deception, sexual attraction isn’t possible. Men deceive women in many ways, and women deceive men on a whole different, god-like level.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “Only human males are able to find partners so easily. Well, most of them. In the animal kingdom, you have to be the best to get the girl. I once saw a peacock doing its mating dance. So beautiful and full of vitality he was. Yet it wasn’t enough for the peahen. There were better peacocks in the queue. The power of choice is always with the females.”
author: Abhaidev,

quote: “But I would never give my heart again to any young creature.”
author: C.S. Lewis,

quote: “I could tell him I love him, but love seems too cliché, too overdone. I feel love, but I also feel jokes and front porch fights, pinky promises and friendship bracelets. I feel rolling my eyes when he made fun of my favorite songs, yelling at him when he paired up with Ashley Olson on our seventh-grade field day. I feel love, but I also feel our history, years and years of choosing him, the good and bad, highs and lows. Choosing to love. Not despite the flaws. Because of them. Because the mistakes prove we were together long enough to make them.
author: Caroline George,

quote: “It's always the same with relationships: like a fancy sheepskin jacket you would get yourself some to stay warm on cold winter nights and show them off a bit. At first, they would fit you perfectly until they would suddenly become too loose, too tight, too long, too short and from then on you would just not look after them any more. You would stop taking care of them, throw up all over them on the next binge and when you would wake up in the morning, the whole house would smell like wet sheep and stomach acid. Sooner rather than later, they would end up in the old clothes container and although you would promise yourself that next time you'd buy the expensive care product that the saleswoman with the fake smile has tried to sell you, you still won't do it, as it sounds like a lot effort and who would put any into something they end up losing, anyway?”
author: Sima B. Moussavian,

quote: “And you’re in love?” “Ma, we’ve never even kissed.” “And that has anything to do with it?” “Okay, fine. Yes, I think so. But don’t tell anyone. Don’t even repeat it to yourself.” “Why?” “Because it’s humiliating.” “Sweetheart, love is humiliating. Hasn’t anyone ever told you that?” “Who would have told me that?” “Do you know the word humiliate comes from the Latin root humus , which means ‘earth’? That’s how love is supposed to feel.” “Like hummus?” “Like earth. It ground s you. All this nonsense about love being a drug, making you feel high, that’s not real. It should hold you like the earth.” “Wow, Ma.” “What? I have a heart, don’t I?”

quote: “أردتك أن تعلم أن إحداهن سيرسلها الله يوما لتبقى،ُلتعارك الأيام ..تًختطِف السعادة من ُجعبة الحياة وتهبها لقلبك أبد الآبدين،"إحداهن" أرادت أن تجعل كل الرحلات عنك يرون سعادتك وأولادك ودفء بيتك ولمعة عينيك وراحتك ...فيندمن رحيلهن وخذلانهن لعينيك،"إحداهن" رصيد حنيتها لن تنفذه بحور إهمالك لها وحبك لمعاشرة النساء وتخليك عنها لعدم تأكدك بعد أنها "هى" التى تبحث عنها ، "إحداهن" سترى كل عيوبك ومن ثم تصادقها ،"إحداهن" تعلم أنك تحدق بسقف غرفتك كثيرا لتبكى وحدك فى الخامسة فجرا وأن خساراتك تعددت وأن الأمس كان قاسيا للغاية عليك وأنه ربما ُأفلتت يدك فى الخامسة من عمرك وفى الرابعة عشر وفى العشرين فصرتَ تسبقُ التخلى عنك بالتخلى عن الجميع .."إحداهن "ستقرأ ذلك فى عينيك وسترغب بكل ما تملك من الأنثى أن تكن أمرأتك فى العشرين وصديقتك فى الثلاثين وأمك فى الخمسين ولمعة عينيك فى حفلة تخرج أبنك ودمعتك فى زفاف أبنتك وعكازك فى السبعين
author: إنجى عبد السلام

author: Héctor Abad Faciolince,

quote: “J'aimais sincèrement le mariage. J'aimais ouvrir les yeux le matin, étirer les bras et trouver ce corps chaud à côté du mien, entendre sa respiration apaisée, les yeux fermés et la bouche ouverte, un petit sentier de salive cheminant sur l'oreiller. J'aimais manger accompagné, cuisiner à deux, marcher en couple, partager une bouteille [...]. J'aimais beaucoup l'observation mutuelle, le signalement permanent des défauts de l'autre, qui comme une piqûre nécessaire, indispensable, pour dégonfler la vanité de chacun et surtout celle du macho arrogant. Je trouvais confortable la familiarité de l'odeur, des habitudes et même des tics et gestes [...]”
author: Héctor Abad Faciolince,

quote: “Last night when I was about to sleep, drowning down peacefully in deep darkness, ready for a new adventure of the night, with the blanket embracing me with all the warmth and love.
