quote: “When you face a heart break or caught your partner doing wrong things. You are hurt, not because what your partner did. But you are more hurt, because of what you did for them and all the sacrifice you made.”
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “We heal our past by living our present love relationship.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “Roberto didn’t say a word, but our fingers intertwined. He held my hand tightly and I almost cried as I realized that was the most intimate gesture I had ever shared with another person in my whole life.”
author: Elen Chase,

quote: “You once asked who I loved most in this world, It's you.”
author: Anna Todd,

quote: “Self-love is selfish in itself. Not any different from becoming a narcissist when you take it to the extremist.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Never fall for a person who only says that they love you but never acts towards their claim”
author: Israel A. Abejoye

quote: “We can all live together if we sacrifice our beliefs for love.”
author: Israel A. Abejoye

quote: “Regret not that you suffer in love, regret if you don't.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “There’s a common misconception about power in relationships. Women assume we need to think like men to hold power. But, I ask: why think like a man when women are the ones with all the power? You only need to learn about the leverage you have to unlock your potential”
author: Leandra De andrade ,

quote: “Dating is a game of poker. It's all about playing your cards intelligently, even if you must bluff about your hand. Playing hard to get is the bluff. Even if you want to throw all your chips in on the first hand, bluffing increases a man's interest in The Game. You keep the valuable cards close to test his ability to invest. It increases your demand in his eyes because he can't read your cards or your poker face. It also gives you a chance to see what he brings to the table.”
author: Leandra De Andrade,

quote: “The more somebody loves you, the more they will become angry with you”
author: Atef Ashab Uddin Sahil

quote: “Enraptured by the words
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “LOVE… Is My Engine of Creation.
author: Elle Nicolai

quote: “The real foundation of love lies in being shared instead of keeping everything to yourself.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Focus on your destiny and never waste too much time dwelling on past events.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “It's natural that everyone wants to be successful, but many don't have the courage to keep moving forward.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Getting over mood-swings is the only path to success and happiness. Achieve peace of mind and live your life to the fullest.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Sometimes it is necessary to take immediate action, after considering all the alternatives. We cannot leave everything to fortune to decide for us.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Yes love hurts...after all you FALL in love ”
author: Karisma Dhawan

quote: “You will be served non bailable arrest warrants at your first encounter of a rare love.”
author: Qamar Rafiq

quote: “A thousand dazzling Vegas turn bleak, when the soul shines with love's labor.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Those who succeed will be those who are open to change. Those who go in tune with the times.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I sacrificed my time for the greater good. At this moment, I feel quite ready to serve the world and humanity in general.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “True love does not exist without the satisfaction of the heart and the appeasement of the mind.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “It is ideal to love extensively but not excessively.”
author: Israel A. Abejoye

quote: “The greatest sign of true love is achieving complete peace of mind.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The happiness of an ignoramus is only temporary and he does not know its source.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Apart from wisdom Solomon conquered love, wealth and power were all under his feet.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The wisdom of the ancients decays with time.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Marriage is the best test of your physical and mental abilities. It's the greatest adventure of all ages.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “This love we proclaim to have isn’t exhilarating. I don’t feel excited when I see him. I don’t wake up in the middle of the night and look at him with adoration.”
author: Elelwani Anita Ravhuhali,

quote: “There is absolutely nothing a man you don’t love anymore can do that you find delight in. And it’s never crucial things that take love away; it’s microscopic actions of inconsideration.”
author: Elelwani Anita Ravhuhali,

quote: “I hide you safely in my thoughts, always.”
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “If you really love someone and want to build a successful relationship with them, be open with each other, be real to each other and give each other plenty of space, time apart and freedom.”
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: “Perhaps she lived a thousand lifetimes before, a world that breathed on Love, a home that bloomed of togetherness, a wild crazy love that rolled between peace and madness, but no matter what held onto each other, that believed in growing into each other for each other with each other.”
author: Debatrayee Banerjee

quote: “It could not have been by chance that God sent me among so many different mentally ill people. He was obviously giving a message... He was saying, "Watch and see." Don't make the same mistakes again. Don't try to exist by shouting. Never insult the man in front of you. Learn to empathize. And knowing your limits. And to be silent. Accept. Understand. And stay away! The swamp you call a relationship is not for you right now! You die. Even I can't save you.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “I could not even guess that day how many more men I would say that I would say you were beautiful in dreams! But I greet, I made love, and every time… I said, I wish you remained as a dream.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “I know myself;
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “I wish you could see yourself the way I see you
author: Ali Hazelwood,

quote: “Winter is like fake love that warms us with its beauty and freezes us with its reality!”
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: “At the end of the day, every love is doomed to end in a Mustafa Sandal song: -You're contradicting my ego, get out of here!”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “I was angry. Not because of what he did or said. For breaking my hope with what he did and said, and for making me regret once again that I left Tolga. Will I always find the same men? Will I always play the same role? As long as I don't change, maybe it would be”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “LOVE DRAW THE WEAPON AGAIN FASTER THAN ME.”
author: Arzum Uzun

quote: “And you, dear frog, you have neither tail nor fin...
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Don't try to love someone whom I can't. I made myself someone to grow up in the jungle of the unlovable and still love. In order not to die. And because lovelessness kills people. An empty heart prepares its end. But don't force yourself. If I can't love someone... You can't love at all. Don't be fooled by its looks. All feral cats look cute. When you reach out your hand, you know you'll never get your arm back. And what's worse is that you left your life in their teeth.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “We were emotional cowards of the average world. We thought everyone we said we loved was going to leave us.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Do not deny it. Accept it. You can fight anything you are aware of. Even with yourself...”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Friends... Friends you feel safe as long as they surround you. You talk to your friends separately, your heart tells it separately most of the time. You can't even name what you feel, you can't share it with the world when you can't make sense of it. Denial is your greatest weapon on that front. The more you deny it, the more you think your feelings will fade.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “He smiled. It was a heartbroken smile. And that heart wasn't the one I broke. A thousand mistakes before me, it was a heart that had been broken many times, shattered, fastened with plasters. A dead heart that looks like beating, that looks like alive. Can you resurrect a dead heart?”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Everyone has sins
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “I'll take my hands off you, the waters will calm down. Let go of the blur. Let those waters remain still. More than just drifting with the current, I need to keep my head on the surface. I don't want to drown. Let me survive. Let me breathe.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “We were the remnants of a life ruined by wrong moves.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Kalbimi açık bıraktım. Kötü anlamıyorsun, değil mi?”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “You are as dear to me as the water of this river which flows without any hesitation. It is happy with its own flow. It does not seek any attention, nor does it wait for anyone. It has an inner peace and with it, it colors the world of everyone around it”
author: Neelam Saxena Chandra,

quote: “There isn’t much to say about someone who has been absent but then flows back into your brain slowly. Actually, maybe there is. There is a lot to say about you and how I love and hate you, and how I know that
author: Palmer Smith,

quote: “It is devastating when you have downloaded the full movie of your perfect love but the other person seems to still buffer over his feelings for you!!!!”
author: Karisma Dhawan

quote: “Because once you love it is gone. You love and you cannot call it back. CROSSED chpt 6”
author: Ally Condie,

quote: “The heart resembles a feather in the desert that the breezes turn over and over again”
author: Atef Ashab Uddin Sahil

quote: “Premarital connection leads to extramarital relationship”
author: Atef Ashab Uddin Sahil

quote: “She knew what was coming. She could feel the scent of love in the air. She could hear its footsteps. But was she ready for it?”
author: Neelam Saxena Chandra,

quote: “Regret not that you suffer, regret if you haven't suffered.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Where there is suffering, there is light. Where there is suffering, there is life.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “In the end, we all yearn for those heart's which are deprived of sadness and are capable of love.”
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “She asked, what is success?
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “It's all I can do,
author: Iona Baird,

quote: “He had no future in the world: of that he was conscious. He had no future in this life. Even if he lived on, it would only be a kind of enduring. But he felt the after-life belonged to him.
author: D.H. Lawrence,

quote: “On the dark stretch of life your love is torch”
author: Qamar Rafiq

quote: “We were never
author: Laura Chouette,

quote: “I am a rusty machine with weary parts in search of my inventor.”
author: Qamar Rafiq

quote: “I searched his warm eyes in a failed attempt to find a galaxy in them I hadn't already discovered.”
author: Bianca Viola,

quote: “Love prevails.”
author: Bianca Viola,

quote: “In the end, love, if real, cannot die.”
author: Bianca Viola,

quote: “Secrets bind us down yet set us free. Love is like that, too.”
author: Bianca Viola,

quote: “I watch you and I think I'm in love.”
author: Bianca Viola,

quote: “My darling “mum” perhaps, I will never be as happy as I was in the old days of my childhood, precisely there were no ghosts, no fears! I have never felt like I belonged anywhere, I tried the countries, the books, and the drugs.”
author: Qamar Rafiq

quote: “روايه سجين عشقه روايه دراما رومانسى عن ساكنون سجون الماضى بذكرياته السعيده وأوجاعه أيضا.... يأبون الخروج ...رافضين بدء عهد جديد يجمعهم بمستقبل لا يرغبوه بدون احبائهم، فإن غابت أجسادهم،لن تغيب أطيافهم وذكراهم أبدا .”
author: يسرا النوبي,

quote: “قصة غرام
author: منى عبد العزيز,

quote: “شهم شاعر في زمان غير زمانه ، يهيم حباً بأستاذته الجامعية انهار ، يورطها في عشق موءود يلطخ ثوبها ناصع البياض بنجاسات السياسية وغدر الدهاليز المظلمة ، يسلمها لأولاد بازوزو.....
author: نوار النجار

quote: “أُعجب بنوعِ الموسيقى التي تُعزف هنا، دومًا تكون هادئة، في مرةٍ أسمعُ الجاز وتارة سيمفونية بيتهوفن.
author: أسامة أحمد خوجلي,

quote: “I wanted to tell them that he had changed my life and that I would never be the same, not ever. And that somehow it felt like it was Dante who saved my life and not the other way around. I wanted to tell them that he was the first human being who had ever made me want to talk about the things that scared me”
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz,

quote: “If you’ve ever suffered the accusations of people who objectified you as an emblem of darkness, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been haunted by the opinions of your friends, it wasn’t your fault. If they’ve ever assumed the worst of you, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been judged by your own parents, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been treated as an outcast, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever made a decision based on an opinion, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been labeled, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been stuck in the middle of a love triangle, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever been heartbroken, it wasn’t your fault. If you’ve ever cried yourself to sleep, it wasn’t your fault.
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “I hope you don't get stuck in the atrocities of your past. For others, it may just be a story but for people like us, it's the epitome of scars and a mountain of insurmountable obstacles.”
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “I wonder what brought us here?
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “Logic requires knowledge.”
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “You are on the edge of the escarpment, confused whether to dive into a new chapter of life or immerse in the story of your past.”
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “Sister - she was my friend, the first person I shared a secret with.
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “She asked, do you believe in fate?
author: Kamil Alvi

quote: “Love gave me a lifetime.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: “It was nice to hear his voice and nothing else.”
author: Rainbow Rowell,

quote: “Whenever a man looks you in the eye and starts chanting "I'm not like them...", rest assured, he's a thousand worse than them.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “Their love wanted to fix her, and refused to see that she wasn't broken”
author: Seanan McGuire,

quote: “Some "hello" are themselves goodbye. You hear, you see, you feel. But still... Hello, you say. Welcome. Even knowing it's going to end. Besides, endings are better than beginnings. You know the beginnings. What you don't know... I am the poet in this story, the poem is you. I'll make you up in a minute. And you will become flesh and blood again. You will come as you are, and you will go with the version in me.”
author: Arzum Uzun,

quote: “You like me," I blurt out.
author: Lauren Asher,

quote: “The curves of your lips rewrite history”
author: Oscar Wilde,

quote: “Our bodies moved in harmony with one another. Like a perfect orchestra: strings harmonizing with woodwind, Brass coinciding with percussion. Complete opposites entangling to make beautiful music. Just like us.”
author: Kay Soletto,

quote: “Hey, Josh."
author: Sally  Thorne

quote: “Love is a Bohemian child... it has never, never known a law.”
author: Catherine Meurisse,

quote: “Silence is beautiful. But sometimes what makes us feel loved are words of comfort by someone we love.”
author: Garima Soni - words world

quote: “I have nothing tangible to offer but only the intangible, my love.”
author: Fidelis O. Mkparu,

quote: “I didn't feel very much at home in the world, that was a fact. Now I do.”
author: Marilynne Robinson,

quote: “How precious it is to find someone who brings with them the feeling of home.”
author: Affinity Soul

quote: “How precious it is to find someone
author: Affinity Soul

quote: “You haven't been loved well, until you've been love just for sake of loving.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quote: “If falling in love is so beautiful. I would want to fall every day! Need you to catch me in your arms and love me like you do!”
author: Surya Raj

quote: “Sometimes I ask myself, "Was I too right for love, or was I too wrong for it?”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “There is nothing ideal about love, for love is the ideal.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Some choose to be controlled by hate. Hate changes the way they see things or other people. The way they think and reason. The way they view things. What they say and how they behave. Hate takes away kindness, empathy, remorse, humanity, conscious and respect from them.
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “ora per esempio
author: Francesco Carofiglio,

quote: “In every generation there have been atheists hiding behind every religion.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “In one sentence, you beautifully shattered my heart, yet here I am, writing a thousand to tell you what it felt like.”
author: Yogesh Chandra

quote: “غَزَوتِ فُؤادِي فَاستَوْطَنِته.”
author: نهاد محمد,

quote: “فغالباً ما يأتي الملاذ متأخراً.... ولكن ما أجمل النهايات
author: منة الله رأفت

quote: “The present does exist, but inside our minds only.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We must first admire the artist, the one who has completed all that nature has left aside, before being carried away by the beauty of art.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “He and I were polar opposites. We didn't make much sense.
author: Danielle Lori,

quote: “Galaxies never say to the Sun : You are not enough!
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quote: “مر على فُراقِها عاميين وهو فى مَكانِه لا يتقدم يَجول فى خاطرهِ كل الذكريات التى تجمعهما منذ أن كانا معاً فى نفسِ المدرسه حتى اصبحا سوياً أباً وأماً لطفلين احمد ورنا, أحَبها كثيرا وأحَبتهُ أكثر بكثير.”
author: يسرا النوبي,

quote: “من بين كل الصور وجد صوره لأروى وهى فى السادسه من عمرها مرتديه فستان قصيرلونه احمر وشعرها البنى اللامع ينسال على جبهتها، فتجذبه الصوره إلى أمواج الذكريات الماضيه والتى تبحر فى عالمه منذ أكثر من 25عاماً.”
author: يسرا النوبي,

quote: “تتوالى الأيام وتجرى فى حياه أروى محاوله أن تخفى الثقب الذى أحدثه الوعد فى قلبها ,وتقلل من الألم الذى تعانى منه فى صدرها منذ أن أتخذت ذلك القرار الصعب.”
author: يسرا النوبي,

quote: “أيقن كلا منهما مدى عشقه للآخر وأن الصداقة قد تخلل من بينها الحب ليطغى على علاقتهما سويا ويرسم لهما ملامح أخرى للعلاقه”
author: يسرا النوبي,

quote: “My heart was beating in a symphony of love and happiness I had never felt before”
author: Zahra Alli,

quote: “There was something between us, an unspoken love, a bond beyond friendship, a destiny being forged by the stars and beyond”
author: Zahra Alli,

quote: “A poet, perhaps, could arrange words in a way that creates the itch of fear or the heaviness of dread. They could make an enemy of mud and damp boots and raise your pulse just at the mention of them. A poet might be able to push this word or that to mean something more than what has been ordained by our dictionary men. I am not a poet, my love.”
author: Pip Williams,

quote: “For that one person in life, we all break our rules.”
author: Garima Soni - words world

quote: “वो अनदेखा सा
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “बस नज़रों से सुनो
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “कुछ वक़्त
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “Only love that is born without condition, can cure us of all conditions.”
author: Broms The Poet,

quote: “It's a tragedy to fall in love, is it not?"
author: Renée Ahdieh,

quote: “अपनी आँखें झुकाते हुए मैंने कहा
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “What our love dreads the most
author: Laura Chouette,

quote: “But how do you know I’m the one?”, she asked. “Because if somehow I were to know I would leave this world tomorrow, you would be the one I would wish to dream of tonight.”
author: Broms The Poet,

quote: “We all play and dance to the tune that's in our minds and ears. And that's what makes life enjoyable for many of us.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Love...
author: Ma. Lowela Tondo Becaro

quote: “We all have secrets we never dare spill to anyone.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “I love you louder than my demons can scream.”
author: Nicole Pierman,

quote: “Love intensifies as it moves further away”
author: P.J. Bayliss

quote: “If the one you love when you close your eyes, is the one you adore when they open, you are living the dream.”
author: Broms The Poet,

quote: “We called our madness by other names in order to make it palatable. We called it passion, except on the days it soured and caught in our throats.
author: Mira Hadlow,

quote: “And somehow, the thunder in him silenced the thunder in me.”
author: Mira Hadlow,

quote: “There is no time without change and there is no life without time. Not believing in time is also not believing in change.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “There is nothing special or terrifying about devil worshipers. They are just individuals drunk with the love of life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The mind is the master, at the same time it acts as the best slave that never rests or sleeps.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love until you can feel nothing but Love.”
author: ELLE NICOLAI

quote: “Letting down someone who trusts you is worse than letting down someone who loves you.”
author: Garima Soni - words world

quote: “ได้มาหน้าชื่น เสียไปไม่ทุกข์ร้อน พึงสังวรทุกข์ไปไม่เกิดผล”
author: เอ๋อเหมย,

quote: “it's Really okay, If you fall in love with the person you want to protect.”
author: Pradip Bendkule

quote: “Love never dies but sometimes it grows up.”
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: “मैंने ख़ुदा को नहीं देखा
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “Caminó de espaldas hacia la avenida, hacia el lado del río. A los pocos pasos se detuvo, se asustó, y casi se enojó consigo mismo, cuando por encima del rumor de la lluvia y de los autos creyó escuchar un grito que traía su nombre.”
author: Eduardo Sacheri,

quote: “I have not forgotten you. You threw mud at me. Like an elephant I bask in it and still carry you on my skin. Only fools lose their memory. I lost you, I lost you, but you see, I can still walk on water.”
author: D.H. Landolfi

quote: “I may not be able to fill someone else but I have a responsibility to empty myself with the hope that it fills someone else. I may not be able to light up someone's lamp but I also have the responsibility of shinning my light with the hope that it lights someone else.”
author: Kingsley Opuwari Manuel

quote: “When the leaves start to fall, our heart beat starts to rise.”
author: B.K. Sweeting

quote: “There are all kinds of love in this world
author: Gurpreet Dhariwal,

quote: “बेवजह ही ;
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “एक कहकहा.....था
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “काश कभी ऐसा हो जाये
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “मेरी भीगी आँखों में
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “या कोई सलवट थी
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “उसकी पीठ को देखा तो
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “दिन उगता है तेरे ख़्याल से
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “एक ज़रा सा टुकड़ा धूप का
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “क्योंकि मेरे पास
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “And this was why lapses of judgement broke me. Because not knowing what it was like to kiss Luca didn’t hurt. But kissing him, feeling all those new emotions, then having to tear myself away from him? That took something from me.”
author: L.   Miles,

quote: “If you are looking for explanation in love, you are not really in love.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “The shadow is only the daughter of the light.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “बेवजह ही ;
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “इतना close तो मैं
author: Pushpindra Chagti Bhandari,

quote: “Mavelin realized there and then that her favorite part of Karen’s face were her eyes. She could stare into them and get lost in a world only the two of them could enter.”
author: Justin Villanueva,

quote: “Loving me isn’t easy, but it’s a glorious adventure and well worth the challenge.”
author: Ravenwolf,

quote: “A lovely fork called Fate,
author: B.K. Sweeting

quote: “Only pain is free.
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “Happiness is just like a butterfly. The more you run after him, the further he gets away from you. But as soon as you divert your attention, it slowly comes and is placed on your shoulder”
author: Ariel jabar

quote: “Togetherness is another name for progress, together forever, either as lovers or ashes.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Love is more than a memory, love is an existence.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Every lover is a fighter.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “We only need a mediator when we lack knowledge of the matter in question.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “God is the creator of everything. But He's the kind of source that has no source Himself.”

quote: “Love will get you killed, that’s why I show love so different.”

quote: “Time corrodes feelings like an acid; it destroys them in the routine of seconds, of minutes, always identical to themselves. But we were an interminable present, a shadow materialising, a ghost taking shape. To taste and smell you was beyond imagining. You were real. We were real, amidst the cackling of tourists, the stifling heat, the eyes of passersby watching us smiling, and the Fountain in the centre of the square spraying water between our comings and goings of sex and laughter.”
author: D. H. Landolfi

quote: “We were both wanderers, restlessness dripping from our wild lips like rain. And even if no place would ever truly be home for us, I found it in the way you held my hand that day.”
author: Marie-Kristin Hofmann,

quote: “I wish I knew how to keep the memories out of your head, sweetheart. If I knew, I would do it in a heartbeat.”

quote: “What could a man say? What did he say when the woman he loved, the woman he was admittedly obsessed with, told him she could change in the blink of an eye? That a monster once did things so horrendous to her she’d rather live knowing only a few weeks of her life rather than reclaiming all the years she had before.”

quote: “Show me what it’s like to be in love—
author: Cambria Hebert,

quote: “Forgetting the person who you Love is much Better than hating them.”

quote: “It's a blessing to have someone who understands that your anger comes from the pain in your heart.”

quote: “I, too, love to live unchallenged and alone—to live with nature—which, truly, I perceive to be a breathing and a speaking nature; there is a species of living in partnership with her to me. Some English poets do an excellent job of expressing these ideas.

quote: “To lovers out there ...
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

author: Jennifer West,

quote: “I managed to slowly move my eyes away from the monster to the boy who stood with him. Time stopped.”
author: Jennifer West,

quote: “Your trouble is my trouble, without you by my side all victory is vile.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “A life without love is but death in disguise.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “You are my sky, my land and my ocean. The breath of my life is you and my salvation.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “¨En el sueño, me gustaba pertenecer a esa bestia de la noche. Me estaba devorando y dándome una especie de placer sádico. Alimentaba la oscuridad interior que había crecido como un tumor dentro de mí.¨”
author: Raluca Mirela Petrescu,

quote: “¨La oscuridad lo succionaba
author: Raluca Mirela Petrescu,

quote: “The most important love is not for the Divine. The Divine is inevitable, inescapable. It doesn’t need love; it is love – in all its tiny, grand, whispering, explosive, destructive, birthing ways. The most important love is for people. They are what we must keep. ”

quote: “We love to be forgiven, but we hate to forgive others; unless they fall on their knees to worship us.”

quote: “No one can save a soul, but the Spirit of Love itself.”

quote: “Most of People Don't Know Perspective of Darkness until they Love Evil One.”

quote: “Grabbing her hand, he pressed it gently to his chest. His skin was warm to the touch, and she could slightly feel his pulse pounding against her palm.
author: J.M. Darhower,

quote: “প্রতিদিন ঘুম থেকে উঠে যাকে দেখি, তাকেই যদি ভালোবাসতে না পারি, তবে এজীবন বৃথা…! জীবনে অন্তত একবার নিজের সাথে প্রেমে পড়ুন, দেখবেন জীবনের পথে আসা মানসিক অবসাদ গুলি কাঁটিয়ে উঠা কতটা সহজ।”

quote: “प्यार तो अमर है, उमंग है, आशा है।

quote: “However well we got to know each other, there was always a magic. A mystery. We could lie in bed looking silently at each other, not needing to speak. Joe's eyes were never boring. He was never boring.”

quote: “I either want a love like poetry or no love at all.”

quote: “You can't force love, all you can do is, be vulnerable and reach out despite your insecurity. Whether the person of your heart responds back, is not in your hands, but a matter of cosmic serendipity.”

quote: “Once in a while, right in the middle of an ordinary life...Love comes along and brings you a Fairy Tale!”

quote: “You look like a Turner painting and I want to learn your textures with my fingertips. You are the most fascinating thing in this beautiful house. I'd like to introduce my fists to whoever taught you to stop talking about the things that interest you.”

quote: “Just like a fish that can’t live without water,
author: Mouloud Benzadi

quote: “Ever make toast? The act of browning bread. Apply butter or maybe jam afterward. Once finished, you can’t unmake it. You can’t change it back to bread. That’s what love is. Toast.”

quote: “Love should never be left to its own devices.”

quote: “I love you more than my past. I love you more than the obstacles the present is throwing our way. Because you are my future, and I'm going to love you forever because you are my always.”

quote: “I always believe that sometimes it would take long, but it's
author: Sapan Saxena,

quote: “But I’ve been trying so hard to be a different man; to be, if not kinder, then at the very least, better. I don’t want to lose the love I’ve come to cherish.”

quote: “A business isn’t successful overnight. You don’t get promoted in a week. Everything takes time. Everything that is important and good and worthwhile, takes time. I’m not the kind of man who doesn’t know that. Just looking at you makes me happy. Listening to you makes me happy. So come over here if you want, but only if you want

quote: “I went to the mosque, went to the church, nowhere did I find a trace of divinity. Then I came and stood in front of you, all that is divine manifested in font of me.”

quote: “It wouldn’t be GOD if He didn’t go beyond the limits of things men could do; and so He loved so wholly it swallows up, so deeply it sinks far, so widely it reaches all, so highly it cannot be attained else where; and to talk about how long His love is, is to never end His praise. He has loved us so perfectly indeed.”

quote: “She is a flower

quote: “Stop caring much about someone who wouldn't think twice before hurting you.”

quote: “Love is a ripple in the heart, a vibration in the heart, a throbbing, a sharing of whatsoever you are, a deep, intense urge to go and reach the other, to share your being and your delight and your song.”

quote: “We never choose to love. It just happens.”

quote: “I could see that he could taste the salt of her lips, each kiss like a summer wave breaking on an empty beach. She was the fragrant taste his mouth desired. She wanted it all -- lust, love, the deepest of kisses, with the added touch of the most savage of handlings. Together, they wanted to be loved through the language of an honest tongue, devoted heart, and exclusive eyes set only for one another. No matter if they had someone else, they would, in the end, have one another. A false image that they would never forget.”
author: W.M Angel,

quote: “Любовта е това, което кара времето да тече безмилостно бавно, когато сме разделени един от друг, и скандално бързо, когато се прегръщам. Любовта е да откраднеш час от и без това натоварено то си време, за да отидеш да видиш поне за малко човека, който те прави щастлива, знаейки, че това със сигурност ще направи и него щастлив. Любовта е да му донесеш шоколадов мъфин, понеже си сигурна, че той не е ял нищо от седмици, прекалено улица в мислите си за теб.”
author: Сибин Майналовски,

quote: “They keep bickering over whether there is life after death. I say, to hell with life after death, ask instead, is there life after love!”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Can you truly see nothing, see no one else, due to the light he still casts over your eyes?”

quote: “Love is like dust made of fine particles of solid matter- composed of many materials including dead skin cells of heart. A dust storm always blankets me and in the end the amount of plant pollen and animal fur tend to keep me safe.”

quote: “What is it about the fall that seems sentimental and romantic? There is something magical and mysterious about the way the leaves drop to
author: Corey M.P.,

quote: “The reason I am always happy. It is not because I have lot of money or I don't have stress or problems, But it is because I am doing what I want and what I love.”

quote: “Let me burn to ashes time and time again, so I may remove the shadows from your life's lane.”

quote: “Don’t assume that people who are in relationships are in love. To me, it’s all about how in touch a couple is with their sensuality, that’s the only sign of love.”

quote: “You are introducing chaos into my ordered world of cardiology. See this. This is your heart—a perfect pump.
author: Carina Alyce,

Everyone had disappeared from the universe except the young man whose hand I was holding, and everything that had ever been born and everything that had ever died existed where his hand touched mine. Everything the blue of
author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz,

quote: “Dante, Dante, Dante. He was like a heart that was beating in every pore of my body. His heart was beating in my heart. His heart was beating in my head. His heart was beating in my stomach. His heart was beating in my legs. His heart was beating in my arms, my hands, my fingers. His heart was beating in my tongue, my lips. No wonder I was trembling. Trembling, trembling, trembling.”

quote: “For we've all carried too much -
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “With gentleness and forgiveness, dismantle the scorn. A compassionate heart for others is important. Keep your life hate-free, and love the people around you. It is vital to remember this: kindness is everything. Let there be no animosity, but spread benevolence for each other.”

quote: “Is it an unseen force that propels you and me toward each other?

quote: “Sempre pensei, desde que me descobri e, mesmo antes, quando sentia que eu era diferente... e, depois de todos esses últimos anos, todas as maluquices que a minha cabeça faz... sempre pensei em mim como um problema que merecia ser escondido. Nunca confiei muito em mim mesmo, ou no que eu queria. Antes de você, eu deixava que tudo acontecesse comigo. Eu sinceramente nunca pensei que merecia escolher. - Sua mão se move, os dedos passando por um cacho atrás da orelha de Alex. - Mas você me trata como se eu merecesse.”

quote: “Priorities change and so does people”
author: Rehan Katrawale,

quote: “Love on today even if it stutters.”

quote: “Arranged marriage is literally an arrow to the heart. It pierces deep inside, but its fruits are still beautiful at the end.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love on today even if it stutters”
author: Felicia Miracle Hankins

quote: “I want to keep it forever. I want to love you the way I do now the rest of my life. Don't you understand... we'll lose it if we leave. I can't make an entire life disappear to start a new one. All I can do is try to hold onto to both. Help me. Help me not lose loving you.”
author: Robert James Weller

quote: “In the case of a charity, you must give without any conditions.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Something special may become unnecessary in the near future. The unnecessary becomes special too. Mood swings. That's why there is always a second chance in life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We all can touch the flame - but it's the moments we remain in it that burn us.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “The content structures of our existence, whether of mind or body, are helpful in our daily activities. Nevertheless, these can also be very manipulative and restrictive concerning conscious awakening. Thoughts and emotions can be excellent students of life. However, they cannot and should never be the teacher or master of this mystery.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “Yizhi gapes at me. Then a disbelieving laugh rolls out of him. "All right, let me make this clear: Wu Zetian, you inspire me. Whenever i lose hope that the world can change, I remember you. I remember how you fight for what you want, no matter what anyone says, no matter what stands in your way." He draws me into his arms and murmurs into my hair. "You're my polar star, I'll go wherever you guide me.”

quote: “If grief is the presence of love without a place to go, then being in love is the presence of mutually reciprocated love that is all encompassing and grabs the attention of every atom of your being. It captures all our senses, and everything comes to a screeching halt. The world slows down, and we are in a state of bliss. It hijacks our thoughts and impulses.”

quote: “Love after a time of loss can be a beautiful thing: it brings a new perspective, it decreases loneliness and increases companionship, and, for these reasons, it increases holistic wealth.”

quote: “Love is something that firmly grounds us in the present. I don’t know if you can get more mindful than when you are in a state of being in love.”
author: Keisha Blair,

quote: “Love is like a cocoon—like a coconut shell with the outer hardened husk that protects us from all external harms because of its high resistance to abrasion and the soft white inside core, full of flesh that envelops us with its softened, fragrant nutrients.”

quote: “Where can I find the true biography of God? All the so-called gods with autobiographies and biographies are not worthy to be worshipped.”

quote: “I still love you but I don't want you back.”

quote: “Enjoy Life with Love, Happiness, Laughter, and smiles; enjoy your journey and travel it well with acceptance in GOD. Remember, It is all those little steps you take with GOD that make your journey complete. So keep the faith in GOD and always walk by that faith.”

quote: “പോയ കാലങ്ങൾ, നഷ്ട്ടപെട്ട അവസരങ്ങൾ, തെറ്റിപ്പോയ തീരുമാനങ്ങൾ, ഒരിക്കലും തിരികെ വരുന്നില്ല, തിരുത്തപ്പെടാനായി. ഇതാണ് മനുഷ്യ ജീവിതത്തിന്റെ ഏറ്റവും വലിയ ദുരന്തത.”
author: Surendran K,

author: M.T. Vasudevan Nair,

quote: “If you've never received inspiration from escaping into nature or after taking a shower, now is a good time to start meditating.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The wiser we become, the more we do our best to keep a great distance between ourselves and love.”

quote: “According to the law of the oscillation of a pendulum. The stronger the love, the stronger the hatred whenever you decide to part ways with your loved one. Mood swings have to go through the laws of balance.”

quote: “Ye know what they always say. There are three types of men in a woman’s life: the one that ye marry, the one that ye screw, and the one that leaves ye.”

quote: “Do not love those who pray and do not hate those who fight for the security of your country. Because without the soldiers, you can't even find a single day to pray in peace.”

quote: “I watched The Sound of Music possibly a hundred times as a small girl. Everyone has their favourite or most memorable scene, mine was when the Baroness was with the Baron von Trapp out on the balcony that night. She saw how he was looking at Maria (the governess, Julie Andrews), and in those moments she chose to be graceful enough not to force his feelings. She told him that she could see the way he looks at her, and the way she looks at him, and she then chose to gracefully step aside. It's strange, but that's what I remembered the most as a child. I said to myself, that someday when I'm a woman, if I am ever with a man who falls in love with someone else, I would have the grace of the Baroness, enough to walk away. I always wanted to be the kind of person who lets people love each other.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “يا حبيبيتي أنتي جميلة وزي القمر وأللي مش عاجبو يتفلق. المشكلة مش فيكي أنتي. المشكلة فى محمد وأللي ذايو أللي بيبصو على ال Package. أسفة مش قصدي. أقصد أللي بيبصو على البنت من برة وبس ونسو أن فى حاجة أسمها مشاعر وأحاسييس وحب ... صدقيني يا أيناس هيجي اليوم وتلاقية. هتلاقي أللي يحس ويقدر ويحبك أكبر حب فى الدني"ا.”

quote: “نفسي أعيش قصة حب. نفسي أتحب وأحب. فى كل مرة لما بتصادف وبعجب بصديق لية فى الكلية وبحاول أقرب منة بلاقية بيبعد وبيهرب ... أخرهم كان محمد فؤاد. مش المغني طبعاً. دى طالب فى سنة تانية هندسة. لما حس أني ميالة لية قلهالي بصراحة. قالي يا أيناس أنتي أطييب أنسانة قبلتها. بس المشكلة أني مش حاسك. لما سألتو عن السبب. تحولت أجابتة من أجابة صريحة لآجابة بايخة وسخيفة. رد علية وقالي بصي لنفسك وسابني ومشي ... على قد ما كانت أجابتة سخيفة على قد ما كانت أجابة منطقية. جوبتلي على أسئلة كثيرة كانت دايماً بدور فى بالي. أهم سؤال فيهم أنا لية دايماً بحب ومابتحبش "؟”

quote: “Maybe a crush can be like a book you find at the library. First, you're drawn in by the cover. Then, you try to find out what it's about, so you read a little description on the jacket. Maybe, it's says exactly what you want to read, or maybe it's mysteriously vague and even more curious. Either way, you decide that you're going to choose this book knowing very little about it, but you have this excited feeling that if you dive in, you might be swept away.”

quote: “You're my best friend, too. I have more fun with you than anyone else, and I like how you challenge me. I like being around you and when I'm not around you, I'm always thinking about you. I want you to know I'm thinking about you all the time”

quote: “I won't think any less of you if you break it”

quote: “Practice gratitude and remember the best of memories with your partner during your tough times with them.

quote: “Is love all about cute selfies and heart eyes? Have you ever thought about what it really means to fall in love with someone’s soul? Are you stuck somewhere between wanting to be loved and wanting to pass your time with someone?

quote: “No matter what they say or name it, I believe that there is a truth about love that we all need to know to lead a life of contentment.

quote: “No matter what, you should not forget that you both are individuals with different opinions, views and preferences. Expecting your partner to read your mind every time is not right!

quote: “Love is sad, just like the hate, makes you want to kill or die, 'cause love is love!”

quote: “If you feel like this time you won’t survive the pain, remember that you will. You may not like it. There may be times when you don’t even want to, but survive you will. And thrive. And love again. This I know to be true.”

quote: “I hope that real love and truth are stronger in the end than any evil or misfortune in the world...”
author: David Copperfield

quote: “Too hot is not good, too cold is still not good. Everything should be well balanced in life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “War can only be defeated by the arms of love.”
author: Dan Barron

quote: “Sharing is everything”
author: Dido Stargaze

quote: “Purposely giving up one's freedom to love was completely different from being born with it already stolen away.”
author: Sarah Henning,

quote: “Pure love can be seen as a torch of the heart that will guide you through the thick darkness and confusions of life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “You deserve someone who looks at you the way you look at them. I hope you stop fighting for the wrong people.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “In our generation, we complicated everything, including relationships. We imagine that as long as we have to pray, love will find us in our dwellings.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Those who focus too much on respect might end up being talkative and flattering in the near future.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Find the love you deserve!
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “When in love, a bridge is constructed between two souls. Each year the bridge evolves and grows stronger and at a point in the future appears indestructible; when betrayal appears in the form of dynamite, the bridge becomes gravely damaged. And the betrayer and betrayed must determine if it can ever be reconstructed. Regrettably, the scars and cracks remain; some visible, and others hidden beneath the water.
author: Gandolfo – (RJ Intindola) – 1973

quote: “Always remember, the little things can mean everything in a relationship. The little things that you do for your partner always counts and matters the most.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “Patience keeps the relationship healthy, strong and happy. Sometimes, just allowing your partner to be themselves means everything.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “The more you imitate God, the closer you get to Him. So He is the giver? Also learn how to start sharing with others.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The main objective of the donation is to help humanity and the forgotten or abandoned souls.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I believe that poverty is just an accumulation of bad mentalities through previous generations.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “This beast called body is never satisfied no matter how many times you feed it, or how delicious your food tastes in your mouth. It will always ask for something tomorrow.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “In reality, there is no scientific or religious approach to curing poverty. Even some charity organizers end up taking all the donations intended for the less fortunate.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “By curing poverty or ending hunger, we will end up with zero percent of thieves in our societies.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The more you learn, the more you know about yourself and the more fearless you end up becoming; or have more confidence in your skin.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To fear another human being is to sin against yourself.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “It is only inspiration that can bring wisdom to an uneducated or empty head.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “You know, he is going to stay forever every single time he fights for you, for the relationship and not with you.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “When you love someone who loves you softly in a kind and gentle manner, who loves you fiercely with a heartfelt and powerful intensity, you stop living in fear.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “When you love someone who loves you bravely in a way that shows a willingness to face and endure danger or pain courageously, you stop living a life of lies.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “You know, he is going to stay forever every single time he fights for you, for the relationship and not with you.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “Love stays only between those two people who are truly and fully committed to each other. Love is for people who treat each other with respect, for those who always have a feeling of deep admiration for their partner for their abilities, qualities and achievements.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “When love stays, your partner helps you to grow. They will not make you ‘feel less’ on a purpose. They don’t end up abusing you with their words or actions.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “When love stays, you laugh together, cry together and stay together. The arguments would only be for the better future, for the better life. The fights won’t happen between you two but for you both.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “I hope you fall for someone who treats you the way you treat them, I hope you fall in love with someone who loves you the way you love them.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “One day, I really wish that you find a person who loves you exactly the way you always wanted to be loved and the one who doesn’t make you fight for it.”
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “This time, I hope you start caring for yourself more than anyone else, I hope you settle for someone who don’t leave you in tears of pain but the tears of joy, the one who doesn’t always bring out the anger in you but just the happiness within you, the one who doesn’t choose to collapse your world with negativity, unnecessary drama or with their complicated words.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “Love is not all hearts, butterflies in the stomach and smiling couple selfies. Love is not just a fantasy land, I believe that couples in a long-term relationship would one day surely hit the unromantic milestone and that’s when, little things starts to matter more than ever before.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “Showing your respect, your love and just letting your partner know how much they mean to you through your words and actions are the supreme activities.
author: Jyoti Patel

quote: “No flowers,'' He kisses my cheek. ''So noted, rosebud boy.''
author: Rainbow Rowell,

quote: “When looking for a better half, LOVE seems to be at the farthest of personal considerations. You just wanna find one whom you will rhyme with. Rhythm fills your world with the right motivation for growth and living. So, finding a good better half is based on luck.”
author: DON SANTO

quote: “The world is created for all human beings to enjoy life. Adam did not have a tribe.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I forget that the world can narrow down to two people, a moment of vulnerability and trust. To a moment of love that seems to outshine the rest.”
author: Brigid Kemmerer,

quote: “We're two magnets at the point of colliding. But rather than pull back from him, I relish this impending collision. I want to shatter all space between us.”
author: A.E. King,

quote: “For humans, dead or alive, change cannot be avoided.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Adam was too lazy and cautious. But Eve who came after him dared to go and get the forbidden fruit.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “We have to thank our mother Eve. Without her, we wouldn't be here enjoying life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Only those who are overly cautious and haters of progress will always be against technological development.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Wealth can still bring you much closer to your Creator. Since you will have plenty of time to worship and relax, instead of sweating just to create daily cash flow.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “A wise man does not wait to be given, but to always give first.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “All that doesn’t let me sleep; is my coffee or you.”
author: Vikrmn: CA Vikram Verma,

quote: “LOVE AND TIME FLIES BECAUSE LOVE IS THE GREATEST OF ALL TIME”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “ONE LOVE IS BETTER THAN TWO WOMEN”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “LIFE MAY COME AND LIFE MAY GO BUT LOVE GOES ON FOREVER”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “One who has never been in love might mistake either infatuation or a mixture of affection and sexual attraction for being in love. But when the ‘real thing’ happens, there is no doubt.”
author: Sheldon Vanauken

quote: “The price of a successful relationship is devotion. Devotion is, essentially, commitment to something we value. What are we devoted to? Surely not what another person wants. I think most people would agree that being devoted to that would be problematic even with the best of people. So, what exactly are we devoted to? We are devoted to the well-being of another person. And we are devoted to the wellbeing of the relationship. We honour the value of the other person and we honour the worth of the relationship.”
author: Donna Goddard,

quote: “To lovers out there ….
author: De philosophe DJ Kyos

quote: “No wounds are permanent. All will eventually heal. So as the pain; all the heartaches will fade away.”
author: Syed Qassim Acabo

quote: “If you want the best from a woman,treat her well. Good women are everywhere”
author: Gugu Mofokeng,

quote: “We don't attract what we like or despise, but we attract what we are constantly thinking about. If you are thinking about pain or happiness, then you should have your share of it.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Being smitten awakens one's eagerness to fill and end the day with love, so they may wake and do it all over again for the one who holds their heart.”
author: Martika Shanel,

quote: “Love, my darling girl, is not a blood sport.
author: Heather Demetrios,

quote: “Anytime you start to imagine being the son or daughter of God, then now is a good time to go back to your family tree. Also check your chronological age.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Whenever books seem so boring, it's a good time to turn to nature as the best teacher. This is the true path of spirituality or the discovery of reality.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The only cure for failure is to plan all the way to the very end of the journey.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “If you continue to visualize things in the past, you are unlikely to make much progress in the present and the future.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love is the only key to open the doors of paradise.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Money is a neutral thing. It means that it can be the main source of your miseries or your happiness. In the wrong hands, it is only harmful, but beneficial in the right hands.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The only way to get closer to God is to imitate Him and not associate Him in any way.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I hope there's mystery and poetry in your life.
author: Rolf van der Wind

quote: “A veces, perdemos mucha parte de nosotros mismos por las personas que amamos.”
author: Claire Contreras,

quote: “Your journey to heaven is coming
author: Susie Clevenger,

quote: “¿Es mejor amar y haber perdido o no haber amado nunca?”
author: Jana Aston,

quote: “El verdadero matrimonio empieza antes del día de la boda. Y los esfuerzos del matrimonio continúan mucho después de que termine la ceremonia. Un breve momento y el trazo de una pluma es todo cuanto se necesita para crear el vínculo legal del matrimonio, pero hace falta una vida entera de amor, compromiso, perdón y transigencia para que un matrimonio sea duradero y eterno.”
author: Jamie McGuire,

quote: “LOVE IS ALWAYS CORRUPTED BY PLEASURE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “LOVE WILL FIRST KISS YOU AND THEN HIT YOU”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Love Is What You Feel, Say & Do”
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: “I have learned that deep kisses can make time stand still; a touch can soothe your soul, and a smile, can warm your heart.”
author: R.J. Intindola

quote: “Definitivamente, lo sé. Sé que por mucho que te esfuerces y quieras que funcione, si va mal, irá mal. Sé que puedes querer a alguien, pero eso no significa que seas su media naranja. Y sé que, por extrañas que sean las circunstancias, cuando descubres el amor, tienes que aferrarte a él, cuidarlo y no dejarlo ir.”
author: Katy Evans,

quote: “Allá donde vaya, tú siempre estarás conmigo. Tu imagen vive en mi corazón.”
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,

quote: “If you love her, let her know; if you are not sure about her, let her go. If you love him, it will show; if you are not sure about him, let him go. Waste no time attaching to detach...only grasp what you desire to hold to - otherwise, why even reach for what you've no need to cherish in your hold? This is folly, this is not the action of the wise and the old. Cease reaching for what tempts and reach for what rewards lest your hands continue to callous from your relentless need to reach for what most assuredly burns.”
author: Sai Marie Johnson

quote: “My science is you, my art is you. The morning of my mind is you.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “LOVE WITH THE INTENTION TO UNDERSTAND, NOT WITH THE INTENTION TO UNDERTAKE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “LOVE IS PERMISSIVE, DON’T EMPHASIZE ON MAKING IT POSSESSIVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Mirar a una persona a los ojos y saber que ella es todos tus motivos para volver siempre a casa.”
author: Cristina Prada,

quote: “Mi abuela me dijo una vez que el amor y el odio son el mismo sentimientos bajo circunstancias distintas. La pasión es la misma. El dolor es el mismo. ¿Y eso tan raro que te arde en el pecho? Lo mismo.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “Aceptar el hecho de que amabas a alguien era mucho más difícil que enamorarte de esa persona. Llevaba tiempo. Y requería valor.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “El amor, el auténtico, era dejarse guiar por la persona amada con los ojos vendados y las manos atadas, y tener la capacidad de entregar las riendas sin miedo a equivocarte. No había mayor acto de sumisión que rendirse al verdadero amor.”
author: Lena Valenti,

quote: “El amor te empuja a hacer locuras y cosas irracionales. El amor y la muerte están conectados por una cuerda invisible. Tira demasiado fuerte y te habrás ido.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “No hay nada en la tierra que pueda superar el alivio que se siente cuando alguien te coge la mano en la oscuridad, cuando más perdido y asustado estás.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Estar enamorado significa que vas a arriesgarte por completo, hasta las partes más sensibles, a que te hieran.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Porque, comprendí de repente, a veces es más necesario reunirse a medio camino, pero en otras ocasiones lo que quieres es satisfacer a la otra persona yendo hacia ella. Y eso..., eso es amor.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Y la verdad que me había enseñado el amor era que sólo se puede ser fuerte una vez que se es lo suficientemente valiente para romperse, y dejar que el lugar que ocupó el dolor se llene de amor en tu interior.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Love is a greatest strength, you can win the world by love or for love”
author: Lokesh Umak

quote: “Romance is important in the daily life. Not just love and relationships, those are easy. But the act of doing something, working on your art, listening to the world around you. The old world lives, so remember to love it, the world, the actions.”
author: W.M.Angel

quote: “Romance is important in the daily life. Not just love and relationships, those are easy. But the act of doing something, working on your art, listening to the world around you. The old world lives, so remember to love it, the world, the actions”
author: W.M Angel

quote: “A MAN DOES NOT SEEK HIS WOMAN, HIS LOVE SEEKS HIS WOMAN”
author: J. Ruby

quote: “A TRUE LOVE IS NOT CORRUPTED BY MARRIAGE”
author: J. Ruby

quote: “Happiness--is that what this is? The word doesn't feel strong enough. I forget, so often, that the most powerful moments in my life rarely end up being about my kingdom, or a war, or about even my subjects. I forget that the world can narrow down to two people, a moment of vulnerability and trust. To a moment of love that seems to outshine the rest.”
author: Brigid Kemmerer,

quote: “Love is enough. Its society's views and old-world thinking that broke everything.”
author: Sajni Patel,

quote: “How do you know it's love and not obsession?”
author: Jeffrey Brown,

quote: “You will only look for past events when the present is unsatisfactory. The secret to enjoying the present moment is to make it more satisfying than the past. Go beyond the limits.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The power of love is so strong; to the point where you want to do something after knowing it won't be good for you.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Everyone thinks and imagines that life is easier on the other side. Their minds swing like a pendulum.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The facts are only beneficial for survival in bodily wandering. Apart from that, you are left on your own.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “¿Cómo describirías el amor en menos de 140 caracteres? Respuesta: Como si alguien estuviera apretándote el corazón, pero no quisieras que te lo soltara porque entonces el dolor sería todavía peor.”
author: Claire Contreras,

quote: “Las verdaderas historias de amor no terminan nunca.”
author: Claire Contreras,

quote: “Disabilities mean nothing if you have a loving parent
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “Unconditional love must be provided
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “Only repetition with a goal in mind can truly lead to mastery. Sometimes you can keep rehearsing without learning anything new.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I denounced the body and the mind. Still, that doesn't mean I should refrain from feeding the beast.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Who are the best sinners between corporeal and spiritual beings?”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Anytime a son-in-law does something wrong, he can easily become a son-out-law.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “According to the ideology of reincarnation, Earth is both your heaven and your hell. Everything is paid for and rewarded here.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “You can imagine or pretend to know your partner, but you will still be surprised at the end of the day.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The ego can be found in the heart, which in turn is the mother of all desires.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Wealth or no wealth, you can't keep someone else under your feet forever. False love doesn't care about the environment.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “When the give-and-take loop is interrupted for so long, one cannot expect that link to stay attached. This will result in separation or even divorce in the marriage.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Time and effective communication are the best medicine in love. Consider all the imbalances and get back to normal. Literally fixing your love life with your partner.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “You can only understand the uselessness of money if you find yourself in a desert with a handful of a bag of money. You will starve to death.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “God can give you anything, but not make you immune to temptation and be patient in life. This is where freedom of choice, free will, comes into play.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Without women there is no party and celebration. This is when all the fun begins. They are partying animals by nature.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “God does not accept a challenge unless victory is already guaranteed.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “REALITY IS BOTH TO LOVE AND TO FORGET”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “PLEASURE SHOULD NOT BE COUNTED FOR LOVE AND LOVE SHOULD NOT BE ACCOUNTED FOR PLEASURE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “A veces, ni siquiera te das cuenta de que algo no te conviene hasta que llega alguien y te cambia, te hace querer ser más.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Eso es el amor. El sentirse tan perdido que, cuando recibes todo lo que el otro quiere darte, el sentimiento es tan grande que te sobrecoge. Una emoción contradictoria que te llena por dentro hasta dejarte sin aliento.”
author: Cristina Prada,

quote: “El dolor no termina cuando pierdes a la persona que amas. El dolor está en la pérdida, en verla con otra persona y no poder hacer nada porque sabes que no puedes darle la vida que se merece.”
author: Claire Contreras,

quote: “El amor debería hacerte sentir bien contigo mismo y con la persona que eres cuando estás con quien quieres. El amor debería hacerte sentir aceptado tal como eres.”
author: Katy Evans,

quote: “You’re Hell’s little whore, aren’t you?”
author: Harley Laroux,

quote: “We use people
author: Lili Reinhart,

quote: “I want you. Irrevocably.”
author: Harley Laroux,

quote: “Never allow your mind to decide what you have, when your heart knows what you want.”
author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 1984

quote: “Eternal Love is carried in the hearts of one man & one woman through many lifetimes.”
author: Lala Agni,

quote: “Love, what is love?”
author: Anne Frank,

quote: “I used to think that love was the greatest reason to be human, I truly believed that. But now, it has dawned on me, that love may in fact be just like any other aspect of life: something that could go extremely well but also could go terribly wrong. We think that love acts as a guarantee for good things; but it doesn't. It's equal parts the possibility of Hell as much as it is the possibility of Heaven. And this realisation kind of makes you a little sad, in a way. That at the end of the day, you must always be your own home and your own Heaven.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “The last words you should say to anyone at night—whether it’s your spouse, your children, your dog, your cat or yourself—are “I love you.”
author: Shawn  Wells,

quote: “Love everyone, but don’t give your heart to just anyone. Your heart is not a gift, it is the prize.”
author: Dr Toyin Omofoye

quote: “(...) well, there's a girl I used to know, and I wasn't sure if I should find her and talk to her or if I should just forget about it.
author: Neil Gaiman,

quote: “Happiness, love, contentment, peace, fulfillment and freedom will be attained only after self-knowledge in the realization of God; The very source of everything we experience is within us that which needs nothing from the outside world but needs to realize the true nature of the self. There is nothing outside that can satiate the hunger of your soul.”
author: Shiva N

quote: “You know I love you,” he murmurs. “Always. No matter what. Forever.”
author: K. Webster,

quote: “I always can feel you wherever you are because we are sharing One Soul.”
author: Lala Agni,

quote: “Seeing his face so soft and full of concern made her heart melt like sealing wax over her father’s letters. And Peyton had already stamped his mark into the tender mess.”
author: Arlem Hawks,

quote: “Love lights the way.”
author: Adrienne Posey

quote: “Love is the strongest magic.”
author: Adrienne Posey,

quote: “Love heals, fulfills, and completes. It is the one true magic.”
author: Adrienne Posey,

quote: “Love is to hold on to one another, build a life together, and let go of everything else.”
author: Adrienne Posey

quote: “Love changes as you get older. It isn't just about that initial rush of feeling; it's about the capacity for mutual respect and compromise. It's about how two people take care of each other, humor each other, and trust each other.”
author: K.F. Breene,

quote: “If you’re looking for love, look inside first.”
author: DrB!

quote: “- لَيتَكَ لم تأتِ قَطُّ يا حبيبي.
author: غادة العبسي,

quote: “When you love what you have, you have everything you need in every aspects.”
author: Dembe Michael

quote: “TURN YOUR PAIN INTO SENSE;
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “I don't know what steps I'm going to take I don't know what kind of truth I'm looking for—I just know that not knowing it is intolerable for me.”
author: Wahid Bhat

quote: “How difficult it is to be sighted in a blind society!”
author: Wahid Bhat

quote: “No hay ningún amor que sea completamente recíproco. Nunca es equilibrado. Nunca es justo. Siempre hay una parte que ama más. Y es mejor que no te conviertas en esa parte, porque es la que peor lo pasa.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “Quizá no necesitabas conocer a alguien para quererlo. Solo necesitabas saber qué corazón tenía.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “Lo que te degrada es el hecho de arrodillarte en sí. Pero no te humillas cuando te arrodillas por alguien que se merece tu dignidad.”
author: L.J. Shen,

quote: “NOBODY FORGETS THE FIRST KISS AND THE FIRST GOAL”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Aku sibuk menata hati,
author: Chachacillas

quote: “Her first love was like lavender,
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Love being the strongest thing in this Universe isn't always a good thing. It just implies that broken hearts can break worlds.”
author: Nenad Almaj,

quote: “Without Love, we are just bodies, like biological robots. Love makes us truly alive! Love turns the light on inside our hearts & makes us shine!”
author: Lala Agni,

quote: “The silence of a wise man is enough to defeat a fool.”
author: Shiva Negi

quote: “All I’ve ever wanted
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “I am nobody, nobody is me,
author: Anupama Krishnan,

quote: “Aroused Passion
author: Rumi,

quote: “Twin Flames are the united creative energies of masculine & feminine. They are the energetic flow of total unconditional love.”
author: Lala Agni,

quote: “Love gives the mind freedom to be creative, and creativity is the intelligence used to create beautiful things from the heart.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris, Rebecca Jones

quote: “The sense of freedom you feel of being love can bring many endless positive affirmations forming a beautiful mind. Positive thinking and self-empowerment is a factor in the circle of love. What a fantastic sense of freedom love creates in your heart, bringing extraordinary creativity for a better life. However, we must never forget that without love, we have nothing.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “Love comes much easier when we set our egos aside.”
author: Charles F Glassman

quote: “PLEASURE IS HONORABLE BUT LOVE IS NOBLE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “GOOD LOVE IS OFTEN ANNOYING, BAD LOVE NEVER IS”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “LOVE A THOUSAND TIMES BUT MARRY ONCE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “An accidental visit
author: Ekaterina Yakovina

quote: “All I ever need is one sweet day and a good view with you.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “If a marriage is a loveless pretense, & kept only for social status, both will have to face a choice: Pretense or Sincerity. Love or Status. In Cosmic Law, Love is the most sacred force!”
author: Lala Agni,

quote: “I resemble a murder scene.
author: Cynthia Cisneros,

quote: “WHEN LOVE RAINS, THE RAINBOW APPEARS”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “IN THE BATTLE BETWEEN HEARTS, THE LOVE GET SQUASHED”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “BEFORE YOU MAKE LOVE, YOU FIRST MUST HAVE AN AFFAIR BETWEEN THE HEARTS”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “My love dances quietly -
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “I love you
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “If you love her, be a King and treat her as a Queen”
author: Thanga Durai

quote: “If you love her, be a King and treat her as a Queen”
author: Thangadurai

quote: “Don't study about love. It is a feeling you have to feel it.”
author: Thangadurai

quote: “In love, both of them learn a lot to understand each other.”
author: Thangadurai

quote: “IT TAKES A LIFETIME TO RAISE A LOVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “TIME WAITS FOR LOVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “GOD, TRUTH, LOVE, AND TIME PRESENT NO EVIDENCE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “So how do I overcome my fear of vulnerability and intimacy?"
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “I could not believe how much pain was crackling through the air, generated simply by Mayya's being there. Haloes of light embraced that presence. If I were to just put my hand out, I felt, I could touch those matchless haloes ever so gently.”
author: Jokha Alharthi,

quote: “Life is nothing but an opportunity for love to blossom.
author: Osho

quote: “Yes, there is something about sitting alone in the dark that reminds me how lonely I am and how far the two of us are. Not long ago I thought we could swallow all the stars, you and me. Now I look at the night, and it looks cold, you took the warmth of the sky with you and left only the emptiness for me to fall and fade.”
author: Rolf van der Wind

quote: “Sunrise and sunset are all the same from an observer's point of view. As life is the same at birth and at death. The true Self continues.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love is a door to the soul, it opens when you love someone. The more you love, the more you can communicate, and the more pain you can receive.”

quote: “IF YOU CAN’T LOVE LONGER, LOVE DEEPER”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Love shared is no sin.”
author: Ellis Peters,

quote: “The word LOVE begins and ends with the word LOVE”

quote: “Music is the only medicine I know of in which overdose is allowed. Its one sound has the power to mend millions of souls and refresh the hopeless at the same time.”
