quote: “Most of the people are placing too much emphasis of their happiness on price, rather than on value.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The smile fades where love ends.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Only a persuasive tone can kill two birds with one stone.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “One wife is justified to the common men. But the higher you climb the ladder of power and success, the more women you'll meet along the way.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “There are only two types of people in this world: those who die for freedom and those who died for their religions. Both are considered martyrs.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Relationship is like squeezing an orange and throwing away the rind.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The more possessions you have, the more attention and thieves you will attract towards you.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “When you like someone or something, it is an affection for it. When you love someone or something, it is the affection for its soul.”
author: Silenus Poetry,

quote: “He may be a star but she was the sun”
author: viridianatnight,

quote: “IF YOU WANT TO GO FOR LOVE, GO TOGETHER; IF YOU WANT TO GO FOR PEACE, GO ALONE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “LOVE BUT DON’T THROW IT IN PAIN”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “I promied myself that I won't hurt it again by falling in love.”
author: jaanaky vigneswaran

quote: “The word courses through me ̶ a lover’s poison ̶ and I feel dizzy with exhilaration.”
author: Soulla Christodoulou,

quote: “He sends me a poem; red roses whispering passion, white roses breathing love…”
author: Soulla Christodoulou,

quote: “Within seconds her dappled curvy silhouette moves towards me. Our bodies collide, skin on skin...”
author: Soulla Christodoulou,

quote: “I am. And so are you. We’re both real,’ she says in a way that touches every inch of me and despite the rush of fireworks bursting inside of me this is where peace lies.”
author: Soulla Christodoulou,

quote: “It’s in our breath, our touch, our scent.
author: Soulla Christodoulou,

quote: “FALL IN LOVE, YOU WILL STAND UP IN HEAVEN”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “IT’S BETTER TO LIGHT THE LOVE THAN CURSE THE MARRIAGE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “A LOVE THAT COMPLAINS IS AFRAID OF REASONING”
author: J. Ruby

quote: “The journey into love was so effortless and graceful; the journey out such a long and laboured climb”
author: Clare Chambers,

quote: “I kept our memories in me while I watched you lose your grasp of ours.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “Love is there if you need anything”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “Sleeping is useless if you don't come in my dreams,
author: Niloy Shouvic Roy

quote: “I love the silent hour of night, Sandy wanted the sunshine never to end. She loves living in the city, I long to be away from it. I love kissing at night, she thinks kissing in the dark is not the same. Somehow the differences unite us, they pull us together.”
author: Rolf van der Wind

quote: “At the right time, all the missing pieces will come into the right place again.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “Ocean waves remind me of our laughter
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “What's in the body, even an animal can love a body, it takes a human to love the person!”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “बरसों पुराने खत को मैंने पढ़ा और जला दिया,
author: Kavi lala ram seju

quote: “A heart can be broken numerous times and completely repaired by one soul.”
author: R.J. Intindola

quote: “If I cheated on my spouse or partner, and they made the choice to stay with me regardless, I would leave that person. I will never be perceived as someone who needs a nice warm bath to come home to after rolling around outside in the grass; a coddled person, an infantile person, a person who's choices are perceived as the mistakes of a toddler, only needing to be slapped on the hand and then coddled. That would kill the relationship for me, that would kill everything.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Love is the wine as old as time, which quenches our lonely longing.”
author: John Mark Green

quote: “Love is free but its rewards are priceless”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “fame with love is the desire of anyone”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “deeds deliver you to everlasting life or no life at all”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “More inside and outside of you work out together to make you”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “happen to become my existence to give always love”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “Love is inside each one of us. Your childhood proofs it”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “Feeding an ant with love is better than feeding an elephant without”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “I am not asking you to walk away from your path, but you cannot stop me from changing mine to be near you!”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “You can't force love - either you force, or you love.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “You don't fall in love because it's logical, you fall in love because it makes absolutely no sense.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “You may or may not get the body, knowing this, if you can love a person without any hesitance, that my friend is the love of a civilized human, all others are mere actions of a good-looking animal.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Where there is control, there can't be love, where there is love, there can't be control.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “A Dingbat Lover (The Sonnet)
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “How to Love (The Sonnet)
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Give me your body or not, I don't care. I just wanna be there to wipe your every tear.”
author: Abhijit Naskar,

quote: “Grow your relationship in the presence of GOD and always pray for guidance. You can't take love for granted. Idolize your relationship and keep nurturing the love you have for each other. It's critical for both hearts to make an effort to produce entertainment for the soul. A happy heart brings a lot of joy, and those pleasures create unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “Love is everything in a relationship and needs to be nurtured, creating unforgettable memories.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “I know things might not work,' I said. 'And I know it's scary, but the things that are worth it are. It feels right.' [. . . ] It was like swimming under the stars, like sleeping outside, like climbing a tree in the dark and seeing the view. It was scary and safe and peaceful and exciting, all at the same time.”
author: Morgan Matson,

quote: “Come To Me As You’re
author: Pratibha Malav,

quote: “And I just let those little things slip out of my mouth, words like I miss you. Please come back and see how much I do. Listen to the soft voice in your heart, all those little things that made up the greatness of our love.”
author: Rolf van der Wind

quote: “Let us love out loud every chance we get; believe in everything we feel; and have faith in where we are.”
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “Aroma of her bosom touched my soul”
author: Mahiraj Jadeja,

quote: “You see, love is not a straight line. A continuous fairy tale of bliss throughout your life. It's like waves on the ocean. Your love can easily survive the small or medium size swells but when a hurricane hits, that is the true test of your love and your partner's love, for each other.”
author: James Hauenstein

quote: “He knew he loved her; he knew it to his core. He loved her for her kindness, her ability to laugh both at him and at herself, and her intelligence. But most of all, he loved her for the feeling he had when he sat next to her on his couch in silence or woke up next to her in bed, that feeling of peace and happiness. That he was with someone who understood him and everything about him. That everything was right with the world.”
author: Jasmine Guillory,

quote: “WAS THIS WHAT LOVE WAS? Being happy when you thought about someone; wanting to never stop thinking abou tthem, even when you were fighting; having every damn thing in the grocery store remind you of them, from diapers to sour cream; wanting to be a better writer and friend and person because of how they were and how they made you feel; wanting to be with them, all the time, even though you kept fighting it.”
author: Jasmine Guillory,

quote: “Acceptance and non-attachment are essential in the experience of fully living life.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “The activities of our existence confuse and cause fear. This is because we base everything on temporary superficiality and details. Thus, we define our life experience as something to reach with strenuous effort. Mind Conditioning overshadows our life experience. So, most people view balance and harmony as a fantasy or paradise. Furthermore, the majority of people think or belief that we can only reach this paradise through mind details. And, still very prevalent is the thought or belief that materialistic things will give us happiness and peace.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “Until the heart can see the future of the person you fall in love with, love will always be blind”
author: James Hauenstein

quote: “UNDERSTANDING LIFE AND LOVE IS THE QUALITY OF A PURE SOUL”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Duše nikada nisu bile ograničene vremenom.”
author: Nora Foks,

quote: “Mislim da sam spreman."
author: Nora Foks,

quote: “Break my heart' he said. 'Break it into pieces I give you permission”
author: Cassandra Clare,

quote: “People can only love you from their own capacity to love. From their own well of love. I think that the greatest pains we've experienced in life, are those that come as a result of not understanding that we don't all share the same well. You can be loving from a well that's oceans deep, while another person has a well the size of a laundry pail. It's not their fault. It's not your fault either. But their pail isn't going to turn into an ocean and your ocean isn't going to turn into a pail. You have to find the people who swim at the same depths as you do. But it's also about the taste of the water; you see, someone can love you with an ocean's depth of water but you just don't like saltwater; you're a freshwater creature. That's still okay. When love isn't enough, that's okay. You have to wait for the depths and the tastes that match your own.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Everything is one presence. Universal consciousness is energy. And, this vibrating flow becomes more aware of itself through the self-consciousness of objects in the universe.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “Only active observation of the mind and our inner universe can alter how we interact with people, things, and situations. And ultimately this decides how we live life. Living life is not about the content details of living. Rather, life is the conscious experience of living.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “Conscious living may offer us a new perspective regarding our daily activities and understanding of how everything unfolds. Does a feather fight against the wind or define the wind as being its fate? Both are unlikely simply because the feather is experiencing the natural flow of the wind. It does this without interpretation or definition. The feather is one with the now of this moment because it allows life to flow through it and the wind to move it.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “We have mostly forgotten how easy it is just to live and experience the totality of life. However, people are awakening to this fact more than ever before in our history. There is a shift occurring worldwide. Thus, this transformation has the potential to blossom into an era of conscious evolution for our species.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “Imagine yourself as a feather gliding through the universe. You, as a conscious being, have the ability to allow yourself to float unrestricted in this dimension. Yes, you and the feather are one as the universe becomes conscious through your aware presence.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “We emphasize the difference between masculine and feminine. Thus, we seldom acknowledge that both are part of one essence of being.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “We should not define, nor limit, the experience of life with mind details. Therefore, acceptance and non-attachment are essential in the experience of fully living life. Walk the path of life with consciousness as a walking stick. Thus, you will always walk a path that is known and true.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “What is your relationship with the mind and your inner universe? This is the key question in consciously awakening to a state of deeper presence.”
author: Steve Leasock,

quote: “A smattering of kisses are due.”
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “A thoroughbred woman doesn't have time to hobbyhorse-around, but all the rest of her days for that no-training-required; tomfoolery-aside; refined mate.
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “His headlights were intercepted with great purpose, said the deer.”
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “Her headlights were intercepted with great purpose, said the deer.”
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “A kiss
author: Bella Bloom

quote: “... the vocabulary of love was so tired.”
author: Peter Straub,

quote: “True love is like a tuner, it can hurt and heal. True love hurts when it comes time to tune the inside to reality and it heals when it comes to mending a soul.”
author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

quote: “Because I realized today that that’s what I did to you. I forced you to get naked before you were ready. And I’m disgusted at myself for doing that to you.”
author: Joya Goffney,

quote: “For everything there is a way to heal but that way of healing is not present for everyone”
author: Mintu Choudhary

quote: “Sensuality is a love language.”
author: Lebo Grand

quote: “None of us has a right to dictate how another human being finds happiness. Our time on this planet is short and all types of commitment are valid when they're built on love.”
author: Stephanie Brother,

quote: “You are my second soul”
author: Sugandha

quote: “You are my Second Soul”
author: Sugandha Rajpal

quote: “Maybe love is this thing that happens to us when everyone is sleeping.”
author: Assia Petricelli,

quote: “Inconnue, elle était ma forme préférée,
author: Paul Éluard,

quote: “Mon amour pour avoir figuré mes désirs
author: Paul Éluard,

quote: “D’une seule caresse
author: Paul Éluard,

quote: “Maybe this then was the definition of love. When you wanted someone, needed her, adored her still, even when you were utterly furious and quite ready to tie her to the bed just to keep her from going out and making more trouble”

quote: “Se produce ese zumbido de conexión que siempre ha estado entre nosotros, esa certeza de que ella y yo somos dos partes de un todo.”

quote: “Creo que el amor es un concepto, y cada persona tiene una palabra propia que lo resume para ellos.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “Y, a veces, eso es todo lo que se necesita, una persona dispuesta a escuchar a tu corazón, un sonido que nadie ha querido escuchar antes.”
author: Mia Sheridan,

quote: “The sea is a lover, most forgiving. Every moment he forgives the waves receding from him and includes them again into him. Love is to let go. Love is also to accept the ones who have returned.
author: Geet Chaturvedi,

quote: “You know, love songs say crap like “love will set you free,” but lately I’ve been thinking that love is more like a cage. The most beautiful cage, with gold filigree and diamonds on the bars. But a cage nonetheless.”
author: Jen DeLuca,

quote: “Marriage is built on Trust, Love and Service. By love serve one another.”
author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah,

quote: “LOVE is reciprocal. Love is superior to knowledge. Confusion is rooted in absence of love. Therefore love, have love and you would be loved back. When you find LOVE, let your LOVE be built On VALUES that ENDURE.”
author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah,

quote: “The reason why children are seen as children is because they have not been resourced to show their worth beyond what is seen in them. Aside material resources, parents should train their children to appreciate values, independence and accept responsibilities before they become adults”
author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah,

quote: “Why would God decide to come into the world, that He created Himself, just to be killed by His own creations?”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “If God can truly forgive any type of sin willingly, then why did He cause His own son to be killed for the sins of other people?”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Explore in order to understand what suits you well in life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “If you claim that God will never die or step down from the throne, then the prince is useless.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “The last child must inherit all the great attributes of his elders, then add in some of his own characteristics to be completely unique from the rest.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “The last child is always loved by the parents, simply because he has the ability to imitate and learn from those who saw the sun before him.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “The first child is also loved, when he is still the only child and there is the absence of someone who can take his place.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Once the second child comes into existence, the attention will start shifting to the newly-born baby.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “If Joseph was amongst the first born children of Jacob, chances are he would have turned out just as his elders were described in the scriptures.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “The last child is becoming more beloved to everyone and more people are willing, day and night, to embrace him with all their love.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Having a boyfriend or girlfriend is not love....But Having someone in your life on whom you have blind faith that even if you hurt them to the extreme they will still hold your hand and say:..."I was, I am, and I will always be yours"
author: Dhaneshwar Dutt

quote: “Love is a quality of god talented to humankind”
author: Mahiraj Jadeja,

quote: “There is nothing more painful
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Zapanjen sam kako sam svjesno, korak po korak, ušao u sve to; kako sam uvijek u tako jasnom svjetlu vidio svoj položaj, a ipak sam postupao kao dijete; kako i sada još jasno vidim, a još uvijek nema ni traga nade da stvari pođu nabolje.”
author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

quote: “Love is free but it'll cost you.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Nothing happens by accident and always by design.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “You lay beside me; your hand moved over my face
author: Louise Glück

quote: “Some people have found that health is more valuable than wealth. Climbing the ladder of self-interest.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “To forget someone, you need to stop loving them first.
author: Alex Haditaghi,

quote: “The banks of life cannot hold my love, which is as broad as the sea.”
author: Leonid Andreyev,

quote: “If I knew that Love was coming over I’d polish every surface in my house”
author: Josa Keyes,

quote: “Love is not long suffering.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Love gets loud sometimes.”
author: T.J. Condon,

quote: “DON’T BE THE MIRROR OF LOVE, BE THE LIGHT OF LOVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Only the one you will love will have the ability to hurt you.”
author: Purvi Mehta,

quote: “There is nothing more painful
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Make for the joy of making;
author: Laura Jaworski

quote: “Color, Light, Vibration, Joy—
author: Laura Jaworski

quote: “Let a ray of your love penetrate the darkness”
author: Ofer Cohen

quote: “Love Every Moment of your LIFE without regrets; YOU ARE AMAZING & BEAUTIFUL, ENJOY LIFE WITH LOVE, LAUGHTER, & SMILES.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “THERE IS ONLY ONE GOD, LOVE AND THERE IS ONLY ONE EVIL, FATE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “This is love, I think, to hold a name carefully between the teeth, to hold without swallowing.”
author: Sondra Charbadze,

quote: “Love is a gathering of minutiae. Stones, dirt particles, the waxing/waning light, goat’s milk, chamomile,
author: Sondra Charbadze,

quote: “You only have one life on this earth. You Better Love like there's no tomorrow, Do what you Love like there's no time left & Shine every moment with the most fantastic image of your self-worth.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “You deserve someone who will endure thorns just to give you bed of roses.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “Nothing stays
author: awakeningthe_writer

quote: “LOVE IS NOT AN ACT BUT A HABIT”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “To overcome oneself, one must reconcile and end the battle between heart and mind.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The adaptation of spirituality is the only solution to the problems of the world. We must go beyond corporeal desires.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The present is short lived. Difficult to define it without disturbing the past and the future events.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I'm so antisocial, that whenever I have sex with a woman, I close my eyes and pretend I'm masturbating.”
author: Quentin R. Bufogle,

quote: “Love is the foremost emotion of humanity and the mother of all emotional beginnings.”
author: Keisha Blair,

quote: “In this life, love is everything. It can heal. It can build bridges. It can end wars. Love is something that firmly grounds us in the present.”
author: Keisha Blair

quote: “Love is the mother of humanity and the forbearer of everything good. Love is at the epicenter of holistic wealth.”
author: Keisha Blair,

quote: “You think that holding someone hard will bring them closer. You think that you can hold them so hard that you'll still feel them, embossed on you, when you pull away.”
author: Eleanor and Park, Rainbow Rowell

quote: “Everyone of us have a way of attaining relief. Our outcry is a way of hope.”
author: Victor Vote

quote: “LOVE is definitely a good thing.”
author: DON SANTO

quote: “She called me Night,
author: Alexander Bentley

quote: “Loving someone and being with them are two different things. Just cherish the magical times that both interlink.”
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: “Sizzling with a passion, burning with desire, turn off the heater babe, we have our own fire.”
author: T.W. Lawless

quote: “Much is said about love and heartbreak but nobody ever talks about falling out of love. Nobody has penned words on how glorious an experience it can be. Nobody talks about how it can feel like wings of healing and winds of enrapturement; how it can feel like snowflakes against your cheeks when you've been waiting and waiting for the blissful calm of winter. No one recognizes the pristine beauty of falling out of love, what a breathtaking process and journey it can be. We talk about falling into love like it's something so good we should wake up every morning wanting it. But nobody talks about the enrapturement, the ascension, of rising up and out of it!”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Maybe even once, once in a lifetime! You surrender to ills of society! You surrender your conscience to societal norms and you let them have a feel of schadenfreude! I hated it and you will too.”
author: Atif Zahoor

quote: “An iota of kindness capitulates lumps of affluence”
author: Gagandeep Kaushal

quote: “Hope is a dangerous thing. It leaves our hearts open to damage that we might never heal from. And when your heart's been damaged before, hoping is not only dangerous but foolish.”
author: Stephanie Brother - BIG D

quote: “The truth is that we are all able to accept love into our lives but many people aren’t actually willing to.”
author: Skylar Sustin

quote: “ஓ, காதல் கொண்ட பெண்ணின் பார்வையே, உன்னை யாரால்தான் வருணிக்க முடியும்?”
author: Ivan Turgenev,

quote: “The truest and most important love you will ever have is the love you have for yourself.”
author: Skylar Sustin

quote: “Love and life will always fight, one who wins will tell your might.”
author: Purvi Mehta,

quote: “It takes two people to create a successful relationship, but it takes only one to fail it.”
author: Purvi Mehta,

quote: “Beauty never ceases, spot the nature, moon arises as the sun sets”
author: Gagandeep Kaushal

quote: “Love is a flower that grows in the garden of the heart.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin,

quote: “A Sufi's heart is a lamp of fire burning in god's love.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin,

quote: “I don't know what magic has brought him here. My brain can't function well enough; I can't make sense of it. But he's here. And his eyes are telling me that they love me.”
author: Sophie Kinsella,

quote: “People are flawed. And they make terrible mistakes, even with people they love.”
author: Joani Elliott,

quote: “Sensuality was meant to be a divine tool for your deepest love experience.”
author: Lebo Grand

quote: “If you care about being desired, it means you care about being a sensual woman.”
author: Lebo Grand

quote: “The world would be so different if we celebrated the rising up and out of love, as much as we celebrate the falling into it. Imagine learning of someone's breakup and rejoicing for her because you know that now she is going through the enlightening process of healing, self-love, and illumination. If our perspective collectively changes, we would be able to eliminate a significant portion of human suffering. When it does happen, because I'm not saying it should always happen but I'm saying that it does happen; we need to view the falling-out-of-love (or as I like to call it, the rising up and out of love), as a part of the full process of love, one that also effectively ushers in growth, joy, and fulfilment.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “We either die or live for something.
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “Behind every great man is an even greater woman.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “It takes so long to learn how to love but I think it starts with messing it up a few times.”
author: Charlotte Eriksson,

quote: “Love is blind. Yeah sure. But it is also poor in calculation and logic. It is rich in feeling, extravagant in manifesting and sumptuous in imagination. It is not the end but the beginning, the middle and the end. It never ends, though. It is eternal and ever-stretching like the universe. Love is not the synonym of life but life is the synonym of love”
author: Harmik Vaishnav,

quote: “I promise to see you, exactly as you are, as often as you let me.”
author: Jasmine Silvera,

quote: “The more you focus on the beauty of roses, the more invisible their thorns become; and an anthophile will never stop loving roses even when their thorns harm him. Therefore, this is how love should be!”
author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

quote: “We May Disagree,
author: Ujjwal Arora,

quote: “I’ve always loved finding things in my environment that bring me joy and excitement! How fun it is to become aware of your surroundings!”
author: Nancy B. Urbach

quote: “Life would be enough to know what you do in a day.”
author: Karl Kristian Flores,

quote: “To lovers out there …
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “And what of her smile?" you asked.
author: Wiss Auguste

quote: “Our road not marked on maps.
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “To whom I can stretch out my hand in the somber desert ? Who will accompany me on the empty night? Who will give me a fiery day?
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “I look inside myself and see it.
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “Loving yourself has never been more important than it is right now.”
author: Nancy B. Urbach

quote: “To lovers out there ...
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “The feel of the insistent strumming of your voice is my ear music.”
author: Michelle G. Stradford,

quote: “Feel the romance of simple, everyday moments ~
author: Jeanne McElvaney,

quote: “A love affair relationship is simply a growth agreement between two people that decide that they are going to grow together .”
author: Tare Munzara

quote: “I have seen love stories ending.
author: Randhir Kaur

quote: “Έτσι συγκινήθηκα από τις σελίδες του Ιμπν Χαζμ, που ορίζει τον έρωτα ως μια αντίθαση αρρώστια, που γιατρεύεται μόνη της, κι ο άρρωστος δεν θέλει να θεραπευτεί κι ο ασθενής δεν θέλει να αναρρώνει." "..η αγάπη μπαίνει από τα μάτια... όποιος πάσχει απ' αυτό το κακό επιδειχνύει μια υπερβολική επιθυμία, ενώ ταυτόχρονα επιθυμεί να μείνει παράμερα κι αποζητά τη μοναξιά, ενώ τα υπόλοιπα συμπτώματα που εμφανίζονται είναι η βίαιη ανησυχία και η σύγχυση που τον κάνει να χάνει τα λόγια του...”
author: Umberto Eco,

quote: “If romantic words were the pilar of love, poets and singers would not divorce; and if money was the mainstay of a family, billionaire families in dollars would never break up.”
author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

quote: “The movie always ends with the ‘I love you.’ He's holding the boombox outside of her room, and they ride off into the sunset. You never hear they broke up a week later when she wanted an East Coast school and he wanted West Coast. The thing that makes love lasting and true is knowing another person. You feel for them, but do you know them, the good, the bad, and the ugly, in your heart of hearts.
author: Carina Alyce,

quote: “The introduction of your true self is a recipe of importance; you never know who will love your ingredients.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “The feeling of unwanted, unloved, and uncared for can bring about despair. Just know that love is the cure for loneliness, sadness, and hopelessness. You are lovable and qualified to love those hungry for love. Dismiss arrogance and embrace humbleness; this is when you will start to open your heart to endless possibilities of being love.”
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “Never let despair be the end of your journey.
author: Jesus Apolinaris

quote: “I used to want to do it for everybody else; now I just wanna do it for myself.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Wisdom is a perfection of knowledge acquired through experience.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I cannot allow or encourage anyone to become a philosopher. But once you find the inspiration to become one of them, there will be no one to stop you.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Self-interest must be sacrificed before one can enter through the door of philosophy.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Once you know the true God, then seek Him out. Thank the teacher for showing you the right path. But keep your eyes on the target, which is God in this case.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “By right we arm but by love, disarm. Now is the nation called to love. By gun control we challenge not your rights to arms but your heart to sacrifice that love entails. So give me not a reading of the law but tales of love's deeds in hearts and homes -- how racks have shed arms like autumn leaves and turned the land from red to gold.”
author: Agona Apell

quote: “Come to me now once again and release me from gruelling anxiety. All that my heart longs for, fulfil. And be yourself my ally in love's bayttle.”
author: Sappho

quote: “I Love Myself Just the Way I Am &
author: Ujjwal Arora,

quote: “Love really was like a bird. You didn’t know where it might settle, or where. You couldn’t tame it, couldn’t force it. Couldn’t often predict it. You could call and call for it and never would it flutter down. Then, at the most unexpected time, in the most unexpected place, it was there.”
author: Roseanna M. White,

quote: “We deserve to experience love fully, equally, without shame and without compromise.”
author: Elliot Page

quote: “Entonces sonrió. Fue una sonrisa tímida y fugaz, todavía entre el rastro salado de las lágrimas, pero durante una milésima de segundo estuvo ahí, iluminando su rostro, tensando sus labios, dibujada para mí.”
author: Alice Kellen,

quote: “To live in a hallucination of being loved is more painful than rejection.”
author: Vinaya Panicker

quote: “We all should follow our dreams as we should have more than one to conquer!”
author: Charlena E.  Jackson,

quote: “Memories weigh more than mountains
author: Ahmad Ardalan

quote: “I will never want to be the one a man chooses to be with because I'm the one he knows will always forgive him over and over again. God forbid I ever become that. God forbid a man ever stays with me because true love scares him. May I never be just a man's safe choice.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “There is a reason to love -
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “People have all these opinions on what happens when we die and stand at the front gates of Heaven. People think we'll be asked if we were holy, if we were righteous, if we did good deeds. But I think we'll be asked if we loved a wild love, if we loved with all our soul, if we knew a love worth living for. Have you known a wild love? Have you told someone everything in your heart? That's what they'll ask us.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “An electric shock to the iris
author: Natalie Nascenzi

quote: “All great things are hidden and difficult to achieve. But once you figure it out, you will start to live.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The concept of heaven is so beautiful to the point where imagination rules the world.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “I am happy for couples who break up. It is never the fulfilled couples who break up; it's the unfulfilled couples who break up and more often than not, it's the excruciatingly difficult couples who break up. Happy relationships are not the ones that are ending. So when I see a separated couple I see two individuals who are strong enough to hope for more from life, strong enough to make a decision that benefits their wellbeing and happiness. I see two people who are now more hopeful, more brave, more tenacious and more ready for love, than they were before. That makes me happy.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “What is inner wealth? Inner wealth is the ability to richly inhabit daily moments of mundane nothingness, without the dread of stillness, without the fear of silence, without the shame of the ordinary. It's when a simple gaze or a small smile from across the room is sufficient. The soundless sunlight is sufficient. The quiet breeze easily fills up any holes in your soul. This is inner wealth. And what is love? Love is the sharing of that inner wealth with another person. Love is mutual flourishing.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Unrequited love belongs to one person. Really being in love with another person requires the two of you. It can’t be willed to exist from one person alone, and therefore, it is not something any one person can control. And that’s why it’s so f*cking terrifying.”
author: Jeris Jean,

quote: “The edges of our heart
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “A rose has always been considered a symbol of such a strong feeling as love. When choosing its color, be careful, since each of them has a different meaning.”
author: Unknown

quote: “But as the sun started to rise over the hills, they were off, on the wide-open road, heading for his home. The one he somehow needed to take this tight-assed woman to, along with her scrap of a mangy cat, the one with half an ear missing.  Because if he hadn’t wrangled her into coming, somehow, this time, in a very weird, unexpected way… …it wouldn’t have felt as much like his home. At all.”
author: Susan Saxx ,

quote: “In time of fear and destruction, awakening will take over you, it’s the time when the light gets in ,feel it , observe it ,embrace it ..”
author: ofer cohen

quote: “Barry, júrame que no dejarás que te olvide, que nos olvide. ¡Júramelo!”
author: Josh T. Baker,

quote: “Love is neither aggressive nor dramatic, love is raw.”
author: Vinaya Panicker

quote: “Lo que mucha gente llama amar consiste en elegir a una mujer y casarse con ella. La eligen, te lo juro, los he visto. Como si se pudiera elegir en el amor, como si no fuera un rayo que te parte los huesos y te deja estaqueado en la mitad del patio.”
author: Julio Cortázar,

quote: “To lovers out there ...
author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quote: “Some will find you intimidating.
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “There is still time to love -
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “The days we’d spent swimming and fishing at the beach, the first time I’d kissed her, the dreams we’d shared – I was now the only keeper of these memories, and that was the truest sort of loneliness. There were so many things I still wanted to tell her, to share with her.”
author: Andrea Stewart, Jovis

quote: “Knowing and loving who you are is one of the most important lessons I have learned in this life!”
author: Nancy B. Urbach

quote: “Poor thing! She had loved him, after all.”
author: Gustave Flaubert,

quote: “I love to hear your heart beat
author: Natalie Nascenzi

quote: “The shadow of your cheekbones
author: Natalie Nascenzi

quote: “To walk the path of intentionally and consciously finding love, you need to start with the main question: Where do I want to go?”
author: Crista Beck,

quote: “When mental issues start to form seeds in our minds the only thing that grows is weeds from all of the dead plants that failed to bloom.”
author: Charlena E.  Jackson,

quote: “Life is less to experience the wisdom and beauty lies in nature.
author: Ankit Samrat

quote: “And that's the thing love, it's demands to be expressed”
author: Anamika Mishra,

quote: “Look for great character in an individual and don't look for beautiful names.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “In a world where we are all battling our own shadows, I wonder why any of us still have the audacity to judge love. Love: whenever it happens, to whomever it happens; is greater than any of us. None of us even know what we're really doing, do we? We're all a mess! And yet, we like to sit around grading love and rating whose love is better and brighter and righter. Love doesn't give a shit, that's the truth. Life is too short to not celebrate love wherever it happens, to whomever it happens. We're all leaves in autumn, all snowflakes in the wind!”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “•	Expect much when you live with love, forgiveness, and courage.”
author: Isaac Nash,

quote: “..., een spannende gedachte begon vorm te krijgen; de mogelijkheid om alleen te zijn, helemaal in je eentje, in alle rust en vol verwachting, bijna een soort dwaasheid die je je kunt permitteren wanneer je gezegend bent let liefde.”
author: Tove Jansson,

quote: “..., een spannende gedachte begon vorm te krijgen; de mogelijkheid om alleen te zijn, helemaal in je eentje, in alle rust en vol verwachting, bijna een soort dwaasheid die je je kunt permitteren wanneer je gezegend bent met liefde.”
author: Tove Jansson,

quote: “It was more than love...it was a feeling of comfort...of home.”
author: T.S. Krupa,

quote: “I need a favor," he started.
author: T.S. Krupa,

quote: “I can't quit you Andy Parker.”
author: T.S. Krupa,

quote: “It was just one of those chance meetings, but after the meeting he just kinda stuck with me, you know?”
author: T.S. Krupa,

quote: “The truth is infinite. Whatever you know is only useful to your survival and protective to your senses.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Love at first sight is the exception, not the rule.”
author: Crista Beck,

quote: “FORGIVE ONESELF TO LIVE IN PEACE AND FORGIVE OTHERS TO LIVE IN LOVE”
author: J. Tisa

quote: “LOVE TO FORGIVE, FORGIVE TO LOVE”
author: J. Nedumaan

quote: “nemám knížky”
author: Kacza

quote: “I see Ender in you looking out at me. You see Ender in me looking out at you. And yet not one of us is truly him; we are each our own self, all of us strangers on our own road.”
author: Orson Scott Card,

quote: “Everyone deserves to be loved.”
author: Gretchen Lane,

quote: “I want us to exist together until we perish. Pure.”
author: P.B. Flower,

quote: “I just met her for the very first time and had yet to fall in love with her. When the night ended a voice spoke to me and said, " That is your wife you just met.”
author: Hector M Parrales Jr

quote: “Before you can truly understand the value of being loved by another, you must begin with truly loving and honoring yourself.”
author: Mishi McCoy

quote: “The full experience of something beautiful or terrifying cannot be expressed in words.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The more you keep pushing forward, the more you will be able to see through the end.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “No one can claim to have mastered love, not even in the grave.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Sometimes, you just can't help yourself but to learn quickly when being taught by the opposite gender.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Beautiful names don't need a meaning to back them up.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “A soul can love only another soul. It cannot be turned inward and then expect to love itself.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “i saw stars in your eyes and spent hours exploring the galaxy within your mind. i hoped the space inside of you would never grow between us”
author: Samantha Tamburello

quote: “One of the best things about love, real love, is that it doesn’t demand perfection. It simply invites us to live up to our potential.”
author: Rosie Danan,

quote: “She enticed me in my days. She allured me in my nights. She bewitched me in myriad unknown ways.”
author: Avijeet Das

quote: “To have a genuine relationship, you must first love yourself from within, and then you may find another that loves themselves the same. You don’t fall in love; you share the love.”
author: Jon Luvelli

quote: “Self love is the beginning of all true love. Before self love, there is only attachment. A person who does not love the "I" , cannot truly love the "we.”
author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith  Jr,

quote: “Love isn't enough. I never used to understand that expression, but I do now. You can love someone completely and it still isn't enough to make it work.”
author: Carola Lovering,

quote: “If we radiate feelings and thoughts of wealth and affluence, we will naturally attract more wealth and affluence into our life. The same is true, then, of the opposite.”
author: Hendrith Vanlon Smith  Jr,

quote: “Hercules knows you are a strong, confident woman. It's one of the things he loves about you, just like you relish his big heart and ability to see the world in a bright way. You've opened yourselves up to each other, which is a beautiful thing! But it's important to remember that when you let someone into your heart, you allow them to see all sides of you- even the vulnerable side. Loving someone does not make you any less strong. It means you trust in one another and they trust in you- that you can give and you can take.”
author: Jen Calonita,

quote: “I called you my home
author: Garima Dixit,

quote: “I come from the depths of infinity
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “I've always hated the idea of hugs, but you know, I guess sometimes it's the people who say they hate hugs that actually need it the most”
author: Yashika Vahi,

quote: “Darling, I’ve realised I don’t love you.
author: Eleanor Davis,

quote: “The invitation for each of us is to dive into the mystery of our questions and our wondering, and come out of the trance of certainty, the idea that we’re supposed to “know” what to do with this life or have some absolute conclusion or resolution about the many paradoxes and contradictions of our existence. Invite you to soften into your doubts, celebrate your uncertainty, and come to see the beauty - and ultimate safety - in Not Knowing. We know not where the journey leads, nor whether a final destination is even a meaningful concept. The attraction is the inherent thrill of participating in a grand creative endeavor for which participation is its own reward.”
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “No love defines us as much
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “If words come out of the heart, they will enter the heart.”
author: Rumi

quote: “Ultimately, we can powerfully impact the world with Christ’s love.”
author: Rachelle Triay,

quote: “All you need in love and from your significant one is respect only. Leave beauty and intelligence at last.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The thing about you is that you never pulled away when I started to love you more. You are never impatient with my heart, I am never insecure with how you make me feel. I love you because you have never given me false hope.”
author: Courtney Peppernell,

quote: “When you betray to someone, first you betray to that one who speaks somewhere inside you that you are a good human”
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari,

quote: “Being born is a blessing in itself. You have survived, despite all the odds.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “L'amore è amore, in qualunque modo si manifesti. Lui stesso aveva avuto modo di constatare come coppie omosessuali avessero vissuto delle storie con una delicatezza di sentimenti riscontrabile in altre più convenzionali.”
author: Giorgio Faletti,

quote: “Love just seems to make life not just livable, but a gallant, gallant event.”
author: Toni Morrison,

quote: “It is so refreshing...
author: Adaora O.,

quote: “TRUTH, LIGHT AND LOVE SHALL NEVER BE BLINDED”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “We are all little ripples moving in the same vast ocean. I would rather drown in the depths of Love than splash around on the shore of complacency. Every moment in which you recognize another’s pain is a call for you to fulfill part of your soul’s purpose. To assist another is an opportunity to be Love that heals the world. Oh, and did I mention that you cannot love another without also healing yourself. Love until it hurts not to love.”
author: Mishi McCoy

quote: “It is true; most medicine does come in a bottle. There is however, some medicine that can only come through love, faith and hope. It comes from our Source, from our life force within. We can all benefit from this wonderful medicine daily and administer as often as needed.”
author: Mishi McCoy

quote: “We never lose people annie the light manifest life in many confusing ways we will all meet again We will all love again We are all in a cycle of love and light , life is a never end river , a rainbow of colors emotions and opportunities”
author: ofer cohen

quote: “Do good deeds while you are still alive. Otherwise, there will be no VIP place for you in heaven.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “The VIP places in heaven are only reserved for the religious leaders and founders.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Should I draw you the picture of my heart it would be what I hope you would still love though it contained nothing new. The early possession you obtained there, and the absolute power you have obtained over it, leaves not the smallest space unoccupied.”
author: Abigail Adams

quote: “ALL LOVE ENDS FOR HURTS BUT ACCEPTING HURTS IS THE PUREST ACT OF LOVE”
author: J. Ruby

quote: “That’s what a soul is: a root. It’s memories and love and feelings. And that can’t be destroyed. I promised you then and I promise you now—no one is ever really gone.”
author: Sara Wolf,

quote: “You being here. This moment. It's perfection, and it's beauty. It surprises me that I wouldn't even have known to wish for it on a shooting star before today.”
author: Pratik  Mishra,

quote: “We were living our once upon a time. Every day felt like a lifetime; every moment was alive.”
author: Pratik  Mishra,

quote: “He missed her like an asphyxiating
author: Teufel Damon

quote: “Saying you’re sorry is an act of strength. Apologizing says I appreciate you and your feelings and I am strong enough to admit that I did something that hurt you. Honest self-reflection is not for the weak. It is perhaps one of the greatest acts of courage. So is apologizing. It is not lowering yourself. It is not about power. It does not even have to directly relate to the transgression itself. It says, I see you and hear you. You are important to me. Saying I’m sorry is telling someone they matter.”
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: “MY ART FOR YOUR HEART
author: Mitta Xinindlu

quote: “You maintain the integrity of things your honor no matter how old or new, expensive or inexpensive....simply stated, you dignify it for it's being... that's love.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Been homesick lately
author: Winnie Nantongo,

quote: “Where there is love there is hope and where there is hope there is light and when there is light there is enlightenment.”
author: Aiyaz Uddin,

quote: “Words are life. Words are light. Words are power. Words are energy. Words are truth. Words can enliven and words can also kill. Words can give hope, or plunge us into despair. People use words to build peace, and use words to make war. Words can create walls between cultures, religions, and nations. And words can also build bridges. The existence of an individual, a family, a community, a country, and our planet is being led to good or to evil through the power of the words we speak. The words we speak are responsible for everything that happens in this world. We, therefore, must be responsible for the words we speak. On behalf of future generations, I hope that each of us will do all we can to speak only bright, light-filled words, so that one day, our descendants will be born into a world filled with light. There is no time to lose. Starting at this very moment, I hope all of us will take a close look at the words we have been using and make constant efforts to fill them with brightness.”
author: alexis karpouzos,

quote: “if our story was a fairytale
author: A.J. Byron,

quote: “I don't know whether to laugh or smile. I guess I am going to do both at the same time.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “Choose someone who can love not only your sky during the day but also during your darkest nights even when the stars and the moon resist to share their light.”
author: Verliza Gajeles

quote: “I liked the idea of him, a man who seemed to carry both the hard edges and the soft centers. A man who would not only touch my body but reach my soul.
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn,

quote: “I love the way I feel when you touch me.”
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn,

quote: “All you ever had to do was STAND UP.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “One maintains the integrity of things they honor no matter how old or new, expensive or inexpensive....simply stated, they dignify it for it's being... that's love.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “I was a "chaser". Due to rejections I faced as a child or people taking things from me that didn't belong to them, I thought I had to chase things to have it or fight to keep it when all I truly had to do was attract and let go. Essentially....I just had to remember how to be me.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “I remember the days I used to be intimidated by the little voice inside my head. Now, I have overcome it.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “A relationship is like a dance. Two people moving in synchronicity to a melody only they can hear.”
author: Sandra Cooze

quote: “No. I would never love someone like Rainey.” I think it would have hurt less if he drove a sword straight through my heart.”
author: Calia Read,

quote: “You are not happy because of your location, but because of your mindset.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “In this world, there are a lot who stare at you.
author: Vyomesh Khare

quote: “PEOPLE BUILD TOO MANY BORDERS BUT NOT ENOUGH LOVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “The truth lose its beauty once it's visible before your eyes.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quote: “But then when am I not a fool?"
author: Debatrayee Banerjee,

quote: “كون المرء محبًا هو أن يكون مؤغلاً في أعماق وجوده
author: رسائل مارتن هيدغر إلى حنا آردنت

quote: “TO TRUST IN LOVE IS TO BELIEVE IN GIVING AND TAKING EXCUSES”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “far too different
author: A.J. Byron,

quote: “Before you set out on this journey, know that God loves you right now, right where you are. We cannot make God love us anymore or any less. It does not matter how much you do or how much you GROW. God’s love for you does not change. It is an eternal, unfathomable pure love. This is important and I hope you understand just how much you are loved.”
author: Rachelle Triay,

quote: “I had left myself no one to confine in, no one who would feel any sympathy for what I'd done. And after all that, he was in love with someone else. I screwed my eyes shut and presses my head down hard into the pillow. I thought of the night before, when he told me that he wanted me, how it felt then. Just admit it, I thought. He doesn't love you. That's what hurts.”
author: Sally Rooney,

quote: “To express you is paradoxical
author: Yarro Rai,

quote: “My one small hope for you today is this: don't let life happen to you. What I mean by that is, don't just exist in the space you occupy — I hope you really, truly live. When you wake up, I hope that you are grateful for a fresh start. I hope you notice your breath go in and out, and I hope you feel lucky to be alive. And then I hope you step outside and notice the way saying hello to a stranger can make a smile reach their eyes. I hope that you actively choose, in every passing moment, to reach for what ignites a fire inside of you. If it is a dream: pursue it relentlessly. If it is a love: make sure they know you care. Whatever you're doing, wherever you are — I hope you do it with all of your heart.”
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “Can you look back to when you met the one you loved the most and remember exactly how it was? Not as in where you were or what she was wearing or what you ate for lunch that day, but rather as in what you saw in her that made you say, Yes, this is what I came here for.”
author: Nico Walker,

quote: “Can you look back to when you met the one you loved the most and remember exactly how it was? Not as in where you were or what she was wearing or what you ate for lunch that day, but rather as in what it is you saw in her that made you say, Yes, this is what I came here for.”
author: Nico Walker,

quote: “Sometimes temporary
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “I think you forgot that love is as much a verb as it is a noun,
author: Namrata Gupta,

quote: “Stop breaking your heart. Learn to love people for who they are and not how you imagined them to be.”
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: “Dear,
author: Yarro Rai,

quote: “I hope you choose patience. Even when you are overwhelmed by unknowns. When someone cannot give you answers, when you begin to wonder why you're here, when you simply want to give up: be patient. Some people are truly worth the wait.”
author: Kirsten Robinson,

quote: “You have been hurt, and you have hurt. You are no stranger to pain, anger or fear. Even so, you have given grace to others, and you have been shown forgiveness yourself. And that is what makes you so beautiful, I think. You have had every reason to give up, but you still chose love.”
author: Kirsten Robinson

quote: “Since there's no help, come let us kiss and part"
author: Kim Addonizio,

quote: “ليس كل من فكر بأن ينساك يكرهك
author: كرار السعيدي

quote: “قلبي يهواك وعقلي يرفضك
author: كرار السعيدي

quote: “I’d thought that gazing at her would satisfy my raging fire but instead I was aching all over.”
author: Anoir Ou-Chad,

quote: “Love is all of who you are.”
author: Adrienne Posey,

quote: “I kept on hoping while the world forgot our love.”
author: Laura Chouette

quote: “DON'T COUNT ON MARRIAGE, COUNT ON LOVE”
author: P.S. Jagadeesh Kumar

quote: “Pernahkan kau ada di titik di mana hidupmu begitu terartur, melakukan segala sesuatu yang kau mampu untuk menjadi "seragam", berharap semua akan baik-baik adanya, namun tetap merasa ada yang hilang?
author: Fiersa Besari,

quote: “He knew how often I needed to travel to be sane, what my favorite places were, which seat I would choose in a restaurant, which songs I listened to depending on my mood, how I looked when I was hungry, how much sugar I would like in my coffee, what hurt me and what would fix it, when I craved a hug and how tight should that be, how to make out my mood from my voice and how fast my heart would beat if I was asked to address a gathering of five hundred people.”
author: Namrata Gupta,

quote: “I couldn't think of anything except him. I didn't want to be anyone except his. I didn't want to do anything except be with him. I looked at other things but I was lost in his thoughts. Nothing except him made me happy anymore. Nothing except him made me sad anymore. I felt only him.”
author: Namrata Gupta,

Like, if I had an x-ray, it would show an arrow lodged right into the center of that bloody, bleeding mass of muscle in my chest. And I know, somehow, that things have changed between us.”

quote: “The body is the slave of the mind and not the other way around.”

quote: “You will simply be wasting your energy by putting too much emphasis on the improvement of the body, while leaving the mind idle — leaving it to rot.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “No man should become a master of another. You must resist falling into this category.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “You are all born free and equal, and free you shall all die.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Sometimes, we resist to accept different views or break away from the kinds of nonsense that we hold dear to ourselves.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Keep in mind that it would be an exaggeration to tell, or convince another individual that they are COMPLETELY wrong.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “The truth, or rather, reality is far from any human can ever reach.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Know the right time to break away from your ignorance and join the ship of those who have chosen wisdom.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Become your own leader and master in life.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Cut away all of those feelings that showcase your weakness and develop the strong character that you have always been dreaming since birth.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “I urge you to live to your fullest potential and to never limit your thinking according to the appetite of another individual.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Remember, those who are teaching you to remain in one place explored everything around them.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Death is regarded as an evil and our minds are only meditating upon life itself, and never upon the destroyer of pleasure, which is death.”
author: Mwanandeke Kindembo,

quote: “Sometimes I think we share a soul. His pain has become mine. And mine his.”
author: Alexis Henderson,

quote: “I have seen the Beast and her maidens again. I hear their cries in the woods at night. They call to me, and I call to them. There is no love as pure as that.”
author: Alexis Henderson,

quote: “I love him. He taught me how. I don't think I knew how to choose to love until I met him.”
